columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the address record.

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: First address line (street name/number). Primary human-readable address label.

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Second address line (additional street info, building, apartment). May be empty.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Third address line (typically locality, city and postal code combined).

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Fourth address line (often country name or region).

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Geographic longitude value for the address (floating point). Coordinate reference not implied by field.

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Geographic latitude value for the address (floating point). Coordinate reference not implied by field.

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Integer code indicating the geocoding model/type used (e.g., 0/1 indicating different models).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version identifier for the geocode model that created the geocoding results.

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the geocoding/search was performed for this address.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Quality/score returned by the geocoding model (higher typically indicates better match).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Identifier for the primary matched street from the geocoding model (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Identifier for a secondary matched street from the geocoding model (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Identifier for the matched location/place from the geocoding model (e.g., locality id).

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code as returned or inferred by the geocoding model (string to preserve leading zeros).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Country table (ID). Identifies the country for the address.

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original or normalized query string used to search the geocoding service (free text).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Street name text returned by the geocoding model for street match 1 (native language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: Street number returned by the geocoding model (stored as text to accommodate non-numeric values).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Secondary street name text from the geocoding model (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: Secondary street number returned by geocoding model (text).

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality/place name returned by the geocoding model (native/local language).

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude value returned by the geocoding model (string typed in DB).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude value returned by the geocoding model (string typed in DB).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Hierarchical or coded broader area identifiers returned by geocoding (e.g., region codes).

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Postal code stored as numeric integer. Use with care if leading zeros exist in target country.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: District or administrative area name returned by the geocoding model (native language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Smaller area/neighborhood name returned by the geocoding model (native language).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Reference key to indicate the source data mart or partition identifier used when importing this address.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or dataset from which the address row was imported.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by the data mart for mapping back to source rows.

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character type code from geocoding (classification code, e.g., 'L' or 'N').

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether Line1 was manually overridden by a user (true) or derived by system (false).

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: First address line translated or formatted in English (if available).

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Second address line in English (if available).

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Third address line in English (typically locality and postal code in English).

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Fourth address line in English (typically country name in English).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Street name returned by geocoding model rendered in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Secondary street name returned by geocoding model in English (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality/place name returned by geocoding model rendered in English.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: District or administrative area name returned by the geocoding model in English.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area or neighborhood name returned by the geocoding model in English.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether Line1En was manually overridden by a user (true) or produced by system (false).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: Street number returned by the geocoding model in English/formatted for display.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: Secondary street number returned by geocoding model in English (if available).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name of the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Long-form description or notes for the policy.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or service account that created the policy.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or service account that last modified the policy.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value applied by the policy (stored as integer/number representing percent or scaled percent).

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Monetary ceiling / limit for advance payments defined by the policy. Decimal currency value.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Serialized rule expression or workflow condition that determines policy applicability. Typically XML/XAML text.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the payment policy is active and should be applied.

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Optional free-text or script used to calculate advance amounts (may contain expressions or serialized logic).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Optional fixed monetary amount associated with the policy. Stored as decimal; sample data suggests USD currency.

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentMethodID
columns.description: Identifier of the advanced payment method. Part of the composite primary key and references dbo.AdvancedPaymentMethod(ID).

columns.name: SalesCollectionID
columns.description: Identifier of the sales collection. Part of the composite primary key and references dbo.SalesCollection(ID).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the discount policy.

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the type/category of discount.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the discount policy (localized text).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer, free-text description of the discount policy (often localized).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount policy is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Username or identifier of the user who created the discount policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Username or identifier of the user who last modified the discount policy.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value for the discount (where applicable). Stored as numeric percentage (e.g., 10.000).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed monetary amount for the discount. Currency hint: USD.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Expression or rule text that defines when and how the discount applies (business rule).

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount is applied per unit (true) or on the total (false).

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Discount value applicable to bundle type 1 when defined.

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Discount value applicable to bundle type 2 when defined.

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Discount value applicable to bundle type 3 when defined.

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Discount value applicable to bundle type 4 when defined.

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Discount value for other bundle types not specifically enumerated.

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage or amount that can be applied under this policy.

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount that a supervisor-level user is allowed to grant.

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount that an area manager can approve.

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount that a sales manager can approve.

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount that a salesperson/salesman can apply.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mart key used for external reporting or integration (may be null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data mart table associated with this policy (external mapping).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by data mart mappings for this discount policy.

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 1 if used by the policy.

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 2 if used by the policy.

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 3 if used by the policy.

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 4 if used by the policy.

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Product-specific discount applied to other/unspecified product slots.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the deactivation reason (values are in Greek).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the advertisement sales type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short code or description for the sales type (example values: ST1, ST2, ST3).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking to a data mart table (currently null for all rows).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external/data-mart table associated with this sales type (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by an external data mart for this sales type (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the archived number record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code value representing the archived number (user-facing code).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this archived number is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this archived number record was created.

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the archived number; foreign key to dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the user who created the archived number (system login name).

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Identifier for the attribute category or group (stored as text).

columns.name: AttributeType
columns.description: Type or classification code for the attribute (categorization).

columns.name: AttributeName
columns.description: Human-readable attribute name (e.g., property or field name such as 'Internet_Cities').

columns.name: AttributeLanguageId
columns.description: Locale or language identifier for the attribute metadata (e.g., 1032).

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for the specific attribute value (text stored as an identifier).

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: The text value for the attribute (display value or label for the attribute value).

columns.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
columns.description: Locale or language identifier for the attribute value (e.g., 1032).

columns.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
columns.description: Comma-separated list of UDAC part definition codes that are active for this attribute value (may be 'None' or null).

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the rule condition definition. Part of the composite primary key. Also a foreign key referencing dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID.

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier of the operand allowed for the rule condition. Part of the composite primary key. Also a foreign key referencing dbo.RuleConditionOperand.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the bank.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable bank name/description (stored with Greek collation in source). Use this field as the display label for the bank.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the bank is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the bank deposit detail record. Also used as the ID linking to the SalesCollection record.

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.Bank.ID. Identifies the bank where the deposit was made.

columns.name: BankDepositNumber
columns.description: Alphanumeric deposit reference or slip number assigned by the bank; used as the primary human-readable identifier for the deposit.

columns.name: BankDepositDate
columns.description: Date and time when the bank recorded the deposit.

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geographic model used to define these area identifiers. Combined with BroaderAreaID forms the composite primary key.

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Code that identifies the broader geographic area (unique within the GeoModelVersion).

columns.name: AreaName
columns.description: Full local-language name of the broader area (human-readable).

columns.name: MasterGeoAreaGroupID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup.ID that groups broader areas into master geographic groups.

columns.name: ShortAreaName
columns.description: Short or abbreviated local-language name for the broader area (may be null when not provided).

columns.name: AreaNameEn
columns.description: English-language name of the broader area for use in English-language displays and reports.

columns.name: ShortAreaNameEn
columns.description: Short or abbreviated English name for the broader area (may be null when not provided).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geographic model applicable to this lookup row (e.g., 1.0).

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Canonical identifier/code for the broader geographic area.

columns.name: AreaName
columns.description: Localized (native language) name of the broader geographic area used for display and lookups.

columns.name: MasterGeoAreaGroupID
columns.description: Identifier referencing a master geographical grouping. May be null when not assigned.

columns.name: ShortAreaName
columns.description: Short or abbreviated localized name for the area (if available).

columns.name: AreaNameEn
columns.description: English (or alternate language) version of the area name for international display.

columns.name: ShortAreaNameEn
columns.description: Short English (or alternate language) name for the area, when available.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the business point (primary key).

columns.name: LocationNodeID
columns.description: Reference to a classifier node that describes the location hierarchy or district for this business point.

columns.name: LocationAddressID
columns.description: Reference to the address record used for the physical location of the business point.

columns.name: ActivityClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Reference to the activity/classifier node describing the business activity or industry for this point.

columns.name: SalesNodeID
columns.description: Optional reference to the sales classifier node (sales region/organization) for this business point.

columns.name: BillingAddressID
columns.description: Reference to the address record used for billing purposes for this business point.

columns.name: SalesContactID
columns.description: Reference to the contact person or sales contact responsible for this business point.

columns.name: LegalFormID
columns.description: Identifier referencing the legal form/type of the business (e.g., sole trader, corporation).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Registered or display name of the business point (primary human-readable label).

columns.name: Url
columns.description: Website URL for the business point or organization, if available.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the business point is currently active (true) or deactivated (false).

columns.name: DeactivationReason
columns.description: Free-text reason or code explaining why the business point was deactivated, when applicable.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this business point record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or process that created the business point record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent modification to this business point record.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified this business point record.

columns.name: BrandName
columns.description: Brand or trading name associated with the business point. Often similar to Name but may differ.

columns.name: TaxOfficeID
columns.description: Reference to the tax office identifier associated with this business point for tax reporting.

columns.name: VatCategoryID
columns.description: Identifier for the VAT category applicable to this business point.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Business point code (business-specific short identifier or external code).

columns.name: Profession
columns.description: Text description of the primary profession or trade of the business point, where provided.

columns.name: IsPOI
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this business point is marked as a point of interest (POI).

columns.name: CustomerSourceID
columns.description: Reference to the source channel or system from which this customer/business point originated.

columns.name: LastUpdateOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last time substantive data for this business point was updated (business-level).

columns.name: LastUpdateBy
columns.description: User or process that performed the last substantive update to this business point.

columns.name: SalesAddressID
columns.description: Optional reference to an address used for sales correspondence or delivery for this business point.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management key or external key used for integrations / ETL mapping (often equals Code).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or data-management table that provided this record (integration provenance).

columns.name: GLSeqCodeID
columns.description: Reference to the general ledger sequence code used for accounting classification of this business point.

columns.name: KEPYOStatusID
columns.description: Reference to a status code (KEPYO) used for regulatory or reporting status of the business point.

columns.name: HasCRMTicket
columns.description: Flag indicating whether there is an associated CRM ticket for this business point.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by source systems or integrations to uniquely identify the record.

columns.name: CustomerSolvencyID
columns.description: Identifier referencing the solvency or creditworthiness classification for the customer/business point.

columns.name: NoTaxVat
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the business point is exempt from VAT or has no VAT registration.

columns.name: SpecialInformation
columns.description: Reserved field for special notes or additional information about the business point.

columns.name: ExtraCardInformation
columns.description: Additional free-text information used for card/loyalty or other extended attributes.

columns.name: TransferDateToEBS
columns.description: Date when this record was transferred to the EBS (external business system) integration, if applicable.

columns.name: CustomerSourceModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the customer source information was last modified.

columns.name: CustomerUpdateModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the last customer update action (metadata) was applied to this record.

columns.name: CustomerUpdateID
columns.description: Reference to a customer update action record describing reasons or batch operations that updated this record.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Database row version / timestamp used for concurrency control.

columns.name: HasLiveProfilePageInXOGR
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this business point has an active public profile page in the XOGR system.

columns.name: ShowDistrictInXOGR
columns.description: Flag controlling whether the district is displayed on the XOGR profile page for this business point.

columns.name: InitialCustomerSourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the original source/channel where this customer/business point was first created.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier of the business point (part of the composite primary key). Represents the business entity or location associated with the default value.

columns.name: ContentAttributeDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the content attribute definition (part of the composite primary key). Identifies which attribute the default value applies to.

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: Default value assigned for the specified content attribute and business point. Text up to 500 characters; may be localized (Greek collation).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the calendar entry.

columns.name: CalendarDate
columns.description: Date and time for the calendar entry. Represents the calendar day associated with the Description.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the calendar date (e.g., holiday, event). Text stored in Greek collation.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data Mart numeric key used for mapping to downstream data models. Often null in source extracts.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data mart table this calendar row maps to. Typically used for ETL/data lineage; often null.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by the data mart for mapping (string key). Typically used in ETL mapping and may be null.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the campaign assignment request reason.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or numeric string representing the reason (used for lookups and compact display).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the assignment request reason (e.g., 'Allagi SD', 'Allagi SEGMENT').

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this reason is active and available for use.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the CampaignChannelType record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Campaign this channel configuration belongs to (dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Channel Type (e.g., email, SMS) (dbo.ChannelType.ID).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Expression or criteria used to include recipients for this channel (filter/segment expression).

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of recipients included by the include expression for this channel.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Expression or criteria used to exclude recipients from this channel (filter/segment expression).

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of recipients excluded by the exclude expression for this channel.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this campaign-channel configuration was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the channel was last initialized (e.g., when processing or allocation began).

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the channel processing or finalization completed.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND expression applied to included recipients (combined with IncludeExpression).

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND expression applied to excluded recipients (combined with ExcludedExpression).

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of recipients considered for this channel (after include/exclude logic).

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression that determines assignment inclusion logic (specific to assignment processing rules).

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression that determines assignment exclusion logic (specific to assignment processing rules).

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Optional count of additional included recipients classified under 'others' or fallback groups.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign fixed offer record

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent campaign (dbo.Campaign.ID)

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the fixed offer associated with the campaign (string, up to 100 characters)

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the channel type for this offer (dbo.ChannelType.ID)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign fixed offer product link

columns.name: CampaignFixedOfferID
columns.description: Foreign key to the campaign fixed offer this product belongs to (dbo.CampaignFixedOffer.ID)

columns.name: PricelistItemID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the pricelist item (product/price) associated with this campaign offer (dbo.PricelistItem.ID)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign fixed offer product detail record.

columns.name: CampaignFixedOfferProductID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent CampaignFixedOfferProduct (dbo.CampaignFixedOfferProduct.ID).

columns.name: PriceListItemDetailID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the related price list item detail (dbo.PricelistItemDetail.ID).

columns.name: NumberOfOccurencies
columns.description: Number of times this price list item is applied within the fixed offer (count).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign group.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key to the parent campaign (dbo.Campaign.ID) that this group belongs to.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the campaign group.

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the channel type for this group (dbo.ChannelType.ID).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Expression (filter or rule) that defines which entities are included in the group.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items/entities explicitly included by the include expression.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Expression (filter or rule) that defines which entities are excluded from the group.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items/entities explicitly excluded by the exclude expression.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the campaign group was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the group was last initialized (process start or evaluation).

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the group was finalized (no further changes expected).

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Conjunctive (AND) expression used in addition to IncludeExpression to refine included entities.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Conjunctive (AND) expression used in addition to ExcludedExpression to refine excluded entities.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of entities targeted by this group (after includes/excludes applied).

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used for assignment rules to include entities into the group (assignment-specific logic).

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used for assignment rules to exclude entities from the group (assignment-specific logic).

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Optional count of other included entities not covered by the primary included quantity (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign configuration record.

columns.name: Y01BeginOn
columns.description: Start date/time for the Year 01 advertising period of the campaign.

columns.name: Y01EndedOn
columns.description: End date/time for the Year 01 advertising period of the campaign.

columns.name: AutoRenewBeginOn
columns.description: Start date/time for automatic renewal processing (if applicable). Nullable when auto-renew is not scheduled.

columns.name: AutoRenewEndedOn
columns.description: End date/time for automatic renewal processing (if applicable). Nullable when auto-renew is not scheduled or indefinite.

columns.name: IncludeRenewable
columns.description: Flag indicating whether renewable items/customers should be included in this campaign configuration.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceWithDisctount
columns.description: Flag indicating if preprinted material pricing should be calculated with discount applied. (Column name preserved as in source.)

columns.name: PreprintedPriceChannel
columns.description: Identifier of the pricing channel used for preprinted materials. Nullable when not applicable.

columns.name: SalesmenDayOffs
columns.description: Number of days off allocated to salesmen for the campaign period. Nullable if not specified.

columns.name: IsCreated
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the campaign configuration record has been created in the system.

columns.name: IsPreprintedTGFirst
columns.description: Flag that controls ordering preference for preprinted take-groups (TG)  whether preprinted TGs are prioritized first.

columns.name: ActiveOnlyBPs
columns.description: Flag indicating whether to restrict operations to active business partners only.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypes
columns.description: Comma- or delimiter-separated list (stored as text) of customer update types to exclude from campaign processing. Nullable when no exclusions are defined.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysis
columns.description: Text list of customer solvency analysis codes or identifiers that should be excluded for this campaign. Nullable when not used.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifierNodes
columns.description: Large text field (possibly a list) containing classifier node identifiers to exclude customers by. Typically used to filter groups of customers out of the campaign.

columns.name: PreprintedContractStates
columns.description: Text list of contract states relevant for preprinted materials; used to include or exclude contracts based on their state. Nullable when not used.

columns.name: PreprintedCPStates
columns.description: Text field listing CP (customer/product) states that apply to preprinted material selection. Nullable when not specified.

columns.name: IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprinted
columns.description: Flag indicating whether products with a zero printed price should be included in preprinted materials.

columns.name: IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprinted
columns.description: Flag controlling whether advertising items that ended in Y01 are included in preprinted materials.

columns.name: WorkingManDays
columns.description: Estimated number of working man-days allocated to execute campaign tasks. Nullable if not estimated.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifiers
columns.description: Text list of customer classifier codes to exclude from the campaign. Larger capacity field for many classifiers.

columns.name: IsReadyToFinalize
columns.description: Flag that indicates whether the campaign configuration is ready to be finalized.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Date/time when the campaign configuration was finalized. Nullable until finalization occurs.

columns.name: AssignmentChannelTypeFromPreviousPeriod
columns.description: Flag specifying whether to carry over assignment channel types from the previous period when creating assignments for this campaign.

columns.name: CampaignTypeID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign type. Part of the composite primary key and foreign key referencing dbo.CampaignType.ID.

columns.name: MediumTypeID
columns.description: Identifier of the medium/type (e.g., channel or media). Part of the composite primary key and foreign key referencing dbo.MediumType.ID.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used in downstream data-mart or dimension mapping. Null for most rows in the sample data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data-mart / dimension table associated with this mapping. Typically used when campaign/medium mapping requires a lookup table.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for mapping to external dimension tables. Nullable and often empty in sample data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key. Unique identifier for each campaign new-customer target record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign this target belongs to. References dbo.Campaign.ID.

columns.name: DailyTargetForSalesman
columns.description: Numeric daily target (new customers) assigned per salesman for the referenced campaign.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key. Unique identifier for each customer rule record.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name for the rule (e.g., period or campaign label). Primary display label for this record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign this rule applies to. References dbo.Campaign.ID.

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Identifier for the communication channel type (e.g., voice, sms). Enumerated integer representing channel classification.

columns.name: CreatorUserID
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the rule. References dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreatedON
columns.description: Timestamp when the rule was created. Useful for sorting and auditing changes.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the rule is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: DialerGroupID
columns.description: Optional reference to a dialer group used for outbound campaigns. References dbo.DialerGroup.ID; nullable when no group assigned.

columns.name: CustomerRegionCount
columns.description: Count of customers matching the rule by region. Aggregated metric used for sizing and planning.

columns.name: CustomerMainActivityCount
columns.description: Count of customers matching the rule by main activity. Aggregated metric used for segmentation.

columns.name: CustomerTotalCount
columns.description: Total number of customers that meet the rule criteria. Overall size of the target set.

columns.name: CustomerIndicatorCount
columns.description: Count of customers matching indicator-based criteria. Metric for specialized filters or flags.

columns.name: CustomerSourceCount
columns.description: Count of customers by source channel for this rule. Small integer used for source-based analysis.

entities.name: Campaign New Loss Customer Rule Customer Indicator

display.display_name: Campaign New Loss Customer Rule  Customer Indicator

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this customer indicator record.

columns.name: RuleID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.CampaignNewLossCustomerRule.ID  identifies the campaign rule this indicator belongs to.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.ClassifierNode.ID  identifies the classifier node associated with this indicator.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the classifier node. Note: current data shows a high null rate for this column.

entities.name: Campaign New Loss Customer Rule Customer Source

display.display_name: Campaign New Loss Customer Rule  Customer Source

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this customer-source mapping record.

columns.name: RuleID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.CampaignNewLossCustomerRule.ID  indicates which campaign rule this source entry is associated with.

columns.name: CustomerSourceID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.CustomerSource.ID  identifies the type or source of the customer for the rule.

columns.name: CustomerSourceName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the customer source. Note: current data shows this column mostly null.

entities.name: Campaign New Loss Customer Rule - Main Activity

display.display_name: Campaign New Loss Customer Rule - Main Activity

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the main activity record linking a classifier node to a campaign rule.

columns.name: RuleID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign rule (dbo.CampaignNewLossCustomerRule.ID) that this activity belongs to.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the classifier node (dbo.ClassifierNode.ID) used to categorize the customer activity.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeName
columns.description: Human readable name of the classifier node (category/segment) associated with this activity; values may be localized (Greek).

entities.name: Campaign New Loss Customer Rule - Salesman

display.display_name: Campaign New Loss Customer Rule - Salesman

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the salesman-to-rule mapping record.

columns.name: RuleID
columns.description: Foreign key linking to the campaign rule (dbo.CampaignNewLossCustomerRule.ID) that the salesman is associated with.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the user/salesman (dbo.User.ID) assigned to this campaign rule.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the campaign organization model record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent Campaign (dbo.Campaign.ID) that this organization model belongs to.

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Self-referencing foreign key to the parent node in this campaign organization model (dbo.CampaignOrgModel.ID). Used to build a hierarchical org tree.

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Role assigned to this organization node (dbo.Role.ID).

columns.name: Level
columns.description: Numeric level or depth of this node within the organization hierarchy (root = 0 or 1 depending on implementation).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the campaign organization person assignment record.

columns.name: CampaignOrgModelID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the organization model node this person is assigned to (dbo.CampaignOrgModel.ID).

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the user/person assigned to the organization role for a campaign (dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Date and time when the person's assignment to the organization role becomes effective.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Date and time when the person's assignment to the organization role ends (if applicable).

columns.name: IsStopped
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the person's assignment has been stopped/terminated (true) or is active (false).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign range record

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key to Campaign.ID - identifies which campaign this range belongs to

columns.name: RangeType
columns.description: Type or category of the range (enumeration/lookup value). Indicates the meaning of the up/down limits

columns.name: RangeUpLimt
columns.description: Upper numeric limit for the range (decimal). Note: original column name contains 'RangeUpLimt'

columns.name: RangeDownLimit
columns.description: Lower numeric limit for the range (decimal)

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human readable description of the campaign range

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used by downstream data-mart or external mapping systems

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data-mart / external table associated with this range (used for mapping/integration)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by downstream systems for mapping or lookups

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign-region mapping row

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key to Campaign.ID - identifies which campaign this regional record belongs to

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Geography model version used for this mapping (foreign key into BroaderAreaLookUp.GeoModelVersion)

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Identifier/code for the broader geographical area (foreign key into BroaderAreaLookUp.BroaderAreaID). Examples: 'CC8', 'E1', 'E34'

columns.name: GeographicalTypeID
columns.description: Code for the geographical type/category (e.g., 'CC', 'E') describing the granularity or classification of the area

columns.name: GeographicalTypeDescription
columns.description: Human readable description of the geographical type or area (e.g., county name or region). This is the primary display label for the record

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the campaign-salesperson assignment row; uniquely identifies the assignment record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Campaign this salesperson is assigned to (dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the salesperson (user) assigned to the campaign (dbo.User.ID). Represents the sales representative.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the record that holds begin/end dates for a salesperson's campaign assignment.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign associated with these begin/end dates (dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the salesperson (user) for this date range (dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: BeginDate
columns.description: The start date when the salesperson's assignment to the campaign becomes effective. Nullable when start is unspecified.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: The end date when the salesperson's assignment to the campaign ends. Nullable if assignment is ongoing or open-ended.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the salesman-new-customer target record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key to the Campaign table (dbo.Campaign.ID). Identifies the campaign associated with this target.

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier for the segment within the campaign (customer segment or market segment).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Foreign key to the User table (dbo.User.ID). Identifies the salesman assigned to this target.

columns.name: DailyTarget
columns.description: Planned daily target quantity or value for new customers for this segment and salesman (decimal).

columns.name: UserDailyTarget
columns.description: Optional user-specific adjusted daily target for the salesman (may be null when not overridden).

columns.name: Target
columns.description: Aggregate target for the period (e.g., campaign period) derived from daily targets (decimal).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign market calendar entry.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key to the Campaign table (dbo.Campaign.ID). The campaign this calendar entry belongs to.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to the User table (dbo.User.ID). If set, this calendar entry applies to a specific salesman; many rows have null when not salesman-specific.

columns.name: CalandarDate
columns.description: Date of the calendar entry (date/time). Indicates scheduled campaign activity or effective date for market planning.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key: unique identifier for the absence record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign associated with this absence (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesperson/user who was absent (foreign key to dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: AbsenceDay
columns.description: Date (and time) of the salesperson's absence for the campaign.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used by downstream data-mart or integration processes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the destination/source table in a data-mart or external system (text).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for integration with external systems or data marts.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer behaviour scoring record.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the customer behaviour scoring category (used as the label).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount associated with this behaviour score. Stored as DECIMAL(18,3); currency hint USD.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Integer code representing the behaviour type or classification for the score.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate integer primary key that uniquely identifies a main activity score group.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the activity score group (e.g., Low, Medium, High, Top).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount associated with the activity score group, stored in USD (DECIMAL(18,3)).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique integer identifier for a max-investment medium entry.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the investment medium or channel (e.g., Print, Websites, PPC, XO.gr).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Maximum investment amount for the medium, stored as a decimal in USD (DECIMAL(18,3)).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the medium combination entry.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code representing the medium type or combination category (may be used as an enum or bitmask).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name or label for the medium combination (e.g., 'Print', 'Website', 'PPC+Print').

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary score or amount associated with this medium combination. Values are stored in USD with three decimal places.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product combination entry.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Descriptive name of the product combination (e.g., 'Profile+Banners', 'BASICS 1-2').

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary score or amount associated with this product combination. Values are stored in USD with three decimal places.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the salesman-management campaign score record.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name or title of the campaign score entry (Greek values present).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary value associated with this campaign score entry (stored as DECIMAL). Currency hint: USD.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Integer code representing the category or type of this score (enumeration of possible score types).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the seniority-based campaign score record.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Reference to the classifier node that this seniority score applies to. Foreign key to dbo.ClassifierNode.ID.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount assigned to the seniority classifier node for scoring purposes (DECIMAL). Currency hint: USD.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the billing range used to determine campaign score values.

columns.name: FromPrice
columns.description: Lower bound price (inclusive) for this billing range. Currency: USD.

columns.name: ToPrice
columns.description: Upper bound price (exclusive) for this billing range. Currency: USD.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount or score associated with this billing range. Currency: USD.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign segment.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign this segment belongs to. Foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the campaign segment.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Date and time when the segment becomes active.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Date and time when the segment is no longer active.

columns.name: WorkingDays
columns.description: Number of working days applicable for the segment period.

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Filter or expression that defines which records are included in the segment.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items/records included as a result of the include expression.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Filter or expression that defines which records are excluded from the segment.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items/records excluded as a result of the exclude expression.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the segment record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the segment was last initialized or processed.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the segment was finalized and no longer editable.

columns.name: AssignmentSalesmanSupervisorFromPreviousPeriod
columns.description: Flag indicating whether salesman/supervisor assignments should carry over from the previous period.

columns.name: SplitSalesmanSegment
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the segment should be split across salesmen.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND expression applied to include logic for more granular filtering.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND expression applied to exclude logic for more granular filtering.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total quantity or count relevant to the segment (aggregate of included items).

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Numeric code representing the current status of the segment (e.g., draft, active, archived).

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to include assignments (e.g., salesperson assignment rules) when building the segment.

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to exclude assignments when building the segment.

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Optional count of additional included items not captured by the primary include quantity.

columns.name: SubStatus
columns.description: Secondary status code that provides more granular state information for the segment.

columns.name: SecondIncludedQuantity
columns.description: Secondary included quantity used for additional inclusion logic.

columns.name: SecondExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Secondary excluded quantity used for additional exclusion logic.

columns.name: SecondExcludedExpression
columns.description: Secondary expression defining additional exclusion criteria for the segment.

columns.name: SecondIncludeExpression
columns.description: Secondary expression defining additional inclusion criteria for the segment.

columns.name: SecondTotalQuantity
columns.description: Secondary total quantity used for alternative counting or reporting of the segment.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the campaign segment status record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign this segment status belongs to. Foreign key referencing dbo.Campaign.ID.

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier of the audience or customer segment within the campaign.

columns.name: SegmentStatusID
columns.description: Lookup identifier representing the status/state of the segment in the campaign (e.g., active, inactive).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the campaign system criteria record (single-row configuration table).

columns.name: ActiveOnlyBPs
columns.description: Flag indicating whether only active business partners (BPs) should be included in campaign selection. Nullable.

columns.name: ActiveOnlyBPsIsActive
columns.description: Control flag indicating whether the ActiveOnlyBPs criterion is currently enforced.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypes
columns.description: Comma- or delimited list of customer update types to exclude from campaigns. Stored as text; may be empty.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypesIsActive
columns.description: Control flag indicating whether the ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypes rule is active.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysis
columns.description: Text field listing solvency analysis categories to exclude from selection. May be empty.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysisIsActive
columns.description: Control flag indicating whether the ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysis rule is applied.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifierNodes
columns.description: Large text field containing classifier node identifiers to exclude from campaign targeting.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifierNodesIsActive
columns.description: Control flag indicating whether classifier node exclusions are active.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifiers
columns.description: Text list of customer classifiers (categories) that should be excluded from campaign audiences.

columns.name: PreprintedContractStates
columns.description: Text listing contract states that qualify as 'preprinted' for campaign rules; used in filtering.

columns.name: PreprintedContractStatesIsActive
columns.description: Control flag that enables or disables the PreprintedContractStates rule.

columns.name: PreprintedCPStates
columns.description: Text list of CP (customer/product) states treated as preprinted for selection rules.

columns.name: PreprintedCPStatesIsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether PreprintedCPStates exclusions are enforced.

columns.name: IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprinted
columns.description: Flag to include products with zero print price when evaluating preprinted product criteria. Nullable.

columns.name: IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprintedIsActive
columns.description: Control flag indicating whether the IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprinted rule is active.

columns.name: IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprinted
columns.description: Flag indicating whether advertisements ended on year 01 should be included in preprinted criteria. Nullable.

columns.name: IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprintedIsActive
columns.description: Control flag that determines if the IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprinted option is enforced.

columns.name: IncludeRenewable
columns.description: Flag indicating whether renewable contracts should be included in campaign targeting. Nullable.

columns.name: IncludeRenewableIsActive
columns.description: Control flag indicating whether the IncludeRenewable criterion is active.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceWithDisctount
columns.description: Flag indicating whether preprinted pricing calculations should include discounted prices. Nullable.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceWithDisctountIsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the PreprintedPriceWithDisctount setting is currently enforced.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign target group record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign this target group belongs to (likely references Campaign.ID).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Logical expression or rule used to include members in this target group.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items or members matched by the include expression.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Logical expression or rule used to exclude members from this target group.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items or members matched by the exclude expression.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this target group record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the target group was last initialized or refreshed.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the target group was finalized for use (no further changes).

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of members/items in the target group after inclusion/exclusion are applied.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND-style exclusion expression combined with ExcludedExpression for finer filtering.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND-style inclusion expression combined with IncludeExpression for finer filtering.

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to assign members to includes (note: column name contains spelling 'Assigment').

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to assign members to excludes (note: column name contains spelling 'Assigment').

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the campaign type (e.g., Internet, Mobile).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for downstream data-model mapping; often null in sample data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data model table associated with this campaign type; often null in sample data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data-model joins or codes; often null in sample data.

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Reference to the parent campaign (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.description: Date and time when the UDF was finalized (no further changes expected).

columns.description: Optional combined AND expression used with IncludeExpression to refine inclusion criteria.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Optional combined AND expression used with ExcludedExpression to refine exclusion criteria.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of records evaluated for this UDF (including included and excluded).

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Count of records included by other complementary criteria or supplemental inclusion logic.

columns.description: Additional AND-style exclude expression applied in combination with ExcludedExpression to refine excluded records.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of items/contacts evaluated or considered for this UDF (after applying include/exclude logic as appropriate).

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Number of additional items/contacts included by other (non-primary) rules or fallback logic related to this UDF.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this campaign string user-defined field record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent campaign (dbo.Campaign.ID). Links this UDF entry to a specific campaign.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Friendly name of the user-defined string field (human readable label).

columns.name: ValueExpression
columns.description: Expression (often SQL or tokenized string) that defines how the field value is computed or sourced.

columns.name: ValueExpressionText
columns.description: Textual form of the value expression intended for display or review (human-readable form of ValueExpression).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Optional expression defining inclusion criteria for this UDF (which records to include). Nullable.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Count of items/records that matched the IncludeExpression at the time of calculation (number included).

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Optional expression defining exclusion criteria for this UDF (which records to exclude). Nullable.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Count of items/records that matched the ExcludedExpression at the time of calculation (number excluded).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this UDF record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this UDF was last initialized or seeded. Nullable.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this UDF was finalized (no further changes expected). Nullable.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Optional 'AND' style inclusion expression combined with other include logic. Nullable.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Optional 'AND' style exclusion expression combined with other exclude logic. Nullable.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of records considered for this UDF (typically IncludedQuantity + ExcludedQuantity + others).

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Optional count of additional records included by other rules or sources beyond the primary IncludeExpression. Nullable.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: LookupType

columns.name: Stage
columns.description: Processing stage or pipeline level associated with this lookup (e.g., 2 indicates stage 2).
