columns.name: DiscountIsFixedAmount
columns.description: Indicates whether MaxDiscount is a fixed monetary amount (true) or a percentage (false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for integration with a data-mart or external mapping table (mostly null in sample).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external table used for data-mart or ETL mapping (mostly null in sample).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for integration with external systems or data-mart (mostly null in sample).

columns.name: ForwardFromContractChange
columns.description: Flag indicating if items should be forwarded when a contract change occurs for this role.

columns.name: ForwardInternalProduct
columns.description: Flag that controls forwarding behavior for internal products for this role.

columns.name: ForwardTicketType
columns.description: Flag that controls whether ticket types are forwarded for this role.

columns.name: LoginUrl
columns.description: Optional URL used to direct users with this role to a custom login or application page (often contains a user placeholder).

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing the parent/parent-role (hierarchical role relationship).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the role is active and available for assignment.

columns.name: InboxViewType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the default inbox view type for users assigned this role (enumeration stored as integer).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the rule condition definition.

columns.name: RuleDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent rule definition that owns this condition.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Short programmatic name or identifier for the condition (suitable as a label).

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-readable description or display text for the condition (may be localized).

columns.name: ColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the SQL column that this condition applies to (links to SQLColumn table).

columns.name: ConditionType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type of condition or operator (enumerated integer describing comparison type).

columns.name: LookupTableID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to a lookup table/object used by this condition (references SQLObject), null when not used.

columns.name: FromDefaultValue
columns.description: Optional default 'from' value for ranged or from/to conditions (text representation).

columns.name: ToDefaultValue
columns.description: Optional default 'to' value for ranged conditions (text representation).

columns.name: ConditionCategory
columns.description: Optional numeric category for grouping or classifying conditions (nullable enumerated value).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the join record that links a rule condition definition to its operand columns.

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the RuleConditionDefinition table; identifies which rule condition this join belongs to.

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing a SQL column used as the left-hand side of the condition (links to dbo.SQLColumn.ID).

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing a SQL column or operand used as the right-hand side of the condition (links to dbo.SQLColumn.ID).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the operand (operator) used in rule conditions.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Canonical (machine-friendly) name of the operand, e.g., EQUALS, IN, NOT EQUALS; used in rule definitions.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-readable, localized display text for the operand (often shown in the UI). Sample data contains Greek-language labels.

columns.name: OperandAsSQL
columns.description: Numeric code that maps this operand to an internal SQL representation or expression used when building queries.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the rule definition.

columns.name: RuleType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type/category of the rule (system-defined type).

columns.name: SourceObjectID
columns.description: Reference to the source object (foreign key to dbo.SQLObject.ID) that this rule applies to.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Short, humanreadable name/code for the rule definition.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Descriptive text or label for the rule (often localized text shown to users).

columns.name: RuleDefinitionCategory
columns.description: Numeric category identifier grouping this rule definition with similar definitions.

columns.name: RuleEditor
columns.description: Identifier for the editor or tool used to create/modify the rule (application-specific code).

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Optional textual expression or formula defining the rule logic (may be null when not used).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the master rule entry.

columns.name: RuleCategory
columns.description: Numeric code representing the high-level category of this master rule.

columns.name: RuleContextEntityID
columns.description: Identifier for the context entity (business object or entity) where this rule is applied.

columns.name: RuleDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the rule definition (foreign key to dbo.RuleDefinition.ID) that this master rule implements.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or key for the master rule used for identification and lookup.

columns.name: Expression
columns.description: The expression, formula or value used by the master rule (human-readable or executable text).

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Numeric quantity associated with the rule (usage depends on business logic).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Optional reference to a SQL command (foreign key to dbo.SQLCommand.ID) used by this rule; nullable when no command is used.

columns.name: State
columns.description: Numeric status/state code indicating whether the rule is active, inactive, draft, etc.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Unique sequence code that identifies a generator entry.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the sequence generator purpose or usage.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Current numeric sequence value or increment pointer for this generator.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key referencing a related data model or business entity (context-specific).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data model table associated with this sequence (context for DMKey).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for linking to a data model entity (text-based external key).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for this column metadata record.

columns.name: SQLObjectID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent SQL object (dbo.SQLObject.ID) that owns this column.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: The defined name of the column within the SQL object (used as the primary human-readable identifier).

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Display text or alternate label for the column; often mirrors Name but can be a friendly label.

columns.name: ColumnType
columns.description: Declared SQL data type for the column (for example: INT, NVARCHAR).

columns.name: Length
columns.description: Defined maximum length or size for the column (applies to character or binary types).

columns.name: UserDataType
columns.description: User-specified data type details or constraints (examples: NOT NULL, user-defined type notes).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the SQL command record.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name of the SQL command.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short descriptive text explaining the purpose or behavior of the SQL command.

columns.name: CommandType
columns.description: Categorical code describing the type of command (for example select, update, procedure).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this SQL command record was created.

columns.name: CommandCategory
columns.description: Category code used to group related SQL commands (business grouping or functional area).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing SQL Command.ID; identifies which SQL command the text belongs to.

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: The full free-form SQL statement or script text associated with the referenced SQL command.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the job history record.

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: GUID that groups related job history entries into the same batch or execution run.

columns.name: TimeStamp
columns.description: Date and time when this history event was recorded.

columns.name: RowsAffected
columns.description: Number of rows affected by the operation for this step. Null if not applicable or not recorded.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-readable message or description of the job step (for example 'Begin UpdateCustomerSolvency' or 'Finished UpdateCustomerSolvency').

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Numeric status code representing the outcome/state of the job step (for example 1 = success).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type/category of the history entry (e.g., step type or message type).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the SQL object.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: System name of the object (technical identifier), used to reference the object in code or queries.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-friendly description or display text for the object (readable label shown in UIs).

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Numeric code identifying the object type/category (for example, 0, 2, etc.).

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Short alias or abbreviated identifier for the object, used in compact displays or internal references.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the join condition record; unique identifier.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Reference to the parent SQL command (dbo.SQLCommand.ID) that this join condition belongs to.

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Human-readable or free-form SQL fragment representing the join condition (e.g. ON ... expressions).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for an individual join condition rule.

columns.name: SQLJoinConditionID
columns.description: Reference to the parent join condition (dbo.SQLJoinCondition.ID) that groups this rule.

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Reference to the left-side column involved in the rule (dbo.SQLColumn.ID).

columns.name: LeftObjectAlias
columns.description: Optional alias/name used for the left table/object in the SQL expression (e.g. t1).

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Reference to the right-side column involved in the rule (dbo.SQLColumn.ID).

columns.name: RightObjectAlias
columns.description: Optional alias/name used for the right table/object in the SQL expression (e.g. t2).

columns.name: OperandExpression
columns.description: The operand/operator expression used to compare left and right columns (e.g. '=', '<>', 'LIKE').

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the SQL search condition record.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Reference to the parent SQL command (foreign key to dbo.SQLCommand.ID).

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL snippet or expression used for the condition (e.g., custom WHERE clause fragment).

columns.name: PlaceHolderName
columns.description: Name of the parameter or placeholder used within the FreeSQLText or the generated SQL (human-readable identifier).

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional short alias or display name for this search condition to be shown in UIs or logs.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the individual search condition rule.

columns.name: SQLSearchConditionID
columns.description: Foreign key linking this rule to its parent SQL search condition (dbo.SQLSearchCondition.ID).

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Reference to the left-hand column for the rule (foreign key to dbo.SQLColumn.ID).

columns.name: LeftObjectAlias
columns.description: Optional object/table alias used on the left side of the expression (helps build fully-qualified column reference).

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Reference to the right-hand column for the rule, if the rule compares two columns (foreign key to dbo.SQLColumn.ID). Nullable when the right side is a literal value.

columns.name: RightObjectAlias
columns.description: Optional object/table alias used on the right side of the expression (used when comparing columns across aliases).

columns.name: OperandExpression
columns.description: Operator or expression that defines the relationship between left and right (e.g., '=', '>', 'LIKE', 'IN', 'BETWEEN'). This is the most human-readable descriptor of the rule.

columns.name: WhearSearchValue
columns.description: Search literal or parameter value used on the right side of the rule when comparing against a constant (may contain an expression or parameter placeholder). Note: column name contains a typographical variant 'Whear'.

columns.name: WhereSearchValueForBetween
columns.description: Two-part value or range used specifically for BETWEEN operations (start and end values, often encoded or delimited).

columns.name: SQLSelctStatementID
columns.description: Identifier of the select statement this list entry belongs to. Primary key for this association and foreign key referencing dbo.SQLSelectStatement(SQLCommandID).

columns.name: ColumnID
columns.description: Identifier of the column included in the select list. Primary key for this association and foreign key referencing dbo.SQLColumn(ID).

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional alias assigned to the column in the SELECT clause (the name shown in result set).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this SQL select command. Primary key for the table and foreign key referencing dbo.SQLCommand(ID).

columns.name: RowsToFetch
columns.description: Optional limit for the number of rows to return when executing the select (e.g., TOP or LIMIT equivalent).

columns.name: SelectDistinct
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the SELECT uses DISTINCT to remove duplicate rows.

columns.name: IsCountSelect
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the SELECT is intended to return a COUNT(*) rather than full row results.

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL expression or override text for the select statement (can contain the raw SQL used or a custom expression).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Identifier of the SQL command that references this table source. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key to dbo.SQLCommand.ID.

columns.name: ObjectID
columns.description: Identifier of the referenced SQL object (e.g., table or view). Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key to dbo.SQLObject.ID.

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional alias used for the table source within the SQL command (the AS name). This is the most human-friendly identifier for the source.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Identifier of the SQL command associated with this UPDATE statement. Acts as the primary key and references dbo.SQLCommand.ID.

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form text containing the UPDATE statement or related SQL fragment. Useful for display and text search of the statement.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the target setting record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the related campaign (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: Budget
columns.description: Monetary budget allocated to this target setting (decimal with three fractional digits).

columns.name: PenetrationChangeDownLimit
columns.description: Lower limit for allowable penetration change (percentage or absolute units depending on business logic). Nullable when no limit is set.

columns.name: PenetrationChangeUpperLimit
columns.description: Upper limit for allowable penetration change (percentage or absolute units depending on business logic). Nullable when no limit is set.

columns.name: AvoChangeDownLimit
columns.description: Lower bound for allowable change in AVO (average value metric). Nullable when not specified.

columns.name: AvoChangeUpLimit
columns.description: Upper bound for allowable change in AVO (average value metric). Nullable when not specified.

columns.name: RocoDownLimit
columns.description: Lower limit for ROCO (return on campaign) metric. Nullable when no constraint is applied.

columns.name: RocoUpLimit
columns.description: Upper limit for ROCO (return on campaign) metric. Nullable when no constraint is applied.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Free-text comments or notes about the target setting. Often used for human-readable explanation; high null rate.

columns.name: OnSite
columns.description: Indicator whether the target setting applies to on-site channels (True/False).

columns.name: OffSite
columns.description: Indicator whether the target setting applies to off-site channels (True/False).

columns.name: DMKey

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Reference to the source task type (nullable). Foreign key to dbo.TaskType.ID when present.

columns.name: TargetTaskTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the target task type (destination). Foreign key to dbo.TaskType.ID.

columns.name: Condition
columns.description: Serialized rule or condition that determines when the transition applies (often an XML/XAML expression). High variety of expressions and many nulls.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional dimension table name used for mapping or ETL. Rarely populated.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based dimension key used for mapping. Not populated in the sample.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this transition is the default path when multiple transitions exist. Nullable.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Version number for the transition definition, useful for concurrency or change tracking.

columns.name: Options
columns.description: Free-form options or configuration for the transition (stored as text). Very high null rate in sample data.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: EditorType
columns.description: Assembly-qualified editor view model type used to render or edit this task type in the client UI.

columns.name: Outcomes
columns.description: Comma-separated list or description of possible outcomes for the task (e.g., success/failure) or 'None'.

columns.name: Code

columns.name: ActivityType

columns.name: TargetCaseTypeID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to a CaseType created or targeted by this task (when task spawns or links to another case).

columns.name: Options
columns.description: Optional serialized options or configuration for the task type (may contain JSON or key/value pairs).

columns.description: Optional character/string data-mapping key for linking to external systems.

columns.name: IsActive

columns.name: OutcomeExpression
columns.description: Optional expression used to compute or map the outcome of the task type.

columns.name: Renderings

columns.name: InVariableExpressions

columns.name: OutVariableExpressions
columns.description: Optional expressions describing output variable mappings for the task type.

columns.name: MultiInstance
columns.description: Optional flag indicating whether multiple instances of this task can run concurrently.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Integer version number for the task type definition (used for compatibility and migrations).

columns.name: RoleID

columns.name: AssignmentType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the assignment mode or strategy (e.g., role-based, user-based, queue).

columns.name: TaskTypeID

columns.name: SpecialType

columns.name: Options

columns.description: External/data-mart integer key used for integration. Column is nullable and currently empty in sample data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of external/data-mart table related to this ticket type. Nullable and often not populated.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: External/data-mart character key for integration. Nullable in this dataset.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the ticket type is active and available for new tickets.

columns.name: SecretarySupervisorByPass
columns.description: Flag that allows a secretary role to bypass supervisor approval for this ticket type.

columns.name: IsEditContractType
columns.description: Flag indicating whether contract type can be edited for this ticket type.

columns.name: IsEditAdvertisementType
columns.description: Flag indicating whether advertisement type can be edited for this ticket type.

columns.name: WebProductType
columns.description: Integer code linking this ticket type to a web product category. Nullable and sparsely populated.

columns.name: CanSellWebChanges
columns.description: Flag indicating whether web-related changes for this ticket type can be sold/charged.

columns.name: IsCampaignLeadIdEditable
columns.description: Nullable flag that indicates whether the campaign lead ID is editable for this ticket type.

columns.name: TicketTypeID
columns.description: Identifier of the ticket type. Part of the composite primary key; also a foreign key referencing dbo.TicketType.ID.

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Identifier of the role assigned to the ticket type. Part of the composite primary key; foreign key referencing dbo.Role.ID.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Sequence/order number indicating the role's position or priority in the workflow for the ticket type.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: External/data-mart integer key for integrations. Nullable and not populated in samples.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: External/data-mart table name used for integration mapping. Nullable in this table.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: External/data-mart character key used for integration mapping. Nullable in this table.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate numeric identifier for the log record (unique).

columns.name: EventGroup
columns.description: GUID that groups together related log entries for the same job or process.

columns.name: EventDate
columns.description: Date and time when the logged event occurred.

columns.name: Descr
columns.description: Human-readable description or message for the logged event; used as the primary display label for the record.

columns.name: RowCountVal
columns.description: Number of rows affected or processed by the operation recorded in this log entry.

columns.name: DataSize
columns.description: Size of the data (in bytes) associated with the logged operation or batch.

columns.name: LogSize
columns.description: Size (in bytes) of the database log or other log artifact at the time of the event.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the archived log group record (unique).

columns.name: EventGroup
columns.description: GUID that groups the archived log rows belonging to the same job or process.

columns.name: EventDate
columns.description: Date and time when the archived event group started or was recorded.

columns.name: Descr
columns.description: Short description or title for the archived event group; used as the human-friendly label.

columns.name: StartID
columns.description: ID of the first TimeLogger row included in this archived group (reference range start).

columns.name: EndID
columns.description: ID of the last TimeLogger row included in this archived group (reference range end).

columns.name: Recs
columns.description: Number of individual log rows archived in this event group.

columns.name: XmlData
columns.description: XML payload containing the individual log rows and details (full archived content for the group).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the Udac (product) record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or SKU for the Udac (often Greek characters present). Useful for display and lookup.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name of the Udac (product or offering). Primary label for records.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Long description or notes about the Udac. Nullable.

columns.name: IsComposite
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this Udac is a composite (composed of multiple parts).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the Udac record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account or username that created the record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the last modification to the record. Nullable if never modified after create.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account or username that last modified the record. Nullable.

columns.name: ProductTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key to ProductType table. Represents classification of product (nullable).

columns.name: DiscountPolicyID
columns.description: Foreign key to UdacDiscountPolicy. Policy that governs discounts for this Udac (nullable).

columns.name: MinMembers
columns.description: Minimum number of members allowed/required for this Udac (nullable).

columns.name: MaxMembers
columns.description: Maximum number of members allowed for this Udac (nullable).

columns.name: TargetValueType
columns.description: Type code indicating how target values are interpreted for this Udac (nullable).

columns.name: TargetValueID
columns.description: Foreign key to UdacPart (or similar) identifying the target value entity (nullable).

columns.name: HasOptionalMembers
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Udac supports optional members.

columns.name: IsDependent
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this Udac depends on another Udac or context.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag: true when the Udac has been marked as deleted.

columns.name: UdacType
columns.description: Numeric code categorizing the Udac type. Not nullable.

columns.name: NewUdacID
columns.description: Reference to another Udac used as a replacement or linked Udac (nullable).

columns.name: CanvasPlanningGroupID
columns.description: Foreign key to CanvasPlanningGroup. Associates Udac with a planning group (nullable).

columns.name: OldUdacCode
columns.description: Legacy or previous code for the Udac (nullable).

columns.name: Characterization
columns.description: Numeric code used for further characterization or tagging of the Udac (nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional key used for data mart / BI integration (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of related data mart table for BI integrations (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for data mart integration (nullable).

columns.name: LineEditorEnabled
columns.description: Flag indicating if the line editor UI is enabled for this Udac.

columns.name: MaxAllowedChanges
columns.description: Maximum allowed number of changes for the Udac (0 means no changes allowed).

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag controlling whether validation rules are applied to this Udac.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag controlling whether keyphrase creation is enabled for this Udac.

columns.name: HasPriceRanges
columns.description: Flag indicating whether price ranges exist for this Udac.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Category code grouping this Udac into a high-level category.

columns.name: ProdWorkflowID
columns.description: Foreign key to ProductionWorkflow that governs production steps for this Udac (nullable).

columns.name: Deadline
columns.description: Numeric deadline or time-to-completion indicator (units depend on system).

columns.name: IsAddOn
columns.description: Indicator (0/1) whether the Udac is an add-on product.

columns.name: IsBudgetAmountExcluded
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this Udac's amount should be excluded from budgets.

columns.name: NewSubscriptionUdacId
columns.description: Reference to a Udac used for new subscriptions (nullable).

columns.name: CanBeSubscribed
columns.description: Flag indicating whether customers can subscribe to this Udac.

columns.name: IsDirProduct
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this Udac is a direct product (business-specific meaning).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the content attribute definition.

columns.name: UdacPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key to UdacPartDefinition: identifies which part definition this attribute belongs to.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the attribute (e.g., 'Description', 'Customer Name'). Primary label for attribute definitions.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Integer code indicating the data type of the attribute (e.g., text, number, lookup).

columns.name: IsRequired
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this attribute is required for the Udac part.

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: Default value assigned to the attribute when none is provided (nullable).

columns.name: MinValue
columns.description: Minimum numeric value allowed for the attribute (nullable).

columns.name: MaxValue
columns.description: Maximum numeric value allowed for the attribute (nullable).

columns.name: IsReadonly
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the attribute is read-only in the UI.

columns.name: VisibilityMask
columns.description: 4-character mask that encodes visibility rules for different UI contexts.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data mart key used for BI / data warehouse integration (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional data mart table name used for integration (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key (string) for data mart integration (nullable).

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Numeric order used to determine position of this attribute in forms or UI.

columns.name: MaxLength
columns.description: Maximum number of characters allowed for this attribute (0 means no limit or not applicable).

columns.name: LookupTableName
columns.description: Name of a lookup table used to populate values for this attribute (nullable).

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag controlling whether validation rules are enforced for this attribute.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag controlling whether keyphrase creation is allowed for this attribute.

columns.name: LookupFiltered
columns.description: Filter expression or reference used to restrict lookup values for this attribute (nullable).

columns.name: DDLLookupFiltered
columns.description: Filter expression for drop-down list lookups specifically (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the discount policy.

columns.name: Decription
columns.description: Text description of the discount policy (note: column name is 'Decription' in the source).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount policy is currently active (true = active, false = inactive).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for integrating or mapping to an external data model.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external or upstream table used for data mapping or lineage.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used for mapping to an external data model or system.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the discount policy item (line item within a discount policy).

columns.name: DiscountPolicyID
columns.description: Reference to the parent Discount Policy (UdacDiscountPolicy.ID).

columns.name: RangeDownLimit
columns.description: Lower bound of the range (inclusive) to which this discount item applies; null if not range-based.

columns.name: RangeUpLimit
columns.description: Upper bound of the range (inclusive) to which this discount item applies; null if not range-based.

columns.name: EnableLimit
columns.description: Indicator or threshold controlling whether range limits are enforced for this item (implementation-specific integer flag).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed monetary amount to apply as the discount for this item (currency; stored as DECIMAL).

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage discount to apply for this item (stored as integer percent value).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for mapping this item to an external data model or system identifier.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external table name associated with the DMKey/DMCharKey used for data mapping or lineage.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used to map this item to an external data model or key value.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the export template record; also a foreign key reference to dbo.Udac.ID (identifies the UDAC this template belongs to).

columns.name: Template
columns.description: Template content stored as XML (Windows-1253 encoding in samples). Contains printed-field definitions, UdacCode and layout instructions used for exporting/printing UDAC entries.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for data-mart integration or external mapping. Often null when not integrated with a DM system.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data-mart or external table that this template is mapped to. Samples show a Greek collation and may be null when no mapping exists.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external system integration (text-based identifier). Typically null unless a char-based mapping is present.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the UdacKit row (primary key). Each row represents a member entry in a UDAC kit/bundle.

columns.name: KitID
columns.description: Identifier of the kit (references dbo.Udac.ID). Represents the parent UDAC that forms the kit or bundle.

columns.name: MemberID
columns.description: Identifier of the member UDAC in the kit (references dbo.Udac.ID). Defines which UDAC item is included in the kit.

columns.name: IsMandatory
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the member UDAC is mandatory in the kit (true) or optional (false).

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Optional reference to dbo.VersionSection.ID. Associates this kit-member relationship with a specific version/section context when present.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for external data-mart mapping; frequently null when no DM integration is configured.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external/data-mart table name used for mapping this kit entry. Many rows show 'DPSSBundleUdac' or are null when unmapped.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for textual mapping to external systems; usually null when not used.

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Integer specifying the order in which kit members should be filled or presented. Lower numbers indicate earlier positions.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the UDAC part definition. Unique integer identifier for each part definition record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code for the UDAC part. Values are stored in Greek collation and used as a compact human or system code.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name/title of the UDAC part. Typically in Greek and used as the primary label for the part definition.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer textual description of the UDAC part. Provides more context about the part's purpose or characteristics.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this part definition record was created in the system.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the record. For migrated data this may contain a migration marker.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was last modified. May be null if the record has not been modified since creation.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the record. May be null for records that have never been modified.

columns.name: SingleAppearance
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this part definition is intended to appear only once (single appearance) or can appear multiple times.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: External numeric key used by the downstream/data-model (DM) system to reference this part definition. Often used to join to DM tables.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-model table that the DMKey references (e.g. DPSBasicUdac). Useful for locating the source DM dataset.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional external character key from the data model. May be null when a numeric DMKey is used instead.

columns.name: EditorType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the editor type or UI mode used for this part definition (system-specific enumeration).

columns.name: UdacID
columns.description: Identifier for the UDAC (part or product) associated with the role. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key reference to dbo.Udac.ID.

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Identifier of the role assigned to the UDAC/product. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key reference to dbo.Role.ID.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional external numeric key from the data-model; currently all values appear to be null in the sample set.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-model table associated with this mapping. May be null for many rows; used to indicate the DM source when populated.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional external character key from the data model. Sample data shows this column is typically empty for these mappings.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the UDAC relationship record.

columns.name: SourceUdacID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the source UDAC (dbo.Udac.ID). Identifies the originating UDAC in the relationship.

columns.name: TargetUdacID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the target UDAC (dbo.Udac.ID). Identifies the target UDAC in the relationship.

columns.name: RelationshipType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type of relationship between SourceUdac and TargetUdac. (Single value observed in sample data).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the relationship is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: InsertionDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the relationship record was created/inserted into the system.

columns.name: DeactivationDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the relationship was deactivated. Null if the relationship is still active.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the unit.

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Optional reference to a parent entity. Used for hierarchical relationships; references other records (many references point to CanvasPlanningHistory in metadata).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the unit. Contains localized text (examples in Greek present in sample values).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the unit record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Identifier or name of the user or process that created the unit (e.g., 'DataMigration').

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the unit record was last modified. Null if never modified after creation.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Identifier or name of the user who last modified the record. Null if never modified after creation.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the unit is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing channel type (dbo.ChannelType.ID). Indicates the channel classification for the unit.

columns.name: LeftIndex
columns.description: Left index value used for nested-set tree representation of hierarchical units.

columns.name: RightIndex
columns.description: Right index value used for nested-set tree representation of hierarchical units.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key used by migration or ETL processes to link to legacy/data-migration records.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or staging table used during data migration (example values: 'DataMigration', '#units').

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used in data migration scenarios. Often null in current data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary numeric identifier for the user record.

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: User account name / login identifier shown in user interfaces.

columns.name: Password
columns.description: Hashed password for the user account (sensitive). Stored as a hashed string, not plain text.

columns.name: FirstName
columns.description: User's given (first) name.

columns.name: LastName
columns.description: User's family (last) name.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the user record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Account or user who created this record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the user record was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Account or user who last modified this record.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the user account is active (True) or disabled (False).

columns.name: UnitID
columns.description: Identifier of the organizational unit or unit record this user belongs to. Acts as a foreign key to unit / planning tables (e.g., CanvasPlanningHistory).

columns.name: SalesCode
columns.description: Code representing the sales assignment or sales representative identifier for this user (may be null).

columns.name: IsUnitManager
columns.description: Flag indicating if the user is a manager of the assigned unit.

columns.name: SalesTeleCode
columns.description: Optional short code for tele-sales mapping; often empty in the dataset.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Free-text comments or notes related to the user.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional external data-management integer key used by integration or migration processes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external table used by data-management/integration processes (if present).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional external character key used by integration or migration processes.

columns.name: StopSales
columns.description: Flag indicating whether sales are stopped for this user (business-specific meaning).

columns.name: Phone
columns.description: User's phone number (may be null or empty).

columns.name: Email
columns.description: User's email address used for notifications and login recovery (may be null).

columns.name: IsPaused
columns.description: Business flag indicating whether the user is temporarily paused (e.g., inactive for tasks).

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Identifier of the user. Part of the composite primary key. Also functions as a foreign key to dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Identifier of the role assigned to the user. Part of the composite primary key. Also a foreign key to dbo.Role.ID.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional external integer key used by data-management or integration processes (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional reference to the external table name used by data-management/integration processes.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by data-management/integration processes (typically empty).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the saved user search criteria.

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Reference to the user who created or owns this saved search criteria (foreign key to dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: User-provided name or brief description of the saved search criteria. Shown as the primary human-readable label.

columns.name: CriteriaType
columns.description: Numeric code classifying the type or category of criteria; application-specific meaning.

columns.name: CriteriaData
columns.description: XML payload that contains the detailed, structured definition of the search criteria (filters, fields, values).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key referencing a dimension or lookup table entry relevant to this criteria.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the dimension or lookup table associated with DMKey (used to resolve DMKey to a human-readable value).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used for lookups in the referenced dimension table (alternate to DMKey).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the VAT category.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code representing the VAT classification used by the application or tax reference.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the VAT category (often localized, sample values shown in Greek).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking this VAT category to a dimension or lookup table (e.g., VAT regimes).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the dimension or lookup table associated with DMKey (for example 'GL04D_VatRegimes').

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key for dimension lookup; currently not populated in sample data.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this VAT category is active and available for selection.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the version group item.

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Reference to the parent Version Group Item (self-referential). Nullable when the item has no parent.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description or title of the group item (primary display label). Contains localized (Greek) text.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code specifying the type/category of the group item.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to the MediumVersion table identifying which medium/version this group item belongs to.

columns.name: SourceGroupItemID
columns.description: Reference to the original/source VersionGroupItem from which this item was derived. Nullable when no source exists.

columns.name: SourceHeadingID
columns.description: Reference to a MasterHeading entry associated with this group item (links to source heading). Nullable.

columns.name: SourceGeoID
columns.description: Reference to a MasterGeoAreaGroup entry if this group item is specific to a geographic area. Nullable for non-geographic items.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data warehouse / dimensional model numeric key associated with this item for analytics mapping. May be null when not mapped.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the dimensional/data model table that DMKey references (e.g., GroupHeading, SuperHeading).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string key used in the dimensional model for mapping (alternative to DMKey). Nullable.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the group item is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: DescriptionCIAI
columns.description: Alternate normalized description (case/insensitive, accent-insensitive collation) used for matching and searches. Mirrors Description content with a different collation.

columns.name: RootID
columns.description: Identifier for the root/top-level group for this item. Used to quickly identify which top-level grouping the item belongs to.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the version section.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or identifier for the section (may be alphanumeric). Nullable when not assigned.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the version section (primary display label). Often localized (Greek) text.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer description of the section; may provide contextual or explanatory text.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the section record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Name of the user or process that created the section record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to the section record. Nullable if never modified after creation.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Name of the user or process that last modified the section record. Nullable if never modified.

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Reference to the parent VersionSection (self-referential) for hierarchical sectioning. Nullable for top-level sections.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Sequence or sort order number used to order sections within a parent or version.

columns.name: CatalogType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the catalog type/category for the section.

columns.name: VersionGroupItemID
columns.description: Reference to the VersionGroupItem that groups or categorizes this section. Nullable when not associated.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to the MediumVersion to which this section belongs.

columns.name: MasterSectionID
columns.description: Reference to the canonical/master section definition (MasterSection) if this versioned section maps to a master section. Nullable.

columns.name: HasSuperHeadings
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this section contains super-headings (True) or not (False).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data warehouse / dimensional model numeric key associated with this section for analytics mapping. Nullable when not mapped.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the dimensional/data model table that DMKey references for this section (e.g., DR10E_Editions).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string dimensional key used for mapping sections in analytic models. Nullable.

columns.name: Stylesheet
columns.description: Optional stylesheet or style reference applied to the section for rendering. Nullable and often empty.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the ActiveCampaignSalesman record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the marketing or sales campaign associated with this assignment. Likely references a Campaign entity.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesman (sales representative) assigned to the campaign. Likely references an Employee or Salesman entity.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date the record was created (format MM/DD/YYYY). Stored as a fixed-length character field.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Primary code value for the Xac table. Numeric code used to classify or reference Xac entries.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the advanced payment method record

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key to PaymentMethodType table indicating the payment method category (e.g., cash, check, card)

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: Foreign key to Bank table indicating the bank associated with this payment (when applicable)

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount of the payment (currency indicated as USD when available)

columns.name: CheckEndDate
columns.description: End or expiration date for the check, when applicable

columns.name: CheckPublisherIsSame
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the check publisher is the same as the payer

columns.name: CheckPublisher
columns.description: Name of the individual or organization that issued the check (often stored in local character set)

columns.name: CheckPublisherTaxCode
columns.description: Tax identifier/registration number of the check publisher (used for fiscal reconciliation)

columns.name: CreditCardTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key to CreditCardType table indicating the brand/type of credit card used (e.g., Visa, MasterCard)

columns.name: CheckNumber
columns.description: Check reference number assigned by the bank or issuer

columns.name: CreditCardTransactionCode
columns.description: Processor transaction reference or authorization code for credit card payments

columns.name: CreditCardNumber
columns.description: Stored credit card number or token (sensitive). May be masked or tokenized in production systems

columns.name: CreditCardEndDate

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable policy name (often in Greek); the primary display label for the policy.

columns.description: Longer text describing the policy, purpose or additional notes; often a localized string and may be empty.

columns.description: Date and time when the policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User name or account that created the policy record.

columns.description: Date and time of the last modification to the policy record.

columns.description: User name or account that last modified the policy record.

columns.name: Plafon

columns.description: Additional qualifiers or specifiers for the area name (e.g., qualifiers, locality modifiers). Often empty.

columns.name: EntityData
columns.description: Optional XML payload containing additional structured data about the entity or analysis result.

columns.name: ShortAreaNameEn
columns.description: Abbreviated English-language area name for compact displays (may be null/unpopulated in this dataset).

columns.name: DueBalanceValue
columns.description: Amount that is currently due or overdue for the business point according to ERP records.

columns.name: SettlementBalanceValue

columns.name: SettlementWay
columns.description: Description or code indicating the method of settlement used (e.g., bank transfer, cash, credit).

columns.name: HasCreditInvoice
columns.description: Flag indicating whether there is a credit invoice/credit note associated with this business point (true/false).

columns.name: CreditInvoiceDate

columns.name: CreditInvoiceValue

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: ID

columns.name: ID

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: DMCharKey

columns.name: ID

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the document record was created or uploaded into the system.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Username or account that created/uploaded the document; represents the individual responsible for adding the file.

columns.description: Optional numeric key for integration with external data mart systems. Present but null in sample data.

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used for external system mapping. Usually null for these rows.

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Upper bound of the price range for which this invoice policy applies (USD). Nullable when policy is not price-banded.

columns.name: Installments

columns.description: Interval between invoices or installments (measured in units defined by business rules, commonly months).

columns.description: Date/time from which this invoice policy becomes effective. Nullable when policy is open-ended or unspecified.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Date/time when this invoice policy expires. Nullable when policy is open-ended or unspecified.

columns.name: CampaignID

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the channel type for which this policy applies (e.g., web, call center). Links to ChannelType.ID. Nullable when not channel-specific.

columns.name: DMCharKey

columns.name: MediumID

columns.description: Optional character data-mart key (string) used for reporting/integration; currently not populated in source.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the join record that links a condition to its left and right columns.

columns.description: Foreign key referencing the RuleConditionDefinition this join belongs to (dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID).

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the left SQL column for the condition (dbo.SQLColumn.ID). Represents the left-hand operand.

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the right SQL column or value for the condition (dbo.SQLColumn.ID). Represents the right-hand operand.

columns.description: Short English name of the operand/operator (e.g., EQUALS, NOT EQUALS, IN). Used as the primary human-readable label for the operand.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Localized display text for the operand (in the system's language/locale) shown to end users.

columns.name: OperandAsSQL
columns.description: Integer code representing how the operand is rendered or interpreted in SQL generation/execution.

columns.description: Identifier of the SQL select statement (command) that this select-list row belongs to. Foreign key to dbo.SQLSelectStatement.SQLCommandID.

columns.name: ColumnID
columns.description: Identifier of the column being selected/included in the select list. Foreign key to dbo.SQLColumn.ID.

columns.description: Optional display alias given to the column in the SELECT list (the 'AS' alias). Human-friendly label for the selected column.

columns.name: SpecialType
columns.description: Optional special category or subtype code for the assignment. Often null; used for special handling of certain task assignments.

columns.name: Options

columns.description: Optional name of the external data-mart table used for mapping/integration for this assignment record.

columns.description: Optional character/string key used to map this assignment to an external data source or integration table.
