measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of salesman-to-campaign assignment records (rows) in this table.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of unique salesmen represented in the current result set.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of unique campaigns represented in the current result set.

measures.name: AverageSalesmenPerCampaign
measures.description: Average number of salesman assignments per campaign (total assignments divided by distinct campaigns). NULL if there are no campaigns.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of payment amounts recorded in this table (stored in USD).

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Number of payment records (rows).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average payment amount.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Largest single payment amount.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Smallest single payment amount.

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.description: Count of payments that have a non-null bank deposit number (i.e., were deposited to a bank).

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceipts
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt numbers represented in the selected rows.

measures.name: PercentWithBankDeposit
measures.description: Share of payments that include a bank deposit number (proportion of rows with BankDepositNumber).

measures.name: PolicyAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount values (seldom populated).

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of payment Amount values (recorded currency amounts for each payment).

measures.name: Total Policy Amount
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount values when a policy-related amount is present.

measures.name: Payment Count
measures.description: Number of payment records in this table.

measures.name: Distinct Payment Method Types
measures.description: Number of distinct PaymentMethodTypeID values observed.

measures.name: Average Amount per Payment
measures.description: Average payment Amount across all records.

measures.name: Checks Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payments that include a check number (checks present).

measures.name: Percent Checks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of payments that are checks (CheckNumber present) as a percentage of total payments.

measures.name: Credit Card Payments Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardNumber IS NOT NULL OR CreditCardTransactionCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payments that include credit card information or a transaction code.

measures.name: Percent Credit Card Payments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardNumber IS NOT NULL OR CreditCardTransactionCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of payments that are credit card transactions as a percentage of total payments.

measures.name: Bank Deposit Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payments that have an associated bank deposit number.

measures.name: Null BankID Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment records missing a BankID value.

measures.name: Latest Collection Date
measures.description: Most recent CollectionDate present in the filtered set of records.

measures.name: AssociationCount
measures.description: Number of rows / associations between advanced payment methods and sales collections. Use this to measure total link volume.

measures.name: DistinctSalesCollections
measures.description: Number of unique SalesCollection entities represented in the selected slice.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethods
measures.description: Number of unique advanced payment methods present in the selected slice.

measures.name: UsageShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER() = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER() END
measures.description: Share of total associations accounted for by the current grouping (e.g., percent of all method->collection links). Calculated as count divided by the total count across the query scope. Note: window function semantics apply; results depend on query partitioning and filters.

measures.name: Advertisement Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: Total Price
measures.description: Sum of the Price values for advertisements. Represents gross price before discounts.

measures.name: Total Discounts
measures.description: Aggregate of all discount types applied to advertisements (explicit discount, rules discount, payment/product/bundle discounts). Nulls treated as zero.

measures.name: Net Price (after discounts)
measures.expression: SUM(COALESCE(Price,0) - COALESCE(Discount,0) - COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) - COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) - COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) - COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0))
measures.description: Net revenue-like measure: price minus all listed discounts aggregated across advertisements.

measures.name: Total One-time Amount
measures.description: Sum of one-time charges associated with advertisements.

measures.name: Total Extra Fee Amount
measures.description: Sum of extra fee amounts (pre-discount) for advertisements.

measures.name: Actual Spent Budget
measures.description: Sum of actual budget spent for advertisements (where provided).

measures.name: Average Price
measures.description: Average Price across advertisements. Cast ensures precise average on DECIMAL types.

measures.name: Subscription Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Proportion of advertisements that are subscription-based (fraction of total rows).

measures.name: Verified Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Proportion of advertisements marked as verified.

measures.name: Average Active Days
measures.description: Average number of days an advertisement was active. Uses AdvEndDate when present; otherwise uses current date.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of archived number records (rows).

measures.name: ActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records marked as active.

measures.name: InactiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records marked as inactive.

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of records that are active (ActiveCount / RecordCount).

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Code values observed in the table.

measures.name: DistinctCreators
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created archived numbers.

measures.name: FirstCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp in the set.

measures.name: LastCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest CreatedOn timestamp in the set.

measures.name: AverageAgeDays
measures.description: Average age of records in days measured from CreatedOn to current UTC date.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of extraction events (rows) in the selection.

measures.name: FirstEventTime
measures.description: Earliest TimeStamp recorded in the selection.

measures.name: LastEventTime
measures.description: Most recent TimeStamp recorded in the selection.

measures.name: EventDays
measures.description: Number of distinct calendar days with at least one event.

measures.name: EventsPerDay
measures.description: Average number of events per active day in the selection.

measures.name: Count_Type_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events where Type = 0. (Based on sample data, Type = 0 appears for entries like 'About to extract both free and paid listings'  mapping is inferred and should be validated.)

measures.name: Count_Type_1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events where Type = 1. (Sample text suggests Type = 1 corresponds to paid template/extraction.)

measures.name: Count_Type_2
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events where Type = 2. (Sample text suggests Type = 2 corresponds to free template/extraction.)

measures.name: Pct_Type_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of events with Type = 0 (fraction of total events).

measures.name: Pct_Type_1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of events with Type = 1 (fraction of total events).

measures.name: Pct_Type_2
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of events with Type = 2 (fraction of total events).

measures.name: Count_Status_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Status = 0. (Status code semantics are not provided; sample data shows Status = 0 for many rows  this likely indicates a particular state such as 'ok' or 'started' and should be validated.)

measures.name: Count_Status_1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Status = 1 (if present).

measures.name: Pct_Status_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of events with Status = 0.

measures.name: AvgTextLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Text field for events in the selection.

measures.name: ExtractedFileMentions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Text LIKE '%Extracted%' OR Text LIKE '%file %' OR Text LIKE '%XOGR-%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events whose Text appears to mention extracted files (heuristic based on common substrings). Useful to identify rows that reference actual output files; this is a heuristic and may need refinement.

hints.status_note: Status codes are present but not documented. Descriptions above are inferred from samples and should be validated against source/system documentation.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of recorded batch actions (rows in this table)

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches that have one or more actions recorded

measures.name: RowsAffectedSum
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all actions

measures.name: RowsAffectedAvg
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per action

measures.name: RowsAffectedMin
measures.description: Minimum rows affected for a single action

measures.name: RowsAffectedMax
measures.description: Maximum rows affected for a single action

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions marked as successful (Status = 1)

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions marked as failed or non-success (Status = 0)

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of actions that are successful (SuccessCount / ActionCount)

measures.name: ActionsPerBatchAvg
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(ID) / COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) END
measures.description: Average number of actions recorded per batch

measures.name: FirstActionTime
measures.description: Earliest action timestamp in the current aggregation context

measures.name: LastActionTime
measures.description: Latest action timestamp in the current aggregation context

measures.name: TotalActions
measures.description: Total number of action history records (rows) in this table.

measures.name: DistinctEntitiesAffected
measures.description: Number of unique EntityID values (distinct entities) represented in the actions.

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches present in the analysis set.

measures.name: AverageActionsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of actions (rows) per batch across the current filter context. Uses NULLIF to avoid divide-by-zero.

measures.name: DistinctTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct action Type codes present in the dataset.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows in the BroaderArea table.

measures.name: Distinct Address Count
measures.description: Number of unique addresses referenced by BroaderArea.

measures.name: Distinct BroaderArea Count
measures.description: Number of distinct BroaderArea identifiers present.

measures.name: DMKey Present Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where a DMKey (data model key) is populated.

measures.name: DMKey Coverage %
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows with a populated DMKey (DMKey non-null) expressed as a percentage of total rows.

measures.name: DMTable Present Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMTable IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where DMTable (source model/table) is populated.

measures.name: DMTable Coverage %
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN DMTable IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows with a populated DMTable (source model/table) expressed as a percentage of total rows.

measures.name: Average Addresses per BroaderArea
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT BroaderAreaID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT BroaderAreaID) END
measures.description: Average number of address mappings per BroaderArea (total mappings divided by distinct BroaderAreaIDs).

measures.name: CommentCount
measures.description: Total number of comment records

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of unique business points that have at least one comment

measures.name: DistinctUserCount
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created comments

measures.name: FirstCommentDate
measures.description: Earliest comment timestamp in the current filter context

measures.name: LastCommentDate
measures.description: Latest comment timestamp in the current filter context

measures.name: AverageCommentLengthChars
measures.description: Average length of CommentText in characters (LEN excludes trailing spaces)

measures.name: CommentsPerDay
measures.description: Average number of comments per calendar day in the current filter context

measures.name: Attachment Count
measures.description: Total number of attachment records in the current filter context.

measures.name: Distinct Comment Count
measures.description: Number of distinct comments that have one or more attachments.

measures.name: Active Attachment Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 OR IsDeleted IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments that are not marked as deleted.

measures.name: Deleted Attachment Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments that are marked as deleted.

measures.name: Attachments per Comment (avg)
measures.description: Average number of attachments per comment in the current filter context. Returns null when there are no comments.

measures.name: Distinct Filenames
measures.description: Number of distinct filename values stored for attachments.

measures.name: Average DisplayName Length
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN DisplayName IS NOT NULL THEN LEN(DisplayName) END)
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the DisplayName value for attachments.

measures.name: ConfirmationEvents
measures.description: Total number of confirmation history events (one row per event).

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points that appear in the confirmation history.

measures.name: UniquePerformers
measures.description: Number of distinct users (performers) who created confirmation events.

measures.name: TaskLinkedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of confirmation events that are linked to a Task.

measures.name: ConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where ActionType indicates a 'confirmed' action (ActionType = 1).

measures.name: UnconfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where ActionType indicates an 'unconfirmed' action (ActionType = 0).

measures.name: OtherActionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionType NOT IN (0, 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events with ActionType values other than 0 or 1.

measures.name: ThirdPartyCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsThirdPartyDataSource = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events that originate from a third-party data source.

measures.name: ThirdPartyPercentage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsThirdPartyDataSource = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of events that come from third-party data sources (ThirdPartyCount / ConfirmationEvents).

measures.name: FirstConfirmationTime
measures.description: Earliest TimeStamp observed in the aggregation window.

measures.name: LastConfirmationTime
measures.description: Latest TimeStamp observed in the aggregation window.

measures.name: EventsPerBusinessPoint
measures.description: Average number of confirmation events per distinct business point in the aggregation.

measures.name: AttributeValueCount
measures.description: Total number of custom attribute value rows (records).

measures.name: DistinctAttributes
measures.description: Number of distinct custom attribute types present in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctListings
measures.description: Count of distinct business point listings that have at least one custom attribute value in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctValues
measures.description: Number of distinct stored Value strings. Note: Value is a free-form NVARCHAR and may contain comma-separated tokens.

measures.name: DraftCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDraftInit = 1 OR DraftValue IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attribute value rows that have a draft indication or a non-null DraftValue.

measures.name: DraftRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDraftInit = 1 OR DraftValue IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of attribute value rows that are marked as draft or have a draft value (DraftCount divided by total rows).

measures.name: AverageAttributesPerListing
measures.description: Average number of attribute value rows per business point listing in the selected scope.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of business points represented in the current aggregation (distinct BusinessPointID count).

measures.name: TotalBalance
measures.description: Sum of BalanceValue for the selected business points. Stored with three decimal places in source.

measures.name: TotalDueBalance
measures.description: Sum of amounts that are due (outstanding) across business points.

measures.name: TotalSettlementBalance
measures.description: Sum of settlement-related balances (e.g., amounts allocated for settlement) across business points.

measures.name: TotalCreditInvoiceValue
measures.description: Total value of credit invoices associated with the business points.

measures.name: ActiveCreditInvoiceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasCreditInvoice = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points that have at least one credit invoice flag set.

measures.name: DueBalanceShareOfTotal
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(BalanceValue) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(DueBalanceValue) / SUM(BalanceValue) END
measures.description: Proportion of total balance that is due (TotalDueBalance / TotalBalance). Returns NULL if total balance is zero.

measures.name: LastCreditInvoiceDate
measures.description: Most recent credit invoice date seen for the aggregated business points.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentWays
measures.description: Number of distinct values captured in the PaymentWays column within the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctSettlementWays
measures.description: Number of distinct settlement methods recorded for the selected business points.

measures.name: Listing Count
measures.description: Total number of listings (rows) in the BusinessPointListing table

measures.name: Distinct BusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of unique business points referenced by listings

measures.name: Distinct ClassifierNodes
measures.description: Number of distinct classifier nodes (categories) used in listings

measures.name: Distinct Headings
measures.description: Number of distinct heading codes used by listings

measures.name: Distinct Creators
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created listings

measures.name: Percent Modified
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ModifiedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of listings that have been modified at least once (ModifiedOn is not null)

measures.name: Average Time to First Modify (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ModifiedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, ModifiedOn) END)
measures.description: Average number of days between creation and first modification for listings that have been modified

measures.name: Listings per BusinessPoint (avg)
measures.description: Average number of listings per business point

measures.name: Earliest Created On
measures.description: Earliest creation timestamp among the selected listings

measures.name: Latest Modified On
measures.description: Most recent modification timestamp among the selected listings (null if none modified)

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of logged events (rows) in this filter/context.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points that had at least one logged change.

measures.name: DistinctListings
measures.description: Number of distinct listings affected by logged changes.

measures.name: DistinctPerformers
measures.description: Number of distinct users/performers who executed changes.

measures.name: DistinctGroups
measures.description: Number of distinct groups (GroupID) represented in the result set.

measures.name: Action_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where ActionID = 1.

measures.name: Action_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionID = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where ActionID = 2.

measures.name: Action_3_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionID = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where ActionID = 3.

measures.name: Pct_Action_1
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ActionID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share (percentage) of events that have ActionID = 1 within the current filter/context.

measures.name: MissingNewValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewValue IS NULL OR LTRIM(RTRIM(NewValue)) = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events where the NewValue is empty or NULL (possible removals or blank updates).

measures.name: AvgChangesPerGroup
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT GroupID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(ID) / COUNT(DISTINCT GroupID) END
measures.description: Average number of logged changes per GroupID in the current context.

measures.name: TotalPlans
measures.description: Total number of allocation plans (one row per plan).

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns referenced by these allocation plans.

measures.name: PlansWithSubChannelAssigned
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SubChannelAssigned <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of plans that have a non-zero SubChannelAssigned value (interpreted as assigned).

measures.name: PctPlansWithSubChannelAssigned
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SubChannelAssigned <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of plans with a SubChannelAssigned value (percentage of TotalPlans).

measures.name: TotalTargetValueAssigned
measures.description: Sum of TargetValueAssigned across plans. (If this column represents a monetary or other unit, replace unit/format_hint accordingly.)

measures.name: AvgTargetValueAssigned
measures.description: Average TargetValueAssigned for plans (ignores zero values where zero likely indicates 'not set').

measures.name: PlansWithTargetUserAssigned
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TargetUserAssigned <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of plans that have a non-zero TargetUserAssigned value.

measures.name: PlansWithHandlerAssigned
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HandlerUserAssigned <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of plans that have a non-zero HandlerUserAssigned value.

measures.name: PlansWithSupervisorAssigned
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SupervisorAssigned <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of plans that have a non-zero SupervisorAssigned value.

measures.name: PlansLinkedToDM
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of plans that are linked to the data mart / detail table via DMKey (non-null DMKey).

measures.name: PctPlansLinkedToDM
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of plans that are linked to DM (percentage of TotalPlans).

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the Campaign dimension / master record.

Likely reference to a user dimension (inferred).

display.notes: Description and DMTable are useful human-read and source indicators. Many user-related columns use 0 to indicate 'unassigned' in the sample; consider treating 0 as null/unassigned in downstream reporting.

measures.name: Total Closes (Operational)
measures.description: Total number of operational closes attributed to the campaign allocation plan channel.

measures.name: Total Closes (Lapsed)
measures.description: Total number of lapsed closes for the channel.

measures.name: Total Closes (Non-Product)
measures.description: Total number of non-product closes for the channel.

measures.name: Total Group CO (count)
measures.description: Aggregate count metric for Group CO (channel-level group count).

measures.name: Total Group Values CO
measures.description: Monetary total of Group Values for CO. Currency assumed EUR based on environment; confirm if different.

measures.name: Total Group RoCO (count)
measures.description: Aggregate count for Group RoCO.

measures.name: Total Group Values RoCO
measures.description: Monetary total of Group Values for RoCO.

measures.name: Total Group Prospect (count)
measures.description: Aggregate prospect count for the channel.

measures.name: Total Group Values Prospect
measures.description: Monetary total for prospect group values.

measures.name: Total Group New (count)
measures.description: Aggregate count of new items (new customers/accounts) for the channel.

measures.name: Total Group Values New
measures.description: Monetary total of new group values (e.g., total value from new customers).

measures.name: Total Group CI (count)
measures.description: Aggregate count for Group CI.

measures.name: Total Group Values CI
measures.description: Monetary total of Group CI values.

measures.name: Total AVO Lapsed
measures.description: Aggregate AVO (average value/volume) for lapsed segment. Interpret as monetary value unless domain indicates otherwise.

measures.name: Total AVO Non-Product
measures.description: Aggregate AVO for non-product segment (monetary).

measures.name: ULoss Rate (avg)
measures.description: Average ULoss rate (unit-level loss proportion). Use weighted aggregation if you need a weighted rate (e.g., weighted by volume).

measures.name: Closs Rate (avg)
measures.description: Average Closs rate (channel-level close loss proportion). Consider a weighted average by closes if appropriate.

measures.name: Total Loss (sum)
measures.description: Sum of TotLoss values. Field appears constant in sample; included for completeness.

measures.name: Renewed Rate (avg)
measures.description: Average renewal rate for the channel (proportion).

measures.name: Repeat Rate (avg)
measures.description: Average repeat rate for the channel (proportion).

measures.name: Decrease Rate (avg)
measures.description: Average decrease rate (proportion).

measures.name: Increase Rate (avg)
measures.description: Average increase rate (proportion).

measures.name: Strike Rate (Operational, avg)
measures.description: Average operational strike rate. For production reports, consider calculating a weighted strike across appropriate denominators.

measures.name: Strike Rate (Lapsed, avg)
measures.description: Average strike rate for lapsed segment.

measures.name: Strike Rate (Non-Product, avg)
measures.description: Average strike rate for non-product segment.

measures.name: ULoss Average (avg)
measures.description: Average of ULossAvg values across rows. If ULossAvg already encodes a per-unit average, verify weighting needs before using AVG in rollups.

measures.name: Closs Average (avg)
measures.description: Average of ClossAvg across rows.

measures.name: Decrease Average (avg)
measures.description: Average of DecrAvg across rows.

measures.name: Increase Average (avg)
measures.description: Average of IncrAvg across rows.

measures.name: New Average (avg)
measures.description: Average value for 'New' (e.g., average new-customer value). Treated as currency (EUR) by default; confirm with business domain. Weighted average may be preferable where available.

display.notes: Rates/averages are exposed as AVG(...) of the stored columns. If downstream reporting requires correctly weighted rates (e.g., weighted by volume or closes), replace AVG(...) with an appropriate weighted expression (for example, SUM(rate * weight)/NULLIF(SUM(weight),0)). Currency is assumed to be EUR based on environment (Greek collation); confirm and adjust currency code if needed.

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of BP loss detail records (each row represents a business point associated with a loss request).

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points referenced by these loss request details.

measures.name: UniqueRequests
measures.description: Number of distinct loss requests represented in this detail table.

measures.name: BusinessPointsPerRequest
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT RequestID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT RequestID) END
measures.description: Average number of business points (BPID) listed per loss request.

measures.name: RequestCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign assignment requests (rows).

measures.name: OpenRequestCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that are not closed (ClosedOn IS NULL).

measures.name: ClosedRequestCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that have been closed (ClosedOn IS NOT NULL).

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of requests that have been closed (ClosedRequestCount / RequestCount).

measures.name: AvgTimeToCloseDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, ClosedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average time to close a request in days. Only considers requests with a ClosedOn value.

measures.name: MedianTimeToCloseDays
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, ClosedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Median time to close a request in days (50th percentile).

measures.name: AvgOpenAgeDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, GETUTCDATE()) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average age in days of currently open requests (as of now). Excludes closed requests.

measures.name: DistinctRequestedSalesmen
measures.description: Count of distinct requested salesmen referenced by requests.

measures.name: DistinctPerformers
measures.description: Count of distinct performers who handled requests (excludes null PerformerID).

measures.name: CommentedRequestCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Comment IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Comment)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that include a non-empty comment.

measures.name: AssignmentRowCount
measures.description: Number of assignment detail rows (one row per bucket assignment within a request).

measures.name: DistinctRequests
measures.description: Number of distinct assignment requests represented by these detail rows.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns referenced by these detail rows.

measures.name: DistinctBuckets
measures.description: Number of distinct buckets referenced by these detail rows.

measures.name: SalesmanReassignmentsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL AND NewSalesmanID <> OldSalesmanID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the salesman was changed (NewSalesmanID is present and different from OldSalesmanID).

measures.name: SalesmanReassignmentsRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL AND NewSalesmanID <> OldSalesmanID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of assignment rows that involve a salesman reassignment (SalesmanReassignmentsCount / AssignmentRowCount).

measures.name: SegmentReassignmentsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL AND NewSegmentID <> OldSegmentID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the segment was changed (NewSegmentID is present and different from OldSegmentID). Note: NewSegmentID is currently null in the sample data.

measures.name: SegmentReassignmentsRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL AND NewSegmentID <> OldSegmentID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of assignment rows that involve a segment reassignment (SegmentReassignmentsCount / AssignmentRowCount).

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign-to-business-point assignment detail records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points referenced by these assignment detail records.

measures.name: DistinctRequestCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign assignment requests represented in these detail records.

measures.name: AverageAssignmentsPerRequest
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT RequestID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT RequestID) END
measures.description: Average number of business-point assignments per campaign assignment request.

measures.name: BucketCount
measures.description: Number of campaign bucket rows (granularity = ID)

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the selected buckets

measures.name: TotalTargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Sum of calculated targeting amounts for the selected buckets

measures.name: TotalTargetingAmountByUser
measures.description: Sum of targeting amounts entered/approved by users (may be largely null)

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of the TotalAmount column (aggregate of channel investments recorded for the bucket)

measures.name: TotalXOGRAmount
measures.description: Sum of XO.gr channel amounts

measures.name: TotalWebSiteAmount
measures.description: Sum of Website channel amounts

measures.name: TotalPPCAmount
measures.description: Sum of PPC channel amounts

measures.name: TotalPrintAmount
measures.description: Sum of print channel amounts (sparse)

measures.name: AverageTargetingAmountPerBucket
measures.description: Average calculated targeting amount per bucket

measures.name: AverageScoreTotal
measures.description: Average of the ScoreTotal values across the selected buckets

measures.name: MaxScoreTotal
measures.description: Maximum ScoreTotal observed in the selection

measures.name: MinScoreTotal
measures.description: Minimum ScoreTotal observed in the selection

measures.name: AverageScoreDifferenceToAvg
measures.description: Average difference of a bucket's score to the campaign/group average

measures.name: PercentWithUserTargeting
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN TargetingAmountByUser IS NOT NULL AND TargetingAmountByUser > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of buckets where a user-entered targeting amount exists and is > 0

measures.name: CountModified
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsModified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of buckets flagged as modified

measures.name: CountActiveItems
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ItemStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets with ItemStatus = 1 (active)

measures.name: CountWorkingItems
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN WorkingStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets with WorkingStatus = 1

measures.name: UploadCount
measures.description: Total number of file upload records (rows) in the current query scope.

measures.name: UniqueFileCount
measures.description: Number of distinct file names uploaded within the current query scope.

measures.name: FirstUploadTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest upload timestamp in the current query scope.

measures.name: LastUploadTimestamp
measures.description: Most recent upload timestamp in the current query scope.

measures.name: AverageUploadsPerCampaign
measures.description: Average number of uploads per campaign within the current query scope. NULL if no campaigns are present.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows (detail records) in this fact (useful for basic volume metrics).

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of unique business points in the current scope.

measures.name: Distinct Files
measures.description: Number of distinct upload files represented in the current scope.

measures.name: Total Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of the TotalAmount values across rows  represents the total budget/value attributed by the uploaded file detail rows.

measures.name: XOGR Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of XOGRAmount (one of the monetary channels) across the selected rows.

measures.name: WebSite Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of WebSiteAmount across the selected rows.

measures.name: Print Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of PrintAmount across the selected rows.

measures.name: PPC Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of PPCAmount across the selected rows.

measures.name: Average Total Amount
measures.description: Average TotalAmount per row in the current scope.

measures.name: Median Total Amount (approx)
measures.description: Median (50th percentile) of TotalAmount. Implementation may be DB-dependent (uses PERCENTILE_CONT where supported).

measures.name: XOGR Share of Total
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(XOGRAmount) / SUM(TotalAmount) END
measures.description: Proportion of XOGRAmount relative to the TotalAmount across the selected rows (0-1 stored, formatted as percentage).

measures.name: Average XOGR per Business Point
measures.description: Average XOGRAmount allocated per unique business point in the current scope.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the parent upload file record.
Business point/master record (inferred).
Salesman / account manager identifier (inferred).
Channel dimension (inferred).
Segment dimension (inferred).

display.notes: Typical exploration will slice sums/averages of TotalAmount and channel amounts by business point, product mixture, vertical, segment and salesman. Use FileID to scope analysis to a particular upload batch.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (associations) in the CampaignBusinessPoint table. Each row represents an association between a single Campaign and a single BusinessPoint.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Count of distinct BusinessPointIDs in the current query context. Useful to determine how many unique business points are involved across the selected campaigns or filters.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Count of distinct CampaignIDs in the current query context. Useful to determine how many unique campaigns are represented across the selected business points or filters.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of assignment rows (each row represents one Campaign x ContractProduct x Advertisement association at a BusinessPoint)

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the result set

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points associated with campaigns

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts covered by the campaigns

measures.name: DistinctContractProducts
measures.description: Number of unique contract products linked to campaigns

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisements
measures.description: Number of unique advertisements used in campaigns

measures.name: AssignmentsPerCampaignAvg
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) END
measures.description: Average number of assignments (rows) per campaign

measures.name: ProductAssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of product-to-offer assignment rows.

measures.name: DistinctProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct pricelist items (products) assigned across the selected rows.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign fixed offers represented in the selected rows.

measures.name: AvgProductsPerCampaign
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignFixedOfferID)=0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(ID)*1.0/COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignFixedOfferID) END
measures.description: Average number of product assignments per campaign fixed offer (rows per campaign).

measures.name: TotalOccurrences
measures.description: Sum of NumberOfOccurencies across detail rows; represents total occurrences allocated by this detail table.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of detail rows.

measures.name: UniquePriceListItems
measures.description: Count of distinct PriceListItemDetail entries referenced by these detail rows.

measures.name: AverageOccurrencesPerRow
measures.description: Average NumberOfOccurencies per detail row.

measures.name: PercentRowsWithMultipleOccurrences
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN NumberOfOccurencies > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of detail rows where NumberOfOccurencies is greater than 1.

measures.name: Holiday Count
measures.description: Number of campaign-holiday records (one row per campaign holiday occurrence).

measures.name: Distinct Holiday Dates
measures.description: Count of distinct holiday dates across the table (useful when multiple rows for same date exist).

measures.name: Upcoming Holidays (30 days)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HolidayDate BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE AND DATEADD(day, 30, CURRENT_DATE) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of holidays occurring in the next 30 days (relative to current date).

measures.name: Next Holiday Date
measures.description: The next (earliest) holiday date across the scope (useful when grouped by Campaign to find next campaign holiday).

measures.name: Assignments
measures.description: Number of campaign-to-business-point assignment records (each row represents an assignment)

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Distinct number of business points included in the selection / grouping

measures.name: SalespersonCount
measures.description: Distinct number of salespeople associated with the campaign assignments

measures.name: SupervisorCount
measures.description: Distinct number of supervisors associated with the campaign assignments

measures.name: BusinessPointsPerSalesperson
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT SalesManCode) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT SalesManCode) END
measures.description: Average distinct business points per salesperson within the current context

measures.name: PremiseAssignmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SubChannel = 'premise' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignments where SubChannel is 'premise'

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (alteration records) in this table.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the dataset.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points affected by campaign alterations.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmanCount
measures.description: Number of distinct salespeople involved in the recorded alterations.

measures.name: DistinctOfferCount
measures.description: Number of distinct altered offers referenced in the table.

measures.name: TotalRecords
measures.description: Total number of campaign target records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the records.

measures.name: DistinctRuleCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign rules applied to these records.

measures.name: RequestedToSuspendCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToSuspend = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that were requested to be suspended.

measures.name: RequestedToSuspendPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToSuspend = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of records that were requested to be suspended (RequestedToSuspendCount / TotalRecords).

measures.name: SuspendedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSuspended = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that are currently suspended.

measures.name: SuspendedPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSuspended = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of records that are suspended (SuspendedCount / TotalRecords).

measures.name: NewRecordCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsNewRecord = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records flagged as new.

measures.name: NewRecordPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsNewRecord = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of records flagged as new (NewRecordCount / TotalRecords).

measures.name: RequestedToResumeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToResume = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that were requested to be resumed.

measures.name: RequestedToResumePct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToResume = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of records requested to resume (RequestedToResumeCount / TotalRecords).

measures.name: HasBatchCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BatchID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that are associated with a non-null BatchID.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct non-null BatchID values present.

measures.name: ActionResultNotNullCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionResult IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where ActionResult has a non-null value.

measures.name: ActionResultDistinctCount
measures.description: Number of distinct ActionResult values (including sentinel strings like 'None'). Nulls are excluded.

measures.name: DialerActionNonZeroCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DialerAction IS NOT NULL AND DialerAction <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with a non-zero DialerAction value (indicator of a dialer-triggered action).

measures.name: DialerActionDistinctCount
measures.description: Number of distinct DialerAction values (nulls counted separately by HasBatchCount / ActionResultNotNullCount).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of rows (items) in the fact table.

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (locations) referenced by these campaign items.

measures.name: Distinct Assigned Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen assigned to the campaign items (SalesmanID).

measures.name: Action Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Action)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where an action value exists (non-null and not empty). Represents performed actions recorded for items.

measures.name: Distinct Action Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen recorded as performing actions (ActionSalesmanID).

measures.name: Most Recent Action Date
measures.description: Latest action timestamp recorded for these items.

measures.name: Percent With Brand Name
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN BusinessPointBrandName IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BusinessPointBrandName)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points that have a non-empty brand name populated.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (assignments) in the fact table

measures.name: AssignedCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (customers) assigned to campaign rules / salesmen in this dataset

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of unique salesmen referenced in the rows

measures.name: DistinctRules
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign customer rules present in the selection

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented by the rows

measures.name: AvgCustomersPerSalesman
measures.description: Average number of distinct customers assigned per salesman in the filtered scope (null when no salesmen)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the table or in the current filter context. At the table grain this equals the number of RuleIDBusinessPointID associations.

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (customers) represented in the resultset or within the current aggregation/window.

measures.name: UniqueRules
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign rules represented in the resultset or within the current aggregation/window.

measures.name: TotalEvents
measures.description: Total number of log events (rows).

measures.name: UniqueUsers
measures.description: Number of distinct users (UserID) affected by the logged org-model actions.

measures.name: UniquePerformers
measures.description: Number of distinct performers who performed actions recorded in the log.

measures.name: ActionsCount
measures.description: Count of events; intended to be used with Action as a breakdown to show counts per action type.

measures.name: TotalModelDurationDays
measures.description: Sum of durations (in days) between StartDate and EndDate for all records. Use with caution if EndDate < StartDate.

measures.name: AverageModelDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartDate and EndDate across records.

measures.name: PercentWithParentUser
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ParentUserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1),0)
measures.description: Share of events that include a ParentUserID (indicates a parent user relation present).

measures.name: DistinctOrgModels
measures.description: Number of distinct organization models referenced in the log.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the result (rows in the pivot report)

measures.name: NumberOfCases
measures.description: Total number of cases associated with the campaign pivot rows

measures.name: LossQuantity
measures.description: Sum of lost quantity across the selected rows

measures.name: NewQuantity
measures.description: Sum of new quantity across the selected rows

measures.name: COQuantity
measures.description: Sum of CO (carry-over / cross-over) quantity across the selected rows

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Combined quantity (loss + new + CO) across the selected rows

measures.name: LossQuantityPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCases) IS NULL OR SUM(NumberOfCases) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(LossQuantity) * 1.0) / SUM(NumberOfCases) END
measures.description: Loss quantity as a percentage of total NumberOfCases (calculated as SUM(LossQuantity)/SUM(NumberOfCases))

measures.name: NewQuantityPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCases) IS NULL OR SUM(NumberOfCases) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(NewQuantity) * 1.0) / SUM(NumberOfCases) END
measures.description: New quantity as a percentage of total NumberOfCases (calculated as SUM(NewQuantity)/SUM(NumberOfCases))

measures.name: COQuantityPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCases) IS NULL OR SUM(NumberOfCases) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(COQuantity) * 1.0) / SUM(NumberOfCases) END
measures.description: CO quantity as a percentage of total NumberOfCases (calculated as SUM(COQuantity)/SUM(NumberOfCases))

measures.name: LossQuantityPercentage (stored avg)
measures.description: Average of the stored LossQuantityPercentage values (useful when rows already carry a row-level percentage)

measures.name: NewQuantityPercentage (stored avg)
measures.description: Average of the stored NewQuantityPercentage values (useful when rows already carry a row-level percentage)

measures.name: COQuantityPercentage (stored avg)
measures.description: Average of the stored COQuantityPercentage values (useful when rows already carry a row-level percentage)

measures.name: ContractAmount
measures.description: Total contract amount (currency)

measures.name: SubscriptionAmount
measures.description: Total subscription amount (currency)

measures.name: RenewalAmount
measures.description: Total renewal amount (currency)

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmount
measures.description: Total non-subscription amount (currency)

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Combined amount across contract, subscription, renewal and non-subscription (currency)

measures.name: SubscriptionAmountShare (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN (SUM(ContractAmount) + SUM(SubscriptionAmount) + SUM(RenewalAmount) + SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(SubscriptionAmount) * 1.0 / (SUM(ContractAmount) + SUM(SubscriptionAmount) + SUM(RenewalAmount) + SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount)) END
measures.description: Subscription amount as a share of the total amount (calculated)

measures.name: RenewalAmountShare (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN (SUM(ContractAmount) + SUM(SubscriptionAmount) + SUM(RenewalAmount) + SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(RenewalAmount) * 1.0 / (SUM(ContractAmount) + SUM(SubscriptionAmount) + SUM(RenewalAmount) + SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount)) END
measures.description: Renewal amount as a share of the total amount (calculated)

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmountShare (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN (SUM(ContractAmount) + SUM(SubscriptionAmount) + SUM(RenewalAmount) + SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount) * 1.0 / (SUM(ContractAmount) + SUM(SubscriptionAmount) + SUM(RenewalAmount) + SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount)) END
measures.description: Non-subscription amount as a share of the total amount (calculated)

measures.name: SubscriptionAmountPercentage (stored avg)
measures.description: Average of stored SubscriptionAmountPercentage values (row-level percentage averaged)

measures.name: RenewalAmountPercentage (stored avg)
measures.description: Average of stored RenewalAmountPercentage values (row-level percentage averaged)

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage (stored avg)
measures.description: Average of stored NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage values (row-level percentage averaged)

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the result set

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of history rows (records) in the selected scope

measures.name: DistinctSegmentCount
measures.description: Number of distinct segments represented in the selected scope

measures.name: Sum_NumberOfRecords
measures.description: Total number of underlying records aggregated across rows (NULLs are ignored)

measures.name: Sum_TotalScore
measures.description: Sum of TotalScore (monetary) across the selected rows. Stored currency in source: USD

measures.name: Avg_TotalScore
measures.description: Average of the TotalScore values across selected rows (NULLs ignored). Represented in USD.

measures.name: Weighted_AvgScore_per_Record
measures.description: Weighted average score per record computed as SUM(TotalScore) / SUM(NumberOfRecords). Returns NULL when NumberOfRecords sum is zero or missing. Result in USD per record.

measures.name: Avg_AvgScore
measures.description: Average of the AvgScore column across the selected rows. AvgScore in source is presented as a currency-like score (USD hinted in source metadata).

measures.name: Avg_XOGR_ROCO
measures.description: Average of XOGR_ROCO values across the selected rows (score/ratio).

measures.name: Avg_PPC_ROCO
measures.description: Average of PPC_ROCO values across the selected rows (score/ratio).

measures.name: Avg_Print_ROCO
measures.description: Average of Print_ROCO values across the selected rows (score/ratio).

measures.name: Avg_XOGR_ROCO_User
measures.description: Average of XOGR_ROCO_User values. Values in source are expressed as percentage points (0-100 range). Format hint shows as percent; note these values are stored as 0..100 rather than 0..1.

measures.name: Avg_PPC_ROCO_User
measures.description: Average of PPC_ROCO_User values. Values are percentage points (0-100 range).

measures.name: Avg_Print_ROCO_User
measures.description: Average of Print_ROCO_User values. Values are percentage points (0-100 range).

display.notes: Percentage fields (XOGR_ROCO_User, PPC_ROCO_User, Print_ROCO_User) are stored as 0-100 percentage points. TotalScore and AvgScore are hinted as USD in source metadata.

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount values across snapshot records (monetary). Stored with three decimal places.

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average Amount per record in the snapshot.

measures.name: Minimum Amount
measures.description: Minimum Amount observed in the snapshot.

measures.name: Maximum Amount
measures.description: Maximum Amount observed in the snapshot.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of snapshot rows (each row represents a behaviour bucket for a campaign).

measures.name: Distinct Behaviour Name Count
measures.description: Number of distinct behaviour names (Name) present in the snapshot.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign score history events (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns that have at least one score history event in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctSegmentCount
measures.description: Number of distinct segments represented in the score history events in the selected scope.

measures.name: AverageEventsPerCampaign
measures.description: Average number of score history events per campaign (total events divided by distinct campaigns). Returns NULL if there are no campaigns in the scope.

measures.name: FirstEventDate
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp for events in the selected scope.

measures.name: LastEventDate
measures.description: Latest CreatedOn timestamp for events in the selected scope.

measures.name: RowCount

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of unique business points represented in the selected set

measures.name: Sum_TargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Sum of system-calculated targeting amounts for the records

measures.name: Sum_TargetingAmountByUser
measures.description: Sum of targeting amounts set by users (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Sum_TotalAmount

measures.name: Sum_XOGRAmount
measures.description: Sum of XO.gr investment amounts

measures.name: Sum_PrintAmount

measures.name: Sum_PPCAmount

measures.name: Sum_WebSiteAmount
measures.description: Sum of website channel amounts (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Avg_ScoreTotal

measures.name: Max_ScoreTotal
measures.description: Maximum overall score observed

measures.name: Min_ScoreTotal
measures.description: Minimum overall score observed

measures.name: Avg_ScoreMainActivity
measures.description: Average score contribution from main activity

measures.name: Avg_ScoreSeniority
measures.description: Average score contribution from seniority

measures.name: Avg_ScoreValueBillingRange
measures.description: Average score contribution from billing/value range

measures.name: Avg_ScoreCombinationMedium
measures.description: Average score contribution from medium combination

measures.name: Avg_ScoreCombinationProduct
measures.description: Average score contribution from product combination

measures.name: Avg_ScoreCustomerBehavior
measures.description: Average score contribution from customer behavior

measures.name: Avg_ScoreSalesmanManagement
measures.description: Average score contribution from salesman management

measures.name: Avg_ScoreDifferenceToAvg

measures.name: Amount
measures.description: Total score amount for the activity group (sum of Amount across selected rows). Stored with three decimal places in the source.

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average score amount per snapshot row for the selected scope.

measures.name: Minimum Amount
measures.description: Smallest Amount value among the selected rows.

measures.name: Maximum Amount
measures.description: Largest Amount value among the selected rows.

measures.name: Group Count
measures.description: Number of snapshot records (rows) in the current filter context.

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: Share of Campaign Amount
measures.description: Proportion of this group's Amount compared to the total Amount for the same Campaign (partitioned by CampaignID). Useful to see how much a specific activity group contributes to its campaign.

measures.name: Amount
measures.description: Snapshot investment amount associated with the medium for the campaign. Stored with three decimals; use SUM(Amount) to aggregate across rows or contexts.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average of Amount across the evaluated rows (useful when aggregating by campaign or other dimensions).

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum Amount value in the aggregation scope.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum Amount value in the aggregation scope.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of snapshot rows (distinct ID) in the current filter context.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount for the snapshot rows (sum of Amount).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average Amount per snapshot row.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum Amount observed in the selected rows.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum Amount observed in the selected rows.

measures.name: SnapshotCount
measures.description: Number of snapshot rows (records) returned.

measures.name: DistinctMediumTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct medium types represented (distinct Type values).

measures.name: ShareOfCampaignAmount
measures.description: Share of this row/group's Amount relative to the total Amount for the same CampaignID (partitioned by Campaign).

measures.name: CombinationCount
measures.description: Number of snapshot records (product combinations) in the result set.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total amount (monetary value) summed across all captured product combinations in the snapshot.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average amount per product-combination snapshot record.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum amount observed across product-combination snapshot records.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum amount observed across product-combination snapshot records.

measures.name: DistinctCombinationNames
measures.description: Number of distinct product-combination names captured in the snapshot.

measures.name: CampaignAmountShare
measures.description: Share of the campaign-level amount represented by this product-combination within the same CampaignID (partitioned share). Expressed as a percentage of the campaign total.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total amount recorded in the snapshot (sum of Amount values).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average Amount per snapshot row.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of snapshot rows (distinct IDs).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the snapshot.

measures.name: Count_Type_1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of snapshot rows where Type = 1.

measures.name: Count_Type_2
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of snapshot rows where Type = 2.

measures.name: Count_Type_3
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of snapshot rows where Type = 3.

measures.name: Count_Type_4
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of snapshot rows where Type = 4.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of Amount (score) across all snapshot rows. Use this to measure total score value captured in the snapshot set.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average Amount (score) per snapshot row. Preserves the source precision of three decimal places.

measures.name: SnapshotCount
measures.description: Number of snapshot rows. Useful for understanding sample size and for calculating averages or rates.

measures.name: DistinctClassifierNodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct classifier nodes represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum Amount observed in the selected snapshot rows.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum Amount observed in the selected snapshot rows.

measures.name: ShareOfCampaign
measures.description: Proportion of the Campaign's total Amount represented by the current aggregation. Requires CampaignID in the query breakdown to be meaningful.

measures.name: RangeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct billing ranges captured in the snapshot

measures.name: MinFromPrice
measures.description: Lowest lower-bound price (FromPrice) across ranges

measures.name: MaxToPrice
measures.description: Highest upper-bound price (ToPrice) across ranges

measures.name: AverageFromPrice
measures.description: Average lower-bound price (FromPrice) across ranges

measures.name: AverageToPrice
measures.description: Average upper-bound price (ToPrice) across ranges

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average billing amount associated with each price range

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of billing amounts for all ranges in the snapshot (useful for aggregations)

measures.name: AverageRangeWidth
measures.description: Average width of the price range (ToPrice minus FromPrice)

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Number of campaign-segment-salesman assignment records (row count).

measures.name: OpenAssignmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignments that have not been finalized (FinalizedOn is NULL).

measures.name: IncludedQuantity
measures.description: Total number of items explicitly included across assignments.

measures.name: ExcludedQuantity
measures.description: Total number of items explicitly excluded across assignments.

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Total quantity considered for assignments (sum of TotalQuantity).

measures.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
measures.description: Total number of 'other' included items (nullable).

measures.name: SecondIncludedQuantity
measures.description: Total second-stage included quantity across assignments.

measures.name: SecondExcludedQuantity
measures.description: Total second-stage excluded quantity across assignments.

measures.name: SecondTotalQuantity
measures.description: Total second-stage quantity considered across assignments.

measures.name: AverageIncludedPerAssignment
measures.description: Average IncludedQuantity per assignment.

measures.name: AverageTotalPerAssignment
measures.description: Average TotalQuantity per assignment.

measures.name: InclusionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IncludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Share of included items relative to total items (IncludedQuantity / TotalQuantity).

measures.name: ExclusionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(ExcludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Share of excluded items relative to total items (ExcludedQuantity / TotalQuantity).

measures.name: SecondInclusionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(SecondTotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(SecondIncludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(SecondTotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Second-stage included share (SecondIncludedQuantity / SecondTotalQuantity).

measures.name: AvgHoursToInitialize
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LastInitializedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(hour, CreatedOn, LastInitializedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average hours between record creation and last initialization (null when LastInitializedOn is null).

measures.name: AvgHoursToFinalize
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(hour, CreatedOn, FinalizedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average hours between record creation and finalization (null when FinalizedOn is null).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows at this grain (campaign  segment  medium)

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Count of distinct campaigns represented in the current filter context

measures.name: ROCO_Average
measures.description: Average ROCO value for the campaign  segment  medium. ROCO is stored as a raw decimal (e.g., 0.123 = 12.3%).

measures.name: ROCO_Min
measures.description: Minimum observed ROCO value (raw decimal) within the current filter context

measures.name: ROCO_Max
measures.description: Maximum observed ROCO value (raw decimal) within the current filter context

measures.name: UserROCO_Average
measures.description: Average UserROCO index. This appears to be stored as an index where 100 = baseline (e.g., 105 indicates 5% above baseline).

measures.name: UserROCO_Min
measures.description: Minimum UserROCO value (index) within the current filter context

measures.name: UserROCO_Max
measures.description: Maximum UserROCO value (index) within the current filter context

measures.name: UserROCO_NonNullRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserROCO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows with a non-null UserROCO value (expressed as a percentage)

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows in the CampaignSegmentStatus fact (one row per segment status record).

measures.name: Distinct Segment Count
measures.description: Number of distinct segments represented in the current result set.

measures.name: Distinct Campaign Count
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the current result set.

measures.name: Active Segment Count (status = 1)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SegmentStatusID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of segments marked with SegmentStatusID = 1. Note: this assumes status code 1 denotes an 'active' segment  use the SegmentStatus lookup table to map IDs to business labels.

measures.name: Inactive Segment Count (status = 2)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SegmentStatusID = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of segments marked with SegmentStatusID = 2. Note: this assumes status code 2 denotes an 'inactive' segment  verify mapping in the SegmentStatus reference table.

measures.name: Percent Active
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN SegmentStatusID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows that are in status 1 (assumed active). Use SegmentStatus lookup to substitute the correct status id if needed.

measures.name: Average Segments per Campaign
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) END
measures.description: Average number of segment-status rows per campaign in the current result set.

measures.name: NewCustomerTargetCount
measures.description: Total number of new-customer targeting history records (one row per recorded targeting event).

measures.name: UniqueCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: UniqueSegmentCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customer segments targeted in the selected scope.

measures.name: FirstTargetDate
measures.description: The earliest CreatedOn timestamp in the aggregated set (first recorded targeting event).

measures.name: LastTargetDate
measures.description: The most recent CreatedOn timestamp in the aggregated set (last recorded targeting event).

measures.name: AverageAgeDays
measures.description: Average age in days of the targeting records relative to the current date (how many days since each record was created).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of grouping records in the snapshot (one row per campaign/segment/salesman/snapshot).

measures.name: SnapshotWorkingDays_Total
measures.description: Total working days aggregated for the grouping rows in the snapshot.

measures.name: SnapshotWorkingDays_Average
measures.description: Average number of working days per grouping row in the snapshot.

default_filters.description: Only show snapshots from the last 90 days by default.

measures.name: RocoTargetCustomers
measures.description: Number of existing (ROCO) customers included in the campaign target at the snapshot.

measures.name: RocoTargetAmount
measures.description: Monetary value of the ROCO portion of the campaign target.

measures.name: NewTargetCustomers
measures.description: Number of new customers included in the campaign target at the snapshot.

measures.name: NewTargetAmount
measures.description: Monetary value of the new-customer portion of the campaign target.

measures.name: TotalTargetCustomers
measures.description: Total number of customers (ROCO + New) targeted in the campaign.

measures.name: TotalTargetAmount
measures.description: Total monetary target for the campaign (ROCO + New).

measures.name: RocoUpToDateCustomers
measures.description: Number of ROCO customers who are up-to-date (achieved) at the snapshot.

measures.name: RocoUpToDateAmount
measures.description: Monetary value achieved for ROCO customers at the snapshot.

measures.name: NewUpToDateCustomers
measures.description: Number of new customers who are up-to-date (achieved) at the snapshot.

measures.name: NewUpToDateAmount
measures.description: Monetary value achieved for new customers at the snapshot.

measures.name: TotalUpToDateCustomers
measures.description: Total number of customers who are up-to-date (achieved) at the snapshot.

measures.name: TotalUpToDateAmount
measures.description: Total monetary value achieved at the snapshot (ROCO + New).

measures.name: RocoSegmentCustomers
measures.description: Number of ROCO customers in the specific segment for the campaign.

measures.name: RocoSegmentAmount
measures.description: Monetary value of ROCO customers for the segment in the campaign.

measures.name: NewSegmentCustomers
measures.description: Number of new customers in the segment for the campaign.

measures.name: NewSegmentAmount
measures.description: Monetary value of new customers for the segment in the campaign.

measures.name: TotalSegmentCustomers
measures.description: Total customers in the segment for the campaign.

measures.name: TotalSegmentAmount
measures.description: Total monetary value for the segment in the campaign.

measures.name: RocoTargetPercentageCustomers
measures.description: Average percentage of ROCO customers achieved vs ROCO target (per row). Use a weighted measure if you need customer-weighted aggregation.

measures.name: RocoTargetPercentageAmount
measures.description: Average percentage of ROCO amount achieved vs ROCO amount target (per row).

measures.name: NewTargetPercentageCustomers
measures.description: Average percentage of new customers achieved vs new-customer target (per row).

measures.name: NewTargetPercentageAmount
measures.description: Average percentage of new amount achieved vs new amount target (per row).
