measures.name: TotalTargetPercentageCustomers
measures.description: Average percentage of total customers achieved vs total target (per row).

measures.name: TotalTargetPercentageAmount
measures.description: Average percentage of total amount achieved vs total amount target (per row).

measures.name: RocoUpToDatePercentageCustomers
measures.description: Average percentage of ROCO customers that are up-to-date (per row).

measures.name: RocoUpToDatePercentageAmount
measures.description: Average percentage of ROCO amount that is up-to-date (per row).

measures.name: NewUpToDatePercentageCustomers
measures.description: Average percentage of new customers that are up-to-date (per row).

measures.name: NewUpToDatePercentageAmount
measures.description: Average percentage of new amount that is up-to-date (per row).

measures.name: TotalUpToDatePercentageCustomers
measures.description: Average percentage of total customers that are up-to-date (per row).

measures.name: TotalUpToDatePercentageAmount
measures.description: Average percentage of total amount that is up-to-date (per row).

measures.name: KpiRocoCustomers
measures.description: KPI for ROCO customers (stored as ratio/percentage per row).

measures.name: KpiRocoAmount
measures.description: KPI for ROCO amount (stored as ratio/percentage per row).

measures.name: KpiAvoNewCustomers
measures.description: KPI average/new-customer-related metric (stored per row).

measures.name: KpiNewConversionRate
measures.description: KPI measuring conversion rate for new customers (stored per row).

measures.name: TotalTargetCoverage_Customers
measures.description: Coverage of total customer target: total up-to-date customers divided by total target customers (0-1).

measures.name: TotalTargetCoverage_Amount
measures.description: Coverage of total amount target: total up-to-date amount divided by total target amount (0-1).

measures.name: TotalTargetGapAmount
measures.description: Absolute gap in currency between the target amount and the up-to-date achieved amount.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of UDF value records (rows) in this table

measures.name: IncludedQuantity
measures.description: Sum of included quantity for this UDF value

measures.name: ExcludedQuantity
measures.description: Sum of excluded quantity for this UDF value

measures.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
measures.description: Sum of included 'others' quantity (optional/nullable) for this UDF value

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of total quantity evaluated for this UDF value

measures.name: NetIncludedQuantity
measures.description: Net included quantity after subtracting excluded quantity

measures.name: InclusionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IncludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Share of total quantity that is included (IncludedQuantity / TotalQuantity)

measures.name: ExclusionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(ExcludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Share of total quantity that is excluded (ExcludedQuantity / TotalQuantity)

measures.name: FinalizedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have been finalized (FinalizedOn is not null)

measures.name: InitializedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LastInitializedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have been initialized at least once (LastInitializedOn is not null)

measures.name: UDF Record Count
measures.description: Number of user-defined field (UDF) records (rows) in this table.

measures.name: Distinct UDF Names
measures.description: Count of distinct UDF Name values.

measures.name: Included Quantity
measures.description: Total number of items explicitly included by the UDF rule across records.

measures.name: Excluded Quantity
measures.description: Total number of items explicitly excluded by the UDF rule across records.

measures.name: Total Quantity
measures.description: Total number of items evaluated by the UDF rule across records.

measures.name: Included Others Quantity
measures.description: Total number of items included by other/auxiliary logic (nullable column treated as 0).

measures.name: Included Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IncludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Percentage of total items that were included (IncludedQuantity / TotalQuantity). Null when TotalQuantity = 0.

measures.name: Excluded Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(ExcludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Percentage of total items that were excluded (ExcludedQuantity / TotalQuantity). Null when TotalQuantity = 0.

measures.name: Finalized Record Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of UDF records that have a FinalizedOn timestamp (i.e., finalized).

measures.name: Most Recent Finalized On
measures.description: Most recent FinalizedOn timestamp across the selected records.

measures.name: Most Recent Initialization
measures.description: Most recent LastInitializedOn timestamp across the selected records.

measures.name: Earliest Created On
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp in the current selection (record creation date).

measures.name: Average Days Since Created
measures.description: Average number of days from CreatedOn to today for the returned records.

measures.name: Average Days Since Last Initialized
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LastInitializedOn IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE DATEDIFF(day, LastInitializedOn, GETDATE()) END)
measures.description: Average number of days from LastInitializedOn to today for records that have been initialized.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of UDF string records (rows) in this table

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of TotalQuantity across rows  represents the total number of items/elements considered by the expression

measures.name: IncludedQuantity
measures.description: Sum of items explicitly included by the UDF expression

measures.name: ExcludedQuantity
measures.description: Sum of items explicitly excluded by the UDF expression

measures.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
measures.description: Sum of 'other' included items (nullable column aggregated). Use when additional included buckets are tracked separately

measures.name: InclusionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(IncludedQuantity) / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Portion of total items that were included by the UDF expression (IncludedQuantity / TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when TotalQuantity is zero.

measures.name: ExclusionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(ExcludedQuantity) / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Portion of total items that were excluded by the UDF expression (ExcludedQuantity / TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when TotalQuantity is zero.

measures.name: IncludedOthersRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(IncludedOthersQuantity) / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Portion of total items counted in IncludedOthersQuantity relative to TotalQuantity. NULL when TotalQuantity is zero.

measures.name: InitializedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LastInitializedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have been initialized (LastInitializedOn is not null)

measures.name: FinalizedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have been finalized (FinalizedOn is not null)

measures.name: AverageDaysSinceCreation
measures.description: Average number of days elapsed since each record's CreatedOn timestamp

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows / user-defined string entries in this table.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns referenced by these UDF entries.

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of TotalQuantity across rows. Represents the total population considered for each UDF entry.

measures.name: IncludedQuantity
measures.description: Total included quantity summed across all UDF entries.

measures.name: ExcludedQuantity
measures.description: Total excluded quantity summed across all UDF entries.

measures.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
measures.description: Sum of IncludedOthersQuantity (nullable) across all rows.

measures.name: IncludedRate
measures.expression: NULLIF(SUM(TotalQuantity),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IncludedQuantity) * 1.0 / NULLIF(SUM(TotalQuantity),0) END
measures.description: Share of included quantity relative to total quantity. Computed as SUM(IncludedQuantity) / SUM(TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0.

measures.name: ExcludedRate
measures.expression: NULLIF(SUM(TotalQuantity),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(ExcludedQuantity) * 1.0 / NULLIF(SUM(TotalQuantity),0) END
measures.description: Share of excluded quantity relative to total quantity. Computed as SUM(ExcludedQuantity) / SUM(TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0.

measures.name: PctRowsWithIncludeExpression
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IncludeExpression IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(IncludeExpression)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1),0)
measures.description: Percentage of rows that have a non-empty IncludeExpression defined.

measures.name: FinalizedRowCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have been finalized (FinalizedOn is not null).

measures.name: AvgIncludedPerRow
measures.description: Average IncludedQuantity per row (nulls excluded).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of UDF string rows (records) in this table.

measures.name: IncludedQuantity
measures.description: Sum of the IncludedQuantity values. Represents how many items/targets were included by the UDF rule.

measures.name: ExcludedQuantity
measures.description: Sum of the ExcludedQuantity values. Represents how many items/targets were excluded by the UDF rule.

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of the TotalQuantity values. Represents the total population considered for this UDF rule.

measures.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
measures.description: Sum of IncludedOthersQuantity. Nullable column aggregated to show additional included counts where applicable.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns referenced by these UDF string entries.

measures.name: IncludedShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IncludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Proportion of included quantity relative to the total quantity (IncludedQuantity / TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when TotalQuantity is zero.

measures.name: MostRecentLastInitializedOn
measures.description: Most recent LastInitializedOn timestamp for the grouped rows.

measures.name: MostRecentFinalizedOn
measures.description: Most recent FinalizedOn timestamp for the grouped rows.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of rows / business points in the table (at the selected grain).

measures.name: Count_Solvency_DueToDenyPayment
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToDenyPayment = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points flagged for solvency due to denied payment.

measures.name: Pct_Solvency_DueToDenyPayment
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToDenyPayment = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points flagged for solvency due to denied payment.

measures.name: Count_Solvency_DueToDisappearance
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToDisappearance = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points flagged for solvency due to disappearance.

measures.name: Pct_Solvency_DueToDisappearance
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToDisappearance = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points flagged for solvency due to disappearance.

measures.name: Count_Solvency_DueToPrecariousnessLegal
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToPrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points flagged for solvency due to legal precariousness.

measures.name: Pct_Solvency_DueToPrecariousnessLegal
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToPrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points flagged for solvency due to legal precariousness.

measures.name: Count_Solvency_DueToBreakPromise
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToBreakPromise = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points flagged for solvency due to breaking promises.

measures.name: Pct_Solvency_DueToBreakPromise
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToBreakPromise = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points flagged for solvency due to breaking promises.

measures.name: Count_Solvency_DueToVoidNotes
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToVoidNotes = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points flagged for solvency due to voided notes.

measures.name: Pct_Solvency_DueToVoidNotes
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDueToVoidNotes = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points flagged for solvency due to voided notes.

measures.name: Count_NoSolvencyIssues
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ISNULL(SolvencyDueToDenyPayment,0) = 0 AND ISNULL(SolvencyDueToDisappearance,0) = 0 AND ISNULL(SolvencyDueToPrecariousnessLegal,0) = 0 AND ISNULL(SolvencyDueToBreakPromise,0) = 0 AND ISNULL(SolvencyDueToVoidNotes,0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points with no solvency flags set (all checks false or null).

measures.name: Pct_NoSolvencyIssues
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ISNULL(SolvencyDueToDenyPayment,0) = 0 AND ISNULL(SolvencyDueToDisappearance,0) = 0 AND ISNULL(SolvencyDueToPrecariousnessLegal,0) = 0 AND ISNULL(SolvencyDueToBreakPromise,0) = 0 AND ISNULL(SolvencyDueToVoidNotes,0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points with no solvency flags set.

measures.name: CalendarEntries
measures.description: Total number of planning calendar entries (rows). Each row represents a planned item or event for a campaign on a specific Date.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns that have at least one planning calendar entry in the dataset.

measures.name: PlannedDays
measures.description: Number of unique calendar days that have one or more planning entries. Casts Date to date to ensure day-level uniqueness.

measures.name: AverageEntriesPerCampaign
measures.description: Average number of planning entries per campaign. Returns NULL when there are no campaigns.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of history events (rows) recorded.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BatchID values present in the selected scope (distinct planning batches processed).

measures.name: SumRowsAffected
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all recorded events. Null RowsAffected values are ignored by the SUM.

measures.name: AvgRowsAffectedPerEvent
measures.description: Average RowsAffected per event (averages only non-null RowsAffected values).

measures.name: MaxRowsAffected
measures.description: Maximum RowsAffected recorded for a single event.

measures.name: MinRowsAffected
measures.description: Minimum RowsAffected recorded for a single event (ignores NULLs).

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Status = 1 (interpreted as success based on observed values).

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status IS NOT NULL AND Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Status is present and not equal to 1 (interpreted as non-success/failure).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of events with Status = 1 (success) over total events. Returns NULL when there are no events.

measures.name: FirstTimeStamp
measures.description: Earliest TimeStamp observed in the selected scope (first recorded event time).

measures.name: LastTimeStamp
measures.description: Latest TimeStamp observed in the selected scope (most recent recorded event time).

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the table (one row per BusinessPointID).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the fact (useful for data quality checks; should match BusinessPointCount when one row per BusinessPointID).

measures.name: DistinctBroaderAreaCount
measures.description: Number of distinct broader area identifiers referenced by the business points.

measures.name: PercentWithBroaderArea
measures.description: Share of rows that have a non-null BroaderAreaID (indicator of coverage/completeness).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (associations) in the fact for the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctBroaderAreaCount
measures.description: Number of distinct broader areas represented in the current filter context.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the business point dimension (expected).
Reference to the broader area / region dimension (expected).

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Total number of business points in the set (rows).

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPointCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points marked as active.

measures.name: ActivePercentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(BusinessPointID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(BusinessPointID) END
measures.description: Share of business points that are active.

measures.name: PaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with a recorded payment refusal flag.

measures.name: PaymentRefusalRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(BusinessPointID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(BusinessPointID) END
measures.description: Share of business points with payment refusal.

measures.name: DisappearedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points flagged as disappeared.

measures.name: PrecariousnessLegalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points flagged with legal precariousness.

measures.name: ContinuousPaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContinuousPaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with continuous payment refusal.

measures.name: SealedCheckCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SealedCheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with a sealed check flag.

measures.name: ProspectCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ProspectCreatedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points that have a prospect creation datetime (ProspectCreatedOn).

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceLastUpdate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LastUpdateOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, LastUpdateOn, GETDATE()) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of days since each business point's LastUpdateOn (NULLs excluded).

measures.name: MaxDaysSinceLastUpdate
measures.expression: MAX(CASE WHEN LastUpdateOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, LastUpdateOn, GETDATE()) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Maximum number of days since LastUpdateOn among business points.

measures.name: DistinctLocationPrefectureCount
measures.description: Number of distinct location prefectures represented by the current set of business points.

measures.name: DistinctLocationMunicipalityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct location municipalities represented by the current set of business points.

measures.name: Classification Count
measures.description: Total number of classification records (row count) in the result set.

measures.name: Distinct Classifiers
measures.description: Number of unique classifiers observed (ClassifierID). Nulls are not counted.

measures.name: Distinct Classifier Nodes
measures.description: Number of unique classifier nodes (ClassifierNodeID).

measures.name: Null Classifier Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClassifierID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where ClassifierID is NULL  useful to track missing classifier assignments.

measures.name: Share of BusinessPoint Classifications (by Node)
measures.description: Proportion of classifications for a given ClassifierNode within its BusinessPoint. Calculated as node count divided by total classifications for the BusinessPoint.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the fact (detail) set

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented

measures.name: DistinctContractProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct contract products represented

measures.name: TotalContractAmount
measures.description: Sum of ContractAmount recorded on the contract detail rows

measures.name: TotalCPPrice
measures.description: Sum of contract-product list prices (CPPrice)

measures.name: TotalCPDiscount
measures.description: Sum of direct discounts applied to contract products

measures.name: TotalCPRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied to contract products

measures.name: TotalCPAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of manual/altered adjustments to contract-product amounts

measures.name: CPNetAmount
measures.description: Net amount for contract-product lines after discounts and alterations

measures.name: TotalAdvPrice
measures.description: Sum of advertisement list prices (AdvPrice)

measures.name: TotalAdvDiscount
measures.description: Sum of direct discounts applied to advertisements

measures.name: TotalAdvRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied to advertisements

measures.name: TotalAdvAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of manual/altered adjustments to advertisement amounts

measures.name: AdvNetAmount
measures.description: Net amount for advertisement lines after discounts and alterations

measures.name: EffectiveCPDiscountRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CPPrice) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(CPDiscount) + SUM(CPRulesDiscount)) / SUM(CPPrice) END
measures.description: Effective discount rate on contract-product price (discounts / price)

measures.name: EffectiveAdvDiscountRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(AdvPrice) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(AdvDiscount) + SUM(AdvRulesDiscount)) / SUM(AdvPrice) END
measures.description: Effective discount rate on advertisement price (discounts / price)

measures.name: ContractCount
measures.description: Total number of contract rows at the grain (BusinessPointID + ContractID).

measures.name: SignedContractCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have a recorded SignedDate.

measures.name: ActiveContractCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractState = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts considered 'active'. This assumes ContractState = 1 denotes active  adjust the value in the expression to match your environment's state coding.

measures.name: DistinctOriginalContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct original contracts referenced (OriginalContractID). Null OriginalContractID values are excluded from the distinct count.

measures.name: ContractsWithAdvBegin
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AdvBeginDateMax IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have an advance-begin date (AdvBeginDateMax).

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceSigned
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, SignedDate, GETDATE()) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of days from SignedDate to today for contracts with a SignedDate. Null SignedDate values are excluded.

measures.name: MaxAdvBeginDate
measures.description: Most recent advance-begin date recorded in the current aggregation context.

measures.name: NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount (SUM)
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription total amounts before discounts

measures.name: SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount (SUM)
measures.description: Sum of subscription total amounts before discounts

measures.name: RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount (SUM)
measures.description: Sum of renewal total amounts before discounts

measures.name: TotalAmountBeforeDiscount (SUM)
measures.description: Combined sum of all amounts before discounts (non-subscription + subscription + renewal)

measures.name: NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount (SUM)
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription total amounts after discounts

measures.name: SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount (SUM)
measures.description: Sum of subscription total amounts after discounts

measures.name: RenewalTotalAmountAfterDiscount (SUM)
measures.description: Sum of renewal total amounts after discounts

measures.name: TotalAmountAfterDiscount (SUM)
measures.description: Combined sum of all amounts after discounts (non-subscription + subscription + renewal)

measures.name: DiscountAmount (SUM)
measures.description: Total discount amount applied (before - after) summed across records

measures.name: DiscountPercent (AVG)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount + SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount + RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * (SUM(NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount + SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount + RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) - SUM(NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount + SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount + RenewalTotalAmountAfterDiscount)) / SUM(NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount + SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount + RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) END
measures.description: Percentage discount relative to total amount before discounts. Null when total before discount is zero.

measures.name: PrePrintedTotalAmount (SUM)
measures.description: Sum of pre-printed total amounts

measures.name: FinalPrice (SUM)
measures.description: Sum of final prices for contract products

measures.name: FinalPrice (AVG)
measures.description: Average final price per contract product

measures.name: ContractProductRowCount
measures.description: Number of contract-product rows (useful when aggregating by contract or other dimensions)

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts in the current filter context

measures.name: AverageDiscountPerContractProduct
measures.expression: SUM((NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount + SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount + RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) - (NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount + SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount + RenewalTotalAmountAfterDiscount)) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Average discount amount per contract-product row

measures.name: EarliestSignedDate
measures.description: Earliest signed date across the aggregated rows

measures.name: LatestSignedDate
measures.description: Latest signed date across the aggregated rows

measures.name: EarliestAdvEndDate
measures.description: Earliest advertisement end date across the aggregated rows

foreign_keys.description: References the Contract dimension
References the ContractProduct dimension

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the CanvasStage1CustomerSolvency table (counts each record).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerSolvencyIDs
measures.description: Number of distinct ID values  the unique identifier count for solvency stage records.

measures.name: DistinctDescriptions
measures.description: Number of distinct Description values present in the table.

measures.name: PercentOfTotalRows
measures.description: Share of total rows that the current grouping/selection represents (useful when breaking down by Description).

measures.name: HasDescriptionPercent
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Description IS NOT NULL AND Description <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of rows that have a non-empty Description value.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of rows in the table.

measures.name: Distinct ID Count
measures.description: Number of distinct ID values. Useful to detect duplicates or to validate that ID is unique per row.

measures.name: Distinct Description Count
measures.description: Number of distinct Description values. Indicates cardinality of the channel type descriptions.

measures.name: Percent Empty Description
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Description IS NULL OR LEN(Description)=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1),0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows that have an empty or NULL Description. Helps assess data quality.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of records (rows) in the table.

measures.name: DistinctChannelTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct channel type identifiers.

measures.name: DescriptionsPresent
measures.description: Number of rows where Description is non-null (i.e., channel types that have a description).

measures.name: CaseCount
measures.description: Total number of cases (row count).

measures.name: CompletedCaseCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that have a completion date (CompletedOn is not null).

measures.name: OpenCaseCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that are still open (no CompletedOn timestamp).

measures.name: PercentCompleted
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of cases that have been completed (CompletedCaseCount / CaseCount).

measures.name: AverageTimeToCompleteHours
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) END) / 3600.0
measures.description: Average elapsed time from case creation to completion in hours. Excludes cases without CompletedOn.

measures.name: AverageTimeToCompleteDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) END) / 86400.0
measures.description: Average elapsed time from case creation to completion in days. Excludes cases without CompletedOn.

measures.name: MedianTimeToCompleteHours_estimate
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn)) OVER () / 3600.0
measures.description: Estimated median elapsed time from creation to completion in hours. Requires DB support for PERCENTILE_CONT and excludes null completions.

measures.name: DistinctInitiatorCount
measures.description: Number of distinct initiators who created cases.

measures.name: CasesByCustomerIndicator4Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CustomerIndicatorId = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases flagged with CustomerIndicatorId = 4. Useful for tracking a specific customer indicator segment.

default_filters.description: Common operational state filter (include primary/active state rows).

measures.name: AttachmentCount
measures.description: Total number of attachment records.

measures.name: DistinctCasesWithAttachment
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have one or more attachments.

measures.name: ActiveAttachmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments that are not marked as deleted.

measures.name: DeletedAttachmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments that are marked as deleted.

measures.name: PercentDeleted
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of attachments that are deleted (DeletedAttachmentCount / AttachmentCount).

measures.name: AttachmentsWithFile
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FileName IS NOT NULL AND FileName <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attachments that reference a stored file (non-empty FileName).

measures.name: AttachmentsWithDisplayName
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DisplayName IS NOT NULL AND DisplayName <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attachments that have a DisplayName value.

measures.name: LatestAttachmentCreatedOn
measures.description: Most recent CreatedOn timestamp among the attachments in the current context.

measures.name: EarliestAttachmentCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp among the attachments in the current context.

measures.name: AverageAttachmentsPerCase
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CaseID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(ID) / COUNT(DISTINCT CaseID) END
measures.description: Average number of attachments per case in the current filtering context.

measures.name: CommentCount
measures.description: Total number of comment records (rows). Use this to measure comment volume.

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have one or more comments in the current filter context.

measures.name: AvgCommentLengthChars
measures.description: Average length of comment text measured in characters. Useful as a proxy for comment verbosity.

measures.name: MaxCommentLengthChars
measures.description: Length in characters of the longest comment in the current filter context.

measures.name: CommentsWithTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of comments that are associated with a task (TaskID not null).

measures.name: PctCommentsWithTask
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of comments that are linked to a task, relative to total comments in the context.

measures.name: AvgCommentsPerCase
measures.description: Average number of comments per case within the current filter context.

measures.name: CommentsLast30Days
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreatedOn >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of comments created in the last 30 days (relative to query execution time). Useful for recent activity monitoring.

measures.name: ContactEventsCount
measures.description: Number of contact/event rows in the fact (one row per recorded contact instance).

measures.name: TotalFinalPrice
measures.description: Aggregate of sumFinalPrice for the grain  total monetary value associated with the contact rows.

measures.name: AverageFinalPrice
measures.description: Average sumFinalPrice per contact/event row.

measures.name: MinFinalPrice
measures.description: Minimum recorded sumFinalPrice for the selected grain.

measures.name: MaxFinalPrice
measures.description: Maximum recorded sumFinalPrice for the selected grain.

measures.name: DistinctContractsCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contract identifiers present in the filtered set.

measures.name: AverageSeniority
measures.description: Average Senniority value across the selected rows (numeric indicator of seniority level).

measures.name: MaxContactDate
measures.description: The most recent contact date in the aggregation window.

foreign_keys.description: Likely owner/business-partner identifier; validate against BusinessPartner dimension.
Contract identifier string/value; map to the Contract dimension if available.
Contact channel/identifier (phone/email hash/key). Map to contact methods dimension if present.
Date/time of the contact event; should join to a Date/Calendar dimension on the date portion.

display.notes: Name has a high null rate (~95%) and may be an optional attribute rather than a reliable breakdown. BPMinAdvBeginDate appears to be an additional business-date attribute and can be exposed as a filter or breakdown if needed.

measures.name: Preprinted Customer Count
measures.description: Total number of preprinted customers allocated to the channel for the campaign.

measures.name: Preprinted Amount
measures.description: Total preprinted monetary amount assigned to the channel (USD).

measures.name: Loss Customers
measures.description: Total number of customers classified as 'loss' for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: Loss Amount
measures.description: Total monetary value lost for the channel/campaign (USD).

measures.name: Increase Customers
measures.description: Total number of customers classified as 'increase' for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: Increase Amount
measures.description: Total monetary increase associated with 'increase' customers (USD).

measures.name: Reduction Customers
measures.description: Total number of customers classified as 'reduction' for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: Reduction Amount
measures.description: Total monetary reduction associated with 'reduction' customers (USD).

measures.name: No Changes Customers
measures.description: Total number of customers with no changes in the channel/campaign.

measures.name: No Changes Amount
measures.description: Total monetary value for customers with no changes (USD).

measures.name: ROCO Customers
measures.description: Total ROCO (return on channel) customers for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: ROCO Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount attributed to ROCO customers (USD).

measures.name: New Customers
measures.description: Total number of new customers acquired via the channel/campaign.

measures.name: New Amount
measures.description: Total monetary value from new customers (USD).

measures.name: CI Customers
measures.description: Total customers categorized as CI for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: CI Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount attributed to CI customers (USD).

measures.name: Number Of Visits
measures.description: Sum of visits recorded for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: Number Of Visits (CO)
measures.description: Sum of CO visits recorded for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: Number Of Visits Total
measures.description: Aggregate total visits (may include weighted or aggregate metric depending on source).

measures.name: Number Of Visits CO Total
measures.description: Aggregate total CO visits.

measures.name: Conv Rate (percentage)
measures.description: Average conversion rate for the channel/campaign (expressed as percent). Use AVG to aggregate row-level percentages.

measures.name: Number Of CO
measures.description: Total number of CO occurrences for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: Amount Of CO
measures.description: Total monetary amount for CO occurrences (USD).

measures.name: Loss Customer Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of customers classified as loss (percentage points).

measures.name: Loss Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of amount classified as loss (percentage points).

measures.name: Increase Customer Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of customers classified as increase (percentage points).

measures.name: Increase Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of amount classified as increase (percentage points).

measures.name: Reduction Customer Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of customers classified as reduction (percentage points).

measures.name: Reduction Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of amount classified as reduction (percentage points).

measures.name: Number Of CO Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage representation of CO counts (percentage points).

measures.name: Amount Of CO Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage representation of CO amounts (percentage points).

measures.name: No Changes Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of customers with no changes (percentage points).

measures.name: No Changes Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of amount with no changes (percentage points).

measures.name: ROCO Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average ROCO customers percentage (percentage points).

measures.name: ROCO Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average ROCO amount percentage (percentage points).

measures.name: New Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of new customers (percentage points).

measures.name: New Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of amount attributed to new customers (percentage points).

measures.name: CI Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average CI customers percentage (percentage points).

measures.name: CI Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average CI amount percentage (percentage points).

measures.name: Working Days
measures.description: Total working days in the targeting period across records.

measures.name: Salesmen
measures.description: Total number of salesmen allocated to the channel/campaign.

measures.name: Mandays
measures.description: Total mandays estimated for the channel/campaign.

measures.name: Average AvoNew
measures.description: Average of the AvoNew metric across rows (source-specific meaning; interpreted as an average index/value).

measures.name: Total Customers Targeted (derived)
measures.expression: SUM(COALESCE(NewCustomers,0) + COALESCE(NoChangesCustomers,0) + COALESCE(ncreaseCustomers,0) + COALESCE(ReductionCustomers,0) + COALESCE(ROCOCustomers,0) + COALESCE(CICustomers,0))
measures.description: Derived total of all customer categories included in the targeting record (new, no-change, increase, reduction, ROCO, CI).

measures.name: Check Count
measures.description: Total number of check records.

measures.name: Distinct Check Numbers
measures.description: Number of distinct check numbers observed.

measures.name: Distinct Publishers
measures.description: Count of unique check publishers (payees) in the dataset.

measures.name: Same Publisher Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSamePublisher = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of checks where the publisher equals the related owner (IsSamePublisher = true).

measures.name: Percent Same Publisher
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsSamePublisher = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of checks where the publisher is the same as the owner (percentage of rows).

measures.name: Checks Expired
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckExpirationDate < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of checks with an expiration date prior to the current time (expired checks).

measures.name: Checks Expiring in Next 30 Days
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckExpirationDate BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND DATEADD(day, 30, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of checks that will expire within the next 30 days.

measures.name: Average Days Until Expiration
measures.description: Average number of days from now until the check expiration. Negative values indicate already expired checks.

measures.name: Earliest Expiration Date
measures.description: The earliest (minimum) check expiration date in the current filter context.

measures.name: Most Recent Publish Date
measures.description: Most recent check publish timestamp observed.

measures.name: Missing Publish Date Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckPublishDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of checks that have no publish date recorded.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of classification records (rows) in this table.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPoint entities that have at least one classification row.

measures.name: DistinctDMKeys
measures.description: Number of distinct DMKey values referenced by these classification records.

measures.name: DistinctDMTables
measures.description: Number of distinct DMTable values referenced by the classification rows.

measures.name: AvgClassificationsPerBusinessPoint
measures.description: Average number of classification rows per distinct business point (records / distinct business points).

measures.name: PercentWithDMCharKey
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)*1.0/NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of classification records that have a non-null DMCharKey.

measures.name: CallCount
measures.description: Total number of click-to-call events (one row per event).

measures.name: UniquePhoneCount
measures.description: Number of distinct phone numbers dialed.

measures.name: DistinctUserCount
measures.description: Number of distinct users who initiated click-to-call events.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks associated with click-to-call events.

measures.name: PercentWithKSCallIdentifier
measures.description: Share of calls that have a KSCallIdentifier recorded (KSCallIdentifier is nullable; counts non-null values).

measures.name: CallsPerUser
measures.description: Average number of calls per active user (calls divided by distinct users).

measures.name: MostRecentCallTimestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent click-to-call event in the current filter context.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of log entries (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctSessions
measures.description: Number of distinct ClickToCallHarmonyHistory sessions represented.

measures.name: UniqueTextValues
measures.description: Number of distinct Text values (unique log messages/URLs). Nulls are excluded.

measures.name: FirstEventTimestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest log entry in the selected scope.

measures.name: LastEventTimestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the latest log entry in the selected scope.

measures.name: EventsPerSessionAvg
measures.description: Average number of log entries per ClickToCallHarmonyHistory session (average events per session).

measures.name: ErrorEvents
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LogEntryType IN (2, 3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of log entries classified as errors. (Assumes LogEntryType values 2 and 3 indicate error conditions.)

measures.name: ErrorRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN LogEntryType IN (2, 3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of log entries that are error events (ErrorEvents divided by EventCount).

display.notes: LogEntryType is an integer code; consider mapping to a LogEntryType dimension for readable labels. Text can contain URLs and HTML; consider cleansing for downstream display.

measures.name: Total Action Events
measures.description: Total number of action history records (each row represents a recorded action event).

measures.name: Distinct Actions
measures.description: Number of distinct ActionIDs observed in the fact (unique action types or identifiers).

measures.name: Distinct Batches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the action history.

measures.name: Distinct Entity Types
measures.description: Number of distinct entity types referenced by the action history.

measures.name: Average Actions Per Batch
measures.description: Average number of action events per batch (total events divided by number of distinct batches).

measures.name: Event Count
measures.description: Number of batch history events (rows).

measures.name: Distinct Batches
measures.description: Number of distinct BatchID values represented in the current filter/context.

measures.name: Total Rows Affected
measures.description: Sum of RowsAffected across events. Nulls are treated as 0.

measures.name: Average Rows Affected per Event
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per event (nulls treated as 0).

measures.name: Events per Batch (Average)
measures.description: Average number of events per batch. Returns null when there are no batches to avoid division by zero.

measures.name: First Event Time
measures.description: Earliest event timestamp in the current filter/context.

measures.name: Last Event Time
measures.description: Latest event timestamp in the current filter/context.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the originating batch (inferred).
Lookup/enum for action performed on the batch (inferred).
Lookup/enum describing the entity type affected (inferred).
Lookup/enum for record type (inferred).

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of error action history records (one row per recorded action).

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches that have one or more error action history records.

measures.name: ActionsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of error actions recorded per batch. NULL when there are no batches in the filter context.

measures.name: DistinctEntityTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct entity types present in the current filter context.

measures.name: ShareOfActionsByContext
measures.description: Proportion of actions in the current row / breakdown relative to all actions in the query scope. Implemented as a windowed share and requires a query engine that supports window functions.

measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Total number of contracts (row count).

measures.name: Total Final Price
measures.description: Sum of FinalPrice for contracts. Null FinalPrice rows are ignored.

measures.name: Average Final Price
measures.description: Average FinalPrice across contracts with a non-null FinalPrice.

measures.name: Total User Discount Amount
measures.description: Sum of user-applied discounts on contracts.

measures.name: Total User Discount Amount (PPC)
measures.description: Sum of per-product/customer user discount amount (UserDiscountAmountPPC).

measures.name: Average User Discount Percent
measures.description: Average user discount percent applied to contracts.

measures.name: Subscription Contracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts flagged as subscription-based.

measures.name: Cancelled Contracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CancelledOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have a cancellation timestamp.

measures.name: Contracts with PDF
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PdfID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have an associated PDF document (PdfID).

measures.name: Average Days from Signed to Transfer to EBS
measures.description: Average number of days between SignedDate and TransferDateToEBS for contracts where both dates exist. Measures operational lead time for EBS transfer.

measures.name: Average Days from Release to EBS Transfer
measures.description: Average days between ReleaseDate and TransferDateToEBS for contracts where both dates exist.

measures.name: ChangeCount
measures.description: Total number of archived-number change events (rows) in the table.

measures.name: DistinctContractsChanged
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that experienced at least one archived-number change.

measures.name: NewAssignmentsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OldArchivedNumber IS NULL AND NewArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where an archived number was assigned (previous value was NULL).

measures.name: RemovalsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewArchivedNumber IS NULL AND OldArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where an archived number was removed (new value is NULL).

measures.name: ReassignmentsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OldArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL AND NewArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL AND OldArchivedNumber <> NewArchivedNumber THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where the archived number changed from one non-null value to a different non-null value.

measures.name: PercentNewAssignments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OldArchivedNumber IS NULL AND NewArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of events that were new archived-number assignments (OldArchivedNumber null).

measures.name: AverageChangesPerContract
measures.description: Average number of archived-number change events per distinct contract in the current aggregation.

measures.name: FirstChangeOn
measures.description: Earliest change event timestamp within the aggregation.

measures.name: LastChangeOn
measures.description: Most recent change event timestamp within the aggregation.

measures.name: DocumentCount
measures.description: Total number of document records (rows).

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that have at least one document.

measures.name: DistinctFilenames
measures.description: Number of distinct filenames after trimming trailing spaces.

measures.name: FilesWithDMCharKeyCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of documents that have a DMCharKey (linked to external document management key).

measures.name: PercentWithDMCharKey
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percentage of documents that have a DMCharKey.

measures.name: PdfCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LOWER(RTRIM(Filename)) LIKE '%.pdf' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of documents where the filename ends with .pdf (case-insensitive).

measures.name: AverageFilesPerContract
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT ContractID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(ID) / COUNT(DISTINCT ContractID) END
measures.description: Average number of files attached per contract in the current aggregation context.

measures.name: DistinctCreators
measures.description: Number of distinct CreatedBy values (helps identify migration/import activity).

measures.name: LatestCreatedOn
measures.description: Most recent document creation timestamp in the aggregation.

measures.name: EarliestCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest document creation timestamp in the aggregation.

measures.name: Offer Count
measures.description: Total number of contract offers (one row per offer ID).

measures.name: Distinct Target Group Items
measures.description: Number of distinct TargetGroupItemValueID values referenced by offers.

measures.name: Modified Offer Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ModifiedOn IS NOT NULL AND ModifiedOn <> CreatedOn THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of offers that were modified after creation.

measures.name: Modified Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN ModifiedOn IS NOT NULL AND ModifiedOn <> CreatedOn THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of offers that were modified after creation (ModifiedOn different from CreatedOn).

measures.name: Average Time to Modify (seconds)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ModifiedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, ModifiedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time between creation and first modification, in seconds (NULL if never modified).

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total monetary value of the contract offer detail rows (Amount aggregated).

measures.name: AverageAmountPerUnit
measures.description: Average amount per unit (total Amount divided by total Quantity). NULL when total Quantity is zero.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerRow
measures.description: Average Amount value per row.

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of Quantity across the selected rows.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of contract offer detail rows.

measures.name: DistinctUdacCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Udac (product/asset) values referenced in the detail rows.

measures.name: GrossPrice
measures.description: Sum of list price times quantity before any discounts or adjustments.

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Aggregate of all discount types applied to contract products (explicit discount, rules discount and other discount fields).

measures.name: NetRevenue
measures.expression: SUM((COALESCE(Price,0) * COALESCE(Quantity,0)) - (COALESCE(Discount,0) + COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0) + COALESCE(AlteredAmount,0)))
measures.description: Net revenue after applying discounts and any altered amount adjustments.

measures.name: QuantitySold
measures.description: Total quantity of product units on contract products.

measures.name: AveragePricePerUnit
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(Quantity,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(Price,0) * COALESCE(Quantity,0)) / SUM(COALESCE(Quantity,0)) END
measures.description: Weighted average price per unit (gross) = GrossPrice / QuantitySold.

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract product lines that are subscription based.

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented in the selected set of contract products.

measures.name: RenewedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract product lines that have been marked as renewed.

measures.name: CancelledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CancelledOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract product lines that have a cancellation timestamp.

measures.name: AlteredAmountTotal
measures.description: Total of altered amounts applied to contract products (manual adjustments).

measures.name: InterruptedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInterruptedFromCRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract product lines flagged as interrupted from CRM.

measures.name: Template Count
measures.description: Total number of contract template policy records (row count).

measures.name: Active Template Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of templates flagged as active.

measures.name: Inactive Template Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of templates flagged as inactive.

measures.name: Percent Active
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of templates that are active (Active Template Count / Template Count).

measures.name: Distinct RuleExpression Count
measures.description: How many unique rule expressions exist across templates (helps detect duplicates).

measures.name: Average RuleExpression Length
measures.description: Average length (character count) of the RuleExpression text. Useful for estimating complexity or storage needs.

measures.name: Distinct Paths
measures.description: Number of distinct template paths (folders/namespaces) represented in the dataset.

measures.name: CaseCount
measures.description: Number of customer care case records (distinct Id)

measures.name: ActiveCaseCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases currently marked as active

measures.name: ActiveCasePercent
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(Id),0)
measures.description: Percentage of cases that are active

measures.name: CancelledContractCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCancelledContract = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases associated with cancelled contracts

measures.name: CasesWithAgentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AgentId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that have an assigned agent

measures.name: CasesWithContactEmailCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CustomerContactEmail IS NOT NULL AND CustomerContactEmail <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases with a recorded customer contact email

measures.name: TotalContactsSum
measures.description: Sum of the TotalContacts values across cases

measures.name: AverageCurrentContact
measures.description: Average value of CurrentContact per case

measures.name: AverageDaysBetweenContractStartAndActivation
measures.description: Average number of days from the minimum contract start date to activation

measures.name: DistinctContractsCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contract identifiers represented in the cases

measures.name: RuleCount
measures.description: Total number of customer care case rules (row count).

measures.name: ActiveRuleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rules that are marked active.

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Share of rules that are active (ActiveRuleCount / RuleCount).

measures.name: DistinctContacts
measures.description: Number of distinct contact masks referenced by rules (Contacts field distinct count).

measures.name: AverageRulesPerContact
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT Contacts) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(Id) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT Contacts) END
measures.description: Average number of rules per distinct contact mask.

measures.name: AverageSeniority
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Seniority IS NULL OR Seniority = -1 THEN NULL ELSE Seniority END)
measures.description: Average seniority for rules; excludes sentinel value -1 (treated as unknown).

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of business points (rows) in the current filter context

measures.name: DistinctProcesses
measures.description: Number of distinct processes associated with the business points

measures.name: SumLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Total LossPrintedNew across business points

measures.name: AvgLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Average LossPrintedNew per business point

measures.name: SubscriptionValueTotal
measures.description: Total subscription value for business points (currency)

measures.name: Y01ADPreprintedValueTotal
measures.description: Total preprinted advertisement value (Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue) in currency

measures.name: CountWithPrimaryPhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points that have a primary Phone value

measures.name: PercentWithPrimaryPhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(BusinessPointID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points with a primary Phone number

measures.name: TotalAvailablePhoneNumbers
measures.expression: SUM( (CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone1)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone3)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone4 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone4)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone5 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone5)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) )
measures.description: Total number of phone numbers (Phone, Phone1..Phone5) present across all business points

measures.name: CountPhoneM11True
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points where PhoneM11 flag is true

measures.name: CountPhone1M11True
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1M11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points where Phone1M11 flag is true

measures.name: PercentReliableGreen
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'GREEN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(BusinessPointID), 0)
measures.description: Share of business points marked with ReliabilityStatus = 'GREEN'

measures.name: DistinctCustomerNames
measures.description: Number of distinct customer names represented in the selection

measures.name: PctWithAnyPhoneField
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN (Phone IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone)) <> '') OR (Phone1 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone1)) <> '') OR (Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone2)) <> '') OR (Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone3)) <> '') OR (Phone4 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone4)) <> '') OR (Phone5 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone5)) <> '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(BusinessPointID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points with at least one phone number present in any phone field

default_filters.description: Only show business points with a primary phone number by default

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of logging events (rows) in the DialerLogging table.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct dialer batches represented in the logs.

measures.name: RowsAffectedTotal
measures.description: Sum of RowAffected across all events  useful for measuring total records impacted by dialer operations.

measures.name: RowsAffectedAverage
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per event.

measures.name: AverageDurationSeconds
measures.description: Average processing duration (in seconds) between event Timestamp and CompletedOn.

measures.name: MaxDurationSeconds
measures.description: Maximum processing duration (in seconds) observed for any event.

measures.name: MinDurationSeconds
measures.description: Minimum processing duration (in seconds) observed for any event.

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of events considered successful. (Assumes Status = 1 indicates success; adjust condition if your status codes differ.)

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with a success status. (Assumes Status = 1 indicates success.)

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events that are not marked as success. (Assumes Status = 1 indicates success.)

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of dialer tasks (row count).

measures.name: Distinct TargetGroupItemValue Count
measures.description: Number of distinct TargetGroupItemValueIDs represented in the task set.

measures.name: Pending Import Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingImport = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks marked as pending import.

measures.name: Pending Import Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingImport = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks that are pending import (PendingImport = true).

measures.name: Permit Call Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PermitCall = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where calls are permitted (PermitCall = true).

measures.name: Permit Call Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PermitCall = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks where calls are permitted.

measures.name: Requires Synchronization Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RequiresSynchronization = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks flagged as requiring synchronization.

measures.name: Requires Synchronization Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RequiresSynchronization = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks that require synchronization.

measures.name: NotFound Sum
measures.description: Sum of NotFound values (interpreted as number of not-found occurrences per task).

measures.name: Tasks with Dialer Campaign
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DialerCampaignID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks associated with a DialerCampaignID.

measures.name: Earliest Import Date
measures.description: Earliest ImportDate among the tasks in the aggregation scope.

measures.name: Latest Export Date
measures.description: Latest ExportDate among the tasks in the aggregation scope.

measures.name: Latest LastSynchDate
measures.description: Most recent LastSynchDate for the tasks in the aggregation.

measures.name: Criteria Count
measures.description: Total number of criteria records (one row per criterion instance).

measures.name: Distinct Users
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created or modified criteria.

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Count of distinct campaigns referenced by these criteria.

measures.name: Distinct Criteria Texts
measures.description: Number of distinct text values used in criteria (helps identify reuse/duplication).

measures.name: Average Text Length
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the criteria text field.

measures.name: Minimum Timestamp
measures.description: Earliest timestamp recorded for any criterion in this set.

measures.name: Maximum Timestamp
measures.description: Latest timestamp recorded for any criterion in this set.

measures.name: Criteria Linked To DM (Count)
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL OR DMTable IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of criteria rows that reference an external data mart/table/key. (Note: current sample shows these columns as all NULL.)

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of bridge events (rows) recorded in the table

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the events

measures.name: TotalRowsAffected
measures.description: Sum of RowsAffected across all events (total number of rows touched by operations)

measures.name: AverageRowsAffected
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per event

measures.name: MaxRowsAffected
measures.description: Maximum RowsAffected for a single event

measures.name: AverageProcessingTimeSeconds
measures.description: Average processing duration from TimeStamp to CompletedOn in seconds

measures.name: MinProcessingTimeSeconds
measures.description: Minimum processing duration from TimeStamp to CompletedOn in seconds

measures.name: MaxProcessingTimeSeconds
measures.description: Maximum processing duration from TimeStamp to CompletedOn in seconds

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Status = 1 (interpreted as successful)

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Status is not 1 (interpreted as unsuccessful or other states)

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of events with Status = 1 (success) out of total events

measures.name: ErrorCount
measures.description: Total number of post-check/error records

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches that produced errors

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct error type codes observed

measures.name: ErrorsWithEntityData
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of errors that include EntityData payload

measures.name: PercentageWithEntityData
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of errors that include EntityData

measures.name: AvgErrorAgeDays
measures.description: Average age of errors in days (difference between now and ErrorDate)

measures.name: EarliestErrorDate
measures.description: Earliest error timestamp in the selected scope

measures.name: LatestErrorDate
measures.description: Latest error timestamp in the selected scope

measures.name: RecentErrors30Days
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ErrorDate >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETUTCDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of errors recorded in the last 30 days

measures.name: ErrorsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of errors per batch (COUNT(ID) / DISTINCT BatchID)

foreign_keys.note: Likely references batches table that groups posts into processing batches
Lookup of error type codes/meanings (if available)
Lookup of entity type strings (e.g., YPSToEBSCustomerData, YPSToEBSContracts)

default_filters.description: Show the last 12 months by default
Prefer records that have an entity type

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total collected amount across receipts

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the table

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum receipt amount

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum receipt amount

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1)

measures.name: PayoffAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount for receipts marked as payoff

measures.name: CompletedAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 'COMPLETED' THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount for receipts with Status = 'COMPLETED'

measures.name: PercentPayoffCount
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(SystemReceiptID), 0)
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (by count)

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the buffer

measures.name: Item Count
measures.description: Number of rows / items in the FreeListingGroupItem table (one row per group-item link).

measures.name: Distinct BusinessPoint Count
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPoints referenced by these group items.

measures.name: Excluded Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExcluded = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items that are marked as excluded (IsExcluded = true).

measures.name: Included Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExcluded = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items that are not excluded (IsExcluded = false).

measures.name: Exclusion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsExcluded = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of items in this set that are excluded (Excluded Count divided by Item Count).

measures.name: ListingCount
measures.description: Total number of listings (rows) in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctBrandCount
measures.description: Number of distinct brand names represented by the listings.

measures.name: DistinctCityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct city values present in the listings.

measures.name: DistinctMainActivityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct main activities (by MainActivityID) represented.

measures.name: DistinctPrefectureCount
measures.description: Number of distinct prefectures represented by the listings.

measures.name: WithInternetMasterHeadingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasInternetMasterHeading = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings that have an internet master heading flag set.

measures.name: WithInternetMasterHeadingPct
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN HasInternetMasterHeading = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Percentage of listings with an internet master heading.

measures.name: RegularCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRegular = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings marked as regular.

measures.name: ProspectCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsProspect = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings flagged as prospects.

measures.name: CompanyPhonePresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompanyPhone IS NOT NULL AND CompanyPhone <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings with a non-empty company phone number.

measures.name: SolvencyKnownCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings for which solvency information is available.

measures.name: SolvencyGreenCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDescription = 'GREEN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings whose solvency description is 'GREEN'.

measures.name: SolvencyGreenPctOfKnown
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDescription = 'GREEN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) END
measures.description: Share of known solvency records that are 'GREEN' (Green / known solvency).

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceLastSigned
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, LastSignedDate, GETDATE()) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of days since LastSignedDate for listings that have a LastSignedDate.

measures.name: MaxDaysSinceLastSigned
