measures.expression: MAX(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, LastSignedDate, GETDATE()) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Maximum number of days since LastSignedDate among listings with a LastSignedDate.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of template rows (records)

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the rows

measures.name: GrossAmount
measures.description: Gross amount before discounts: Price multiplied by Quantity summed across rows

measures.name: TotalDiscountAmount
measures.expression: SUM( COALESCE(Discount,0) + COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0) )
measures.description: Sum of all discount types applied to the row (discount, rules, payment, product and bundle discounts)

measures.name: NetAmount
measures.expression: SUM( (Price * Quantity) - (COALESCE(Discount,0) + COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0)) + COALESCE(AlteredAmount,0) + COALESCE(ExtraFeeAmountAfterCC,0) )
measures.description: Net amount after discounts and adjustments (includes AlteredAmount and extra-fee-after-credit-card adjustments)

measures.name: AvgPrice
measures.description: Average unit price across rows

measures.name: AvgQuantity
measures.description: Average quantity per row

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of altered amounts (manual adjustments to the base amount)

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts before discounts

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts after discounts

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees before discounts

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after discounts

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmountAfterCC
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after credit card handling

measures.name: TotalAlteredPPCAmountAfterCC
measures.description: Sum of altered per-pay-click amounts after credit-card adjustments

measures.name: TotalBudgetAmount
measures.description: Sum of budgeted amounts associated with the row

measures.name: TotalActualSpentBudget
measures.description: Sum of actual budget spent tracked on the row

measures.name: DiscountRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Price * Quantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM( COALESCE(Discount,0) + COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0) ) / NULLIF(SUM(Price * Quantity),0) END
measures.description: Ratio of total discounts to gross amount (percentage). Null when gross amount is zero.

default_filters.description: Exclude rows that are explicitly cancelled (CancelledOn is set)
Exclude rows flagged as interrupted from CRM by default

measures.name: Ad Count
measures.description: Number of free-template advertisement records

measures.name: Verified Ads
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements marked as verified

measures.name: Verified Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN IsVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of advertisements that are verified

measures.name: Subscription-Based Ads
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements that are subscription-based

measures.name: QA Flags
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN QA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements flagged for QA

measures.name: Total Price
measures.description: Sum of Price values (DECIMAL(18,3))

measures.name: Total Discount (All Types)
measures.description: Aggregate of explicit discount-related columns

measures.name: One-time Amount Total
measures.description: Sum of OneTimeAmount (MONEY)

measures.name: One-time Amount After Discount Total
measures.description: Sum of OneTimeAmountAfterDiscount (MONEY)

measures.name: One-time Discount Amount
measures.description: Implied discount applied to one-time amounts

measures.name: Total Extra Fee
measures.description: Sum of ExtraFeeAmount (MONEY)

measures.name: Extra Fee After Discount Total
measures.description: Sum of ExtraFeeAmountAfterDiscount (MONEY)

measures.name: Extra Fee After Credit Card/Charges Total
measures.description: Sum of ExtraFeeAmountAfterCC (MONEY)  extra fees after CC adjustments

measures.name: Altered PPC After CC Total
measures.description: Sum of AlteredPPCAmountAfterCC (MONEY)

measures.name: Budget Amount Total
measures.description: Sum of BudgetAmount (MONEY)

measures.name: Actual Spent Budget Total
measures.description: Total actual spent budget (MONEY)

measures.name: Altered Amount Total
measures.description: Sum of AlteredAmount (DECIMAL(18,3))

measures.name: Completed Changes Total
measures.description: Aggregate of CompletedChanges

measures.name: Can Export Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CanExport = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements allowed to be exported

measures.name: Deny Extraction Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DenyExtraction = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements that deny extraction

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of attribute value rows (row-level records)

measures.name: NonNullValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the attribute Value is present (not null)

measures.name: NonNullValuePct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of rows that have a non-null Value

measures.name: DistinctAttributeDefinitions
measures.description: Number of distinct content attribute definitions represented in this set of rows

measures.name: DistinctTemplates
measures.description: Number of distinct free templates referenced by these attribute values

measures.name: DistinctProductParts
measures.description: Number of distinct product parts referenced by these attribute values

measures.name: QAFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN QA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows flagged for QA

measures.name: ImageValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL AND (LOWER(Value) LIKE '%.png' OR LOWER(Value) LIKE '%.jpg' OR LOWER(Value) LIKE '%.jpeg' OR LOWER(Value) LIKE '%.gif' OR LOWER(Value) LIKE '%.bmp') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the Value looks like an image/file reference (common image filename extensions)

measures.name: MaxSeqNo
measures.description: Maximum sequence number observed (useful to detect ordering/positioning)

measures.name: AddressCount
measures.description: Total number of address rows in the view.

measures.name: GeocodedCount
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN GeoModelLongitude IS NOT NULL OR GeoModelLatitude IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of addresses with geocoordinates available (either GeoModelLongitude or GeoModelLatitude is not null).

measures.name: PercentGeocoded
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN GeoModelLongitude IS NOT NULL OR GeoModelLatitude IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of addresses that are geocoded (geocoordinates present) as a percentage of total addresses.

measures.name: AvgGeoModelScore
measures.description: Average geocoding confidence/score for addresses where GeoModelScore is available.

measures.name: HighConfidenceGeocodedCount
measures.description: Number of addresses with a high geocoding score (GeoModelScore >= 90).

measures.name: DistinctZipCount
measures.description: Number of distinct postal codes present in NumericZip.

measures.name: DistinctLocationsCount
measures.description: Count of distinct location identifiers returned by the geocoding model.

measures.name: DistinctSourceTables
measures.description: Number of distinct source tables (DMTable) feeding addresses into this view.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of cav (contract attribute value) records in the result set

measures.name: CountNonNullCavValue
measures.description: Number of cav records that have a non-null Cav_Value

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented (distinct C_ID)

measures.name: DistinctProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct products referenced by contract products

measures.name: SumContractProductPrice
measures.description: Sum of contract product list prices (CP_Price) across cav records

measures.name: SumContractProductDiscount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied at the contract-product level (CP_Discount)

measures.name: SumContractProductRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied at the contract-product level (CP_RulesDiscount)

measures.name: NetContractProductRevenue
measures.description: Net revenue at contract-product level: price minus discounts and rules discounts

measures.name: SumAdvertisementPrice
measures.description: Sum of advertisement list prices (Adv_Price) across cav records

measures.name: SumAdvertisementDiscount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied at the advertisement level (Adv_Discount)

measures.name: SumAdvertisementRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied at the advertisement level (Adv_RulesDiscount)

measures.name: NetAdvertisementRevenue
measures.description: Net revenue at advertisement level: adv price minus adv discounts and rules discounts

measures.name: AvgContractProductPrice
measures.description: Average contract product list price (CP_Price)

measures.name: AvgAdvertisementPrice
measures.description: Average advertisement list price (Adv_Price)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (advertisement  contract-product records) in the result set

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts (C_ID) represented

measures.name: Total_CP_Price
measures.description: Sum of contract-product (CP) list prices

measures.name: Total_CP_Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied at the contract-product level

measures.name: Total_CP_RulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied at the contract-product level

measures.name: Net_CP_Amount
measures.description: Net amount for contract-products after discounts

measures.name: Total_Adv_Price
measures.description: Sum of advertisement list prices

measures.name: Total_Adv_Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied at the advertisement level

measures.name: Total_Adv_RulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied at the advertisement level

measures.name: Net_Adv_Amount
measures.description: Net amount for advertisements after discounts

measures.name: Avg_CP_Price
measures.description: Average contract-product price

measures.name: Count_CP_SubscriptionBased
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract-products marked as subscription-based

measures.name: Pct_CP_SubscriptionBased
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of contract-product rows that are subscription-based

measures.name: Count_Adv_QA_True
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Adv_QA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of advertisements flagged as QA = true

measures.name: Avg_Adv_DurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days from advertisement begin to end (uses current date when EndDate is null)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (targeting records)

measures.name: Preprinted Customer Count
measures.description: Sum of preprinted customer numbers for the targeting record

measures.name: Preprinted Amount
measures.description: Total preprinted monetary amount associated with the targeting record

measures.name: Total Visits
measures.description: Total number of visits (aggregated)

measures.name: Total Visits CO
measures.description: Total number of CO visits (aggregated)

measures.name: Total Visits (All)
measures.description: Total number of visits (total), aggregated across records

measures.name: Total CO Visits (All)
measures.description: Total number of CO visits (total), aggregated across records

measures.name: Average AvoNew
measures.description: Average AvoNew (average value per record)

measures.name: Conversion Rate (avg)
measures.description: Average conversion rate across records

measures.name: Number of CO (sum)
measures.description: Total number of CO across the grouping

measures.name: Amount of CO
measures.description: Total monetary amount of CO

measures.name: Number of CO Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of CO count relative to reference (as stored)

measures.name: Amount of CO Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of CO amount relative to reference (as stored)

measures.name: Loss Customers (sum)
measures.description: Total number of lost customers

measures.name: Loss Amount
measures.description: Total monetary loss associated with lost customers

measures.name: Loss Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of lost customers (as stored)

measures.name: Loss Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of lost amount (as stored)

measures.name: Increase Customers (sum)
measures.description: Total number of customers with increased activity (column name contains Greek capital Iota)

measures.name: Increase Amount
measures.description: Total increased monetary amount (column name contains Greek capital Iota)

measures.name: Increase Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of customers with increase (as stored)

measures.name: Increase Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of amount increase (as stored)

measures.name: Reduction Customers (sum)
measures.description: Total number of customers with reduced activity

measures.name: Reduction Amount
measures.description: Total monetary reduction amount

measures.name: Reduction Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of customers with reduction (as stored)

measures.name: Reduction Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of amount reduction (as stored)

measures.name: No-Change Customers (sum)
measures.description: Total number of customers with no changes

measures.name: No-Change Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of customers with no change (as stored)

measures.name: No-Change Amount
measures.description: Total amount associated with customers who had no change

measures.name: No-Change Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percent of amount with no change (as stored)

measures.name: ROCO Customers (sum)
measures.description: Total ROCO customers

measures.name: ROCO Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average ROCO customers percentage (as stored)

measures.name: ROCO Amount
measures.description: Total monetary amount for ROCO

measures.name: ROCO Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average ROCO amount percentage (as stored)

measures.name: New Customers (sum)
measures.description: Total number of new customers

measures.name: New Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of new customers (as stored)

measures.name: New Amount
measures.description: Total amount from new customers

measures.name: New Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average percentage of new amount (as stored)

measures.name: CI Customers (sum)
measures.description: Total CI customers

measures.name: CI Customers Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average CI customers percentage (as stored)

measures.name: CI Amount
measures.description: Total CI amount

measures.name: CI Amount Percentage (avg)
measures.description: Average CI amount percentage (as stored)

measures.name: Working Days (sum)
measures.description: Total working days represented by the records

measures.name: Salesmen (sum)
measures.description: Total number of salesmen associated with the records

measures.name: Mandays (sum)
measures.description: Total mandays aggregated across the records

measures.name: Communication Count
measures.description: Total number of communication records (row count).

measures.name: Distinct Communication Texts
measures.description: Number of distinct communication text values.

measures.name: Total Communication Characters
measures.description: Sum of the character lengths of all CommunicationText values.

measures.name: Average Communication Length
measures.description: Average number of characters per communication message.

measures.name: Percent Mapped to Dimension
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL OR DMTable IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of communications that have at least one dimension mapping populated (DMKey, DMCharKey or DMTable).

display.notes: Common analytic breakdown is by InternalProduct. Consider adding derived buckets (e.g., short/medium/long by LEN(CommunicationText)) for UI grouping.

measures.name: DocumentCount
measures.description: Total number of document records (rows) in the set.

measures.name: DistinctFilenameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct filename values. Useful to detect duplicate records that reference the same file name.

measures.name: DistinctInternalProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct internal products that have one or more documents.

measures.name: EarliestCreatedOn
measures.description: The earliest document creation timestamp in the aggregation context.

measures.name: LatestCreatedOn
measures.description: The latest document creation timestamp in the aggregation context.

measures.name: DistinctCreatedByCount
measures.description: Number of distinct users (CreatedBy) who have created documents.

measures.name: AverageDocumentsPerProduct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT InternalProductID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID)*1.0/COUNT(DISTINCT InternalProductID) END
measures.description: Average number of documents per internal product in the current aggregation scope. Null when there are no products.

measures.name: PaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (rows) in this table.

measures.name: TotalInvoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices associated with these payment method records.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types used.

measures.name: AvgInstallmentsPerPaymentMethod
measures.description: Average number of installments configured on payment methods (where installments are present).

measures.name: AvgCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of credit-card-specific installments (nulls ignored).

measures.name: TotalAdvancedPolicyAmount
measures.description: Sum of advanced policy amounts attached to these payment methods (if populated).

measures.name: CountPreInvoiceMethods
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PreInvoice = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment methods marked as pre-invoice.

measures.name: PctPreInvoiceMethods
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PreInvoice = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of payment methods that are pre-invoice (as a percent of total payment method records).

measures.name: CountExchangeSales
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment methods flagged as exchange sales.

measures.name: CountWithPaymentPhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentPhoneID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods that reference a payment phone record.

measures.name: PctWithPaymentPhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentPhoneID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of payment methods that include a payment phone reference.

measures.name: CountWithCreditCard
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardTypeID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment methods that reference a credit card type (i.e., likely card payments).

measures.name: EarliestPaymentMonth
measures.description: Earliest payment month present in the dataset (useful for temporal filtering and partitioning).

measures.name: LatestPaymentMonth
measures.description: Latest payment month present in the dataset.

measures.name: ExceptionCount
measures.description: Total number of exception log records (one row per logged exception).

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that have one or more exception log entries in the filtered context.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct processing batches represented in the exception log rows.

measures.name: FirstExceptionTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest timestamp of an exception record in the evaluated set.

measures.name: LastExceptionTimestamp
measures.description: Latest timestamp of an exception record in the evaluated set.

measures.name: AvgExceptionsPerContract
measures.description: Average number of exception records per distinct contract (null-safe).

measures.name: AvgExceptionsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of exception records per processing batch (null-safe).

foreign_keys.notes: Inferred relationship to contract dimension; validate against canonical contract dimension name in the environment.
Inferred relationship to batch/process batch table; validate against environment naming.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of association rows. At its native grain this will be 1 per row; when aggregated by payment method or sales collection this indicates how many linked counterpart rows exist.

measures.name: DistinctSalesCollections
measures.description: Number of distinct sales collections associated. Useful when the data is grouped by InvoicePaymentMethod to show how many different sales collections are linked to that payment method.

measures.name: DistinctInvoicePaymentMethods
measures.description: Number of distinct invoice payment methods associated. Useful when the data is grouped by SalesCollection to show how many payment methods are used for that collection.

measures.name: Listing Count
measures.description: Total number of listings (row count).

measures.name: Distinct BusinessPoint Count
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPoints referenced by these listings.

measures.name: Primary Listings
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPrimary = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings flagged as primary.

measures.name: Secondary Listings
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSecondary = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings flagged as secondary.

measures.name: Potential Freelister Listings
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPotentialFreelister = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings marked as potential freelister.

measures.name: Contract Listings
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsContract = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings that are contract-based.

measures.name: Has DMTable Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMTable IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings with a non-null DMTable value (indicates mapping to a downstream table).

measures.name: Primary Listing Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsPrimary = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of listings that are primary (Primary Listings / Listing Count).

measures.name: Listings With SourceUdacs
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SourceUdacs IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings that have a SourceUdacs value (identifies origin/business unit tagging).

measures.name: Inset Count
measures.description: Number of inset records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: Distinct Advertisements
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced by these insets. Null AdvertisementID values are excluded.

measures.name: Total Quantity
measures.description: Sum of the Quantity field across all insets. Use to measure total items/units assigned to insets.

measures.name: Average Quantity per Inset
measures.description: Average of Quantity per inset record.

measures.name: Total Quantity Per Category
measures.description: Sum of the QuantityPerCategory values. Useful when quantities are pre-aggregated by category.

measures.name: Distinct Categories
measures.description: Number of distinct category values present in these insets.

measures.name: Category Summary Total
measures.description: Aggregate of the CategorySummary field (semantically depends on source definition  typically a precomputed summary or score per inset).

measures.name: Insets With Flag
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasInset = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of inset rows where HasInset is true (1).

measures.name: Inset Presence Rate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN HasInset = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of rows where HasInset is true. Calculated as the average of the HasInset boolean (1/0).

measures.name: Distinct DMKey Values
measures.description: Number of distinct DMKey values present. Useful when DMKey/DMTable pair is used for polymorphic dimension lookups.

foreign_keys.description: Optional reference to the Advertisement dimension; AdvertisementID can be null.
Reference to the parent MediumVersionDistribution record.

display.notes: DMTable / DMKey / DMCharKey form a polymorphic link to a dimension table indicated by DMTable. Use DMTable + DMKey (or DMCharKey) for resolved dimension joins where applicable.

measures.name: RunCount
measures.description: Total number of batch runs (rows) in the selected scope

measures.name: CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not null)

measures.name: IncompleteCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs that do not have a completion timestamp yet

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of runs that completed (CompletedCount / RunCount). Returns 0 when there are no runs in the scope

measures.name: AverageDurationSeconds
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time in seconds between ScheduledOn and CompletedOn for runs that have completed. Nulls ignored

measures.name: MinDurationSeconds
measures.expression: MIN(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Minimum elapsed time in seconds between ScheduledOn and CompletedOn among completed runs

measures.name: MaxDurationSeconds
measures.expression: MAX(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Maximum elapsed time in seconds between ScheduledOn and CompletedOn among completed runs

measures.name: Status_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 0. Numeric codes represent system status codes; map to labels in a status dimension or lookup

measures.name: Status_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 2. Numeric codes represent system status codes; map to labels in a status dimension or lookup

measures.name: Status_3_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 3. Numeric codes represent system status codes; map to labels in a status dimension or lookup

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of text rows in the table.

measures.name: Distinct Text Count
measures.description: Number of distinct text values across all rows.

measures.name: Distinct Batch Count
measures.description: Number of distinct batch searches represented in the table.

measures.name: Rows per Batch (aggregate)
measures.description: Count of text rows; meaningful when grouped by BatchSearchId to show number of text entries per batch.

measures.name: Average Text Length (chars)
measures.description: Average length of the Text column measured in characters.

measures.name: Maximum Text Length (chars)
measures.description: Maximum character length observed in the Text column.

measures.name: Minimum Text Length (chars)
measures.description: Minimum character length observed in the Text column.

measures.name: Average Word Count
measures.description: Approximate average number of words per Text value using spaces as delimiters. May overcount for multiple consecutive spaces or punctuation; use as an estimate.

measures.name: SearchCount
measures.description: Number of individual search events (one row per recorded search).

measures.name: DistinctSearchPhrases
measures.description: Count of unique search text/phrases observed in the dataset.

measures.name: TotalResultsReturned
measures.description: Total number of result rows returned across all recorded searches.

measures.name: AverageResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Average number of results returned per search.

measures.name: MinResultsReturned
measures.description: Minimum number of results returned for a single search (0 or greater).

measures.name: MaxResultsReturned
measures.description: Maximum number of results returned for a single search.

measures.name: SearchesWithResults
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultsCount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of searches that returned at least one result.

measures.name: SearchesWithNoResults
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultsCount = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of searches that returned zero results.

default_filters.description: By default, show searches that returned at least one result.

measures.name: ResultCount
measures.description: Number of search result rows (rows returned for searches).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Distinct count of BusinessPointId referenced by results (null BusinessPointId values are excluded by typical COUNT_DISTINCT semantics).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessUniqueIdCount
measures.description: Distinct count of BusinessUniqueId values (Google Place-like unique identifier).

measures.name: CurrentResultCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results flagged as current (IsCurrent = true).

measures.name: PercentCurrent
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Share of results that are current (CurrentResultCount / ResultCount).

measures.name: HasMultipleBusinessPointsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasMultipleBusinessPoints = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results where HasMultipleBusinessPoints is true.

measures.name: ResponseJsonPresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Response IS NOT NULL AND LEN(Response) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results containing a non-empty Response JSON payload.

measures.name: InternationalPhoneAvailableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN InternationalPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(InternationalPhoneNumber)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results with a non-empty international phone number.

measures.name: NationalPhoneAvailableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NationalPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(NationalPhoneNumber)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results with a non-empty national phone number.

measures.name: AverageRating
measures.description: Average 'rating' extracted from the Response JSON (NULL if Response.rating not present). Uses JSON_VALUE and TRY_CAST to float.

measures.name: AverageUserRatingCount
measures.description: Average userRatingCount from Response JSON (how many users rated the place on average).

measures.name: AverageCompletenessPercent
measures.expression: AVG( TRY_CAST(SUBSTRING(CompletenessScore, 1, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)-1) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(TRY_CAST(SUBSTRING(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)+1, 10) AS FLOAT),0) )
measures.description: Average completeness derived from CompletenessScore values like '8/9'. Parses numerator and denominator and averages the fraction. Returns NULL for malformed or missing values.

display.notes: Response JSON contains place detail (rating, userRatingCount, location, opening hours). Measures AverageRating and AverageUserRatingCount extract values from that JSON when present.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of area header rows

measures.name: Distinct Header Texts
measures.description: Number of distinct Text values found in headers (empty string counts as a distinct value)

measures.name: Phone Available Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' AND Phone NOT IN ('None') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows with a meaningful phone value (excludes NULL, empty and literal 'None')

measures.name: Phone Availability Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' AND Phone NOT IN ('None') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows that include a usable phone value

measures.name: CanBreak Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CanBreak = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of headers flagged as breakable (CanBreak = true)

measures.name: CanBreak Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CanBreak = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of headers that are breakable

measures.name: Average Indent
measures.description: Average indent level across header rows

measures.name: Max SeqNo
measures.description: Maximum sequence number observed (useful to understand ordering range)

measures.name: Average Text Length
measures.description: Average length (number of characters) of the Text field

measures.name: Distinct Phone Count
measures.description: Number of distinct Phone values (includes literal values like 'None')

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of rows in OteDirectoryDak.

measures.name: Distinct Dak Count
measures.description: Number of distinct Dak values represented in the table.

measures.name: Directories With Dak
measures.description: Count of distinct OteDirectory entries that have one or more associated Dak records.

measures.name: Average Dak Records Per Directory
measures.description: Average number of Dak records assigned to an OteDirectory (computed across directories).

measures.name: Max Dak Records Per Directory
measures.description: Maximum number of Dak records associated with a single OteDirectory.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of progress-point rows (records) in this fact.

measures.name: RelatedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RelatedID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of progress points that are related to another progress point (RelatedID is not null).

measures.name: RelatedPercent
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN RelatedID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of progress points that reference another progress point (RelatedID), as a percentage of all rows.

measures.name: EstimatedDateCount
measures.description: Number of rows with a non-null EstimatedDate.

measures.name: ActualDateCount
measures.description: Number of rows with a non-null ActualDate.

measures.name: HasCommentsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Comments IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Comments)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that contain non-empty comments.

measures.name: AverageRelatedDays
measures.description: Average of the RelatedDays values (when populated).

measures.name: AvgEstimatedToActualDays
measures.description: Average difference in days between EstimatedDate and ActualDate for rows where both are present. Positive means ActualDate occurs after EstimatedDate.

measures.name: EarliestEstimatedDate
measures.description: Earliest (minimum) EstimatedDate in the scoped data.

measures.name: LatestEstimatedDate
measures.description: Latest (maximum) EstimatedDate in the scoped data.

measures.name: EarliestActualDate
measures.description: Earliest (minimum) ActualDate in the scoped data.

measures.name: LatestActualDate
measures.description: Latest (maximum) ActualDate in the scoped data.

measures.name: RelatedActualFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RelatedActualFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the RelatedActualFlag is true.

measures.name: RelatedActualFlagPercent
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN RelatedActualFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of rows where RelatedActualFlag is true.

measures.name: ShipmentRowCount
measures.description: Number of shipping records (rows) in this fact table.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount column across shipments. Source column is named 'Amount'  if this field actually represents currency in the source system, consider replacing unit with 'currency' and adding a currency code.

measures.name: TotalPackages
measures.description: Total number of packages across all shipments.

measures.name: TotalPalets
measures.description: Total number of pallets across all shipments.

measures.name: DistinctShippingPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct shipping points referenced in the selected set of records.

measures.name: PaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of payment method rows (row count).

measures.name: DistinctPaymentPhoneIDs
measures.description: Distinct number of associated phone records referenced by PaymentPhoneID (excludes NULL).

measures.name: TotalAdvancedPayment
measures.description: Sum of advanced payments recorded on the payment methods. Stored as DECIMAL(18,0). Currency inferred as EUR  adjust if different.

measures.name: AvgInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments per payment method record.

measures.name: TotalNumberOfInvoices
measures.description: Sum of the NumberOfInvoices field across payment methods (total invoices associated).

measures.name: ExchangeSaleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods flagged as exchange sales.

measures.name: ExchangeSalePercent
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of payment methods that are exchange sales (ExchangeSaleCount / PaymentMethodCount).

measures.name: PaymentPhoneAccountPresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentPhoneAccount IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(PaymentPhoneAccount)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where a non-empty PaymentPhoneAccount value exists.

measures.name: MigratedRowCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMTable = 'DataMigration' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as coming from the DataMigration table (DMTable = 'DataMigration'). Useful to exclude migrated/test data.

default_filters.description: Exclude rows that originate from DataMigration by default to focus on production data.

measures.name: PaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types present in the set.

measures.name: TotalInstallments
measures.description: Sum of installments across payment methods. For single-installment methods this equals the count of methods.

measures.name: AverageInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments per payment method.

measures.name: TotalAdvancedPayment
measures.description: Total advanced payment amount associated with the payment methods. Assumed currency EUR based on deployment locale (adjust if different).

measures.name: TotalNumberOfInvoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices linked to these payment methods.

measures.name: ExchangeSaleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods that are marked as exchange sales.

measures.name: ExchangeSalePct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percentage of payment methods that are exchange sales.

measures.name: UserSpecifiedPaymentMonthCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserSpecifiedPaymentMonth = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods where the payment month was explicitly specified by the user.

measures.name: HasPaymentMonthCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentMonth IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods that have a non-null PaymentMonth value.

measures.name: WithPhoneReferenceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentPhoneID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods that reference a phone record (PaymentPhoneID is not null).

measures.name: WithBillingEmailCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BillingEmailID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods that reference a billing email (BillingEmailID is not null).

measures.name: MigratedRowsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMTable = 'DataMigration' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that originate from the DataMigration table (useful to exclude/import migration data).

measures.name: Payment Method Count
measures.description: Total number of payment method records (row count).

measures.name: Distinct Payment Method Types
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types used.

measures.name: Total Advanced Payment
measures.description: Sum of advanced payment amounts recorded on payment method records. Stored as DECIMAL(18,0) in source; confirm currency at source/system level before using for financial reporting.

measures.name: Sum of Number Of Invoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices associated with these payment method records.

measures.name: Average Installments
measures.description: Average number of installments configured on payment methods.

measures.name: Exchange Sale Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods marked as exchange sales.

measures.name: Exchange Sale Share
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share (percentage) of payment method records that are exchange sales.

measures.name: Payment Phone Linked Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentPhoneID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment methods that reference a phone record (PaymentPhoneID is not null).

measures.name: Distinct Payment Phones
measures.description: Number of distinct phone records referenced by payment methods.

measures.name: Has Payment Phone Account Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(PaymentPhoneAccount)),''),NULL) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment methods that have a non-empty PaymentPhoneAccount value.

measures.name: User Specified Payment Month Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserSpecifiedPaymentMonth = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment methods where the payment month was explicitly specified by a user.

measures.name: Data Migration Rows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMTable = 'DataMigration' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that originate from the DataMigration source (DMTable = 'DataMigration'). Useful to filter out migration data from operational metrics.

default_filters.description: By default exclude rows tagged as DataMigration to focus on production operational data.

measures.name: Presale Count
measures.description: Number of presale form submissions (row count)

measures.name: Distinct Target Groups
measures.description: Number of distinct target group item values referenced by presale forms

measures.name: Total Website Amount
measures.description: Sum of AmountWebsite values across presale forms (USD)

measures.name: Average Website Amount
measures.description: Average non-null AmountWebsite value (USD)

measures.name: Website Amount Count
measures.description: Number of presale forms with a non-null AmountWebsite

measures.name: Total XO Amount
measures.description: Sum of AmountXO values across presale forms (USD)

measures.name: Average XO Amount
measures.description: Average non-null AmountXO value (USD)

measures.name: Total Min Budget PPC
measures.description: Sum of the minimum PPC budgets specified in presale forms (USD)

measures.name: Total Max Budget PPC
measures.description: Sum of the maximum PPC budgets specified in presale forms (USD)

measures.name: Average PPC Budget Range
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN MinBudgetPPC IS NOT NULL AND MaxBudgetPPC IS NOT NULL THEN MaxBudgetPPC - MinBudgetPPC END)
measures.description: Average difference between MaxBudgetPPC and MinBudgetPPC for rows where both budgets are provided (USD)

measures.name: Percent With PPC Info Sufficient
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInfoSufficientPPC = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of presale forms that marked PPC information as sufficient

measures.name: Percent With Any Amount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AmountWebsite IS NOT NULL OR AmountXO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of presale forms that include either a Website amount or an XO amount

measures.name: Count IsEshop True
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsEshop = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of presale forms that are marked as e-shop

measures.name: Count IsCatalogProduct True
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCatalogProduct = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of presale forms that are marked as catalog products

measures.name: Count IsAplh True
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsAplh = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of presale forms that are marked as Aplh

measures.name: Average CommentsPPC Length
measures.description: Average character length of CommentsPPC (nulls excluded)

measures.name: Average CommentsXO Length
measures.description: Average character length of CommentsXO (nulls excluded)

measures.name: RangeCount
measures.description: Number of price range rows (distinct price bands) in the selection.

measures.name: MinPriceFrom
measures.description: Lowest starting price (PriceFrom) among the ranges. Stored with three decimal places.

measures.name: MaxPriceTo
measures.description: Highest ending price (PriceTo) among the ranges. Open-ended ranges where PriceTo IS NULL are ignored by this aggregate.

measures.name: OpenEndedRangeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of ranges that do not have an upper bound (PriceTo is NULL).

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of the one-time amounts across ranges. Null OneTimeAmount values are excluded from the sum.

measures.name: AvgOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Average one-time amount charged for the ranges. Nulls are ignored in the average.

measures.name: AvgExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Average extra fee expressed in percentage points. Values are stored as percentage points (e.g., 40.00 represents 40%).

measures.name: AvgPriceRangeWidth
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE PriceTo - PriceFrom END)
measures.description: Average width of the defined price ranges (PriceTo - PriceFrom). Open-ended ranges (PriceTo IS NULL) are excluded.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of ProductionCaseProduct records

measures.name: Distinct Cases
measures.description: Number of distinct Cases referenced by these records

measures.name: Distinct Pricelist Items
measures.description: Number of distinct pricelist items referenced by these records

measures.name: Mapped Records
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that have a mapping key (either DMKey or DMCharKey)

measures.name: Percent Mapped
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of records that have a mapping key (DMKey or DMCharKey)

measures.name: Distinct DMKey Values
measures.description: Number of distinct integer DMKey values present (excludes NULL)

measures.name: Distinct DMCharKey Values
measures.description: Number of distinct DMCharKey values present (excludes NULL)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of product-kit membership rows (each row represents a member within a kit).

measures.name: DistinctKitCount
measures.description: Number of distinct kits represented in the filtered set of rows.

measures.name: DistinctMemberCount
measures.description: Number of distinct member products that appear in kits in the filtered set of rows.

measures.name: MandatoryMemberCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of kit members marked as mandatory.

measures.name: MandatoryMemberPct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(1) END
measures.description: Share of members that are mandatory out of total members (MandatoryMemberCount / RowCount).

measures.name: AverageFillOrder
measures.description: Average FillOrder value for members in the kit. (FillOrder is often constant in this table.)

measures.name: Part Count
measures.description: Total number of product part records (rows) in the table.

measures.name: Distinct Products
measures.description: Number of distinct products that have at least one part defined.

measures.name: Addon Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsAddon = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of parts that are marked as add-ons.

measures.name: Addon Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsAddon = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of parts that are add-ons (Addon Count / Part Count).

measures.name: Average Min Occurrence
measures.description: Average of the MinOccurence across parts. Nulls are ignored in the average.

measures.name: Average Max Occurrence
measures.description: Average of the MaxOccurence across parts. Nulls are ignored in the average.

measures.name: Max Fill Order
measures.description: Maximum FillOrder value present in the parts set (useful for ordering/layout logic).

measures.name: Parts per Product (avg)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT ProductID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(ID) / COUNT(DISTINCT ProductID) END
measures.description: Average number of parts defined per product (total parts divided by distinct products).

measures.name: PriceMode Missing Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceMode IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of parts where PriceMode is not defined (NULL).

measures.name: PriceMode = 0 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceMode = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of parts where PriceMode equals 0 (observed as the dominant value in the sample).

measures.name: PartDefinitionCount
measures.description: Number of product part definition records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct part Codes.

measures.name: DistinctNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct part Names.

measures.name: DistinctUdacPartDefinitionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct UdacPartDefinition referenced by these product part definitions.

measures.name: DistinctMediumVersionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct MediumVersion values referenced.

measures.name: SingleAppearanceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SingleAppearance = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of product part definitions marked as SingleAppearance = true.

measures.name: SingleAppearanceRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN SingleAppearance = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of records that are SingleAppearance (SingleAppearance = true) as a percentage of total records.

measures.name: MissingDMKeyCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records missing a DMKey (DMKey is NULL).

measures.name: DistinctDMCharKeyCount
measures.description: Number of distinct DMCharKey values (character keys into external DM tables).

measures.name: RelationRowCount
measures.description: Total number of relationship rows (one row per related-contract relationship).

measures.name: DistinctRelatedContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct related contracts referenced in the filtered dataset.

measures.name: AverageRelatedContractsPerContract
measures.description: Average number of related-contract links per source ContractID in the aggregation scope (total relation rows divided by number of distinct ContractID).

measures.name: RenewalRelationsCount
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN Type = N'' THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships whose Type is '' (sample values indicate this Greek value; use as an example for type-specific counts). Replace or add equivalent measures for other Type values if needed.

display.notes: Treat this table as a relationship/bridge table between contracts. Use ContractID and RelatedContractID to join to the Contract dimension. Type is a short categorical attribute (Greek collation); create a dimension or canonicalize Type values if needed for consistent reporting.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total collected amount across all collections (includes all payment types)

measures.name: CollectionsCount
measures.description: Number of collection records (rows) in the table

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average collected amount per collection

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum single collection amount

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum single collection amount

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts associated with collections

measures.name: AmountTransferredToERP
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Sum of amounts for collections that have been transferred to the ERP system

measures.name: PercentTransferredToERP
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of collections that have been transferred to the ERP system (count basis)

measures.name: AverageDaysToERPTransfer
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, TransferDateToERP) END)
measures.description: Average number of days between collection creation and transfer to ERP (only for transferred records)

measures.name: NetAmountExcludingDeleted
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total collected amount excluding records marked as deleted

measures.name: CollectionsByPaymentType_Count
measures.description: Count of collections (use with PaymentType dimension to break down by payment method)

measures.name: TotalWorkingDays
measures.description: Sum of working days recorded for the salesman in the campaign segment

measures.name: AverageWorkingDays
measures.description: Average working days per row (useful when aggregating across salespeople or segments)

measures.name: TotalVisits
measures.description: Total number of visits (or recorded visit metric) across the aggregation

measures.name: COVisits
measures.description: Total corporate/outlet (CO) visits

measures.name: NewVisits
measures.description: Total new visits recorded

measures.name: COCustomers
measures.description: Count of customers classified as CO (corporate/outlet) in the period

measures.name: COAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount associated with CO customers

measures.name: LossCustomers
measures.description: Total customers lost

measures.name: LossAmount
measures.description: Monetary loss associated with lost customers

measures.name: IncreaseCustomers
measures.description: Total customers gained (increase)

measures.name: IncreaseAmount
measures.description: Monetary increase associated with gained customers

measures.name: ReductionCustomers
measures.description: Customers with reductions

measures.name: ReductionAmount
measures.description: Monetary reduction amount

measures.name: NoChangesCustomers
measures.description: Customers with no change in status or spend

measures.name: NoChangesAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount for customers with no changes

measures.name: ROCOCustomers
measures.description: Customers returned to CO classification (ROCO)

measures.name: ROCOAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount for ROCO customers

measures.name: NewCustomers
measures.description: Total new customers acquired

measures.name: NewAmount
measures.description: Monetary value from new customers

measures.name: TotalCustomers
measures.description: Total customers (aggregate)

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount (sales/turnover) in the aggregation

measures.name: AverageAmountPerCustomer
measures.description: Average monetary amount per customer (TotalAmount divided by TotalCustomers). NULL when TotalCustomers = 0

measures.name: VisitsPerWorkingDay
measures.description: Average visits per working day

measures.name: NetCustomerChange
measures.description: Net change in customers (increases minus losses)

measures.name: NetAmountChange
measures.description: Net monetary change (increases minus losses)

measures.name: NewCustomerShare
measures.description: Share of new customers relative to total customers

measures.name: COCustomerShare
measures.description: Share of CO customers relative to total customers

measures.name: TotalRows
measures.description: Total number of rows in the SalesTreeHistory table (includes deleted and active records).

measures.name: ActiveRows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows not marked as deleted (IsDeleted = 0).

measures.name: DeletedRows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows marked as deleted (IsDeleted = 1).

measures.name: PctDeleted
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0) END
measures.description: Proportion of rows that are deleted (DeletedRows / TotalRows).

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen referenced in the snapshot/history.

measures.name: DistinctSupervisors
measures.description: Number of distinct supervisors referenced in the snapshot/history.

measures.name: DistinctManagers
measures.description: Number of distinct managers referenced in the snapshot/history.

measures.name: FirstCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp present in the data (start of capture for this snapshot set).

measures.name: LastCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest CreatedOn timestamp present in the data (most recent capture time).

measures.name: AvgRowsPerSegment
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT SegmentID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT SegmentID),0) END
measures.description: Average number of rows per SegmentID (TotalRows divided by distinct SegmentID count).

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of tasks (row count).

measures.name: Completed Tasks
measures.description: Number of tasks with a non-null CompletedOn timestamp (considered completed).

measures.name: Open Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that are not completed (CompletedOn is NULL).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.description: Share of tasks that are completed (Completed Tasks / Total Tasks).

measures.name: Average Time to Complete (days)
measures.description: Average elapsed time between task creation (CreatedOn) and completion (CompletedOn), expressed in days. Nulls ignored.

measures.name: Median Time to Complete (days)
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn)) / 86400.0
measures.description: Median elapsed time (50th percentile) from CreatedOn to CompletedOn in days. Uses a continuous percentile function; behavior depends on SQL engine.

measures.name: Minimum Time to Complete (days)
measures.description: Shortest observed time from CreatedOn to CompletedOn, in days.

measures.name: Maximum Time to Complete (days)
measures.description: Longest observed time from CreatedOn to CompletedOn, in days.

measures.name: Average Age of Open Tasks (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, GETDATE()) END) / 86400.0
measures.description: Average age of tasks that are still open (CreatedOn to now), in days. Only counts open tasks.

measures.name: Distinct Cases
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by tasks in the current aggregation.

measures.name: Tasks with DynamicCode
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DynamicCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a DynamicCode value (indicates link to external campaign/code).

measures.name: TotalActions
measures.description: Total number of action log rows (events).

measures.name: DistinctTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have one or more actions recorded.

measures.name: ActionsPerTask
measures.description: Average number of actions recorded per distinct task in the current aggregation context.

measures.name: FirstActionDate
measures.description: Earliest action timestamp in the aggregation context.

measures.name: LastActionDate
measures.description: Latest action timestamp in the aggregation context.

measures.name: ActiveDays
measures.description: Number of calendar days on which at least one action was recorded.

measures.name: AverageActionsPerDay
measures.description: Average number of actions per active day in the aggregation context.

measures.name: Action_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions with Action = 1 (code observed frequently in the data).

measures.name: Action_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions with Action = 2 (if present).

measures.name: Action_1_Share
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of actions that are Action = 1 within the aggregation context.

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of task assignment records (one row per assignment).

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have at least one assignment.

measures.name: AssignedToUserCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignments that are explicitly assigned to a User (UserID is not null).

measures.name: UnassignedToUserCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignments with no UserID (e.g., assigned to Role or external key).

measures.name: AssignedToUserPct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN UserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of assignments that are assigned to a User (non-null UserID).

measures.name: DistinctExternalTargetCount
measures.description: Number of distinct external target keys (DMKey) referenced by assignments. Useful when assignments reference external dimension members.

measures.name: AssignmentsOfType1Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AssignmentType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments with AssignmentType = 1. Note: currently AssignmentType appears to be a single-valued column in samples.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of task log entries (rows)

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in the log selection

measures.name: EntriesWithOutcome
measures.description: Number of log entries that include a non-null Outcome value

measures.name: MissingOutcomeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log entries where Outcome is null

measures.name: OutcomeRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of log entries that have an Outcome (non-null). Value expressed as fraction (0-1) and formatted as a percentage.

measures.name: DistinctOutcomeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Outcome values observed (nulls excluded)

measures.name: FirstEventTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest Timestamp among the selected log entries (first recorded event)

measures.name: LastEventTimestamp
measures.description: Latest Timestamp among the selected log entries (most recent event)

measures.name: AvgTextLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Text field for entries that have Text

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the TaskTarget mapping (each row represents one Task -> Target Case association).

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks present in the TaskTarget table for the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctTargetCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct target cases present in the TaskTarget table for the current filter context.

measures.name: TargetsPerTask
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT TaskID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT TaskID) END
measures.description: Average number of target cases associated to a task (RowCount / distinct tasks). NULL when there are no tasks in scope.

measures.name: MappedToDMCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of associations that have a Data Mart mapping key (DMKey or DMCharKey). Note: current sample indicates these fields are null.

measures.name: MappingCoverage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of TaskTarget rows that are mapped to a Data Mart key. Useful to understand coverage of DM integration.

measures.name: Ticket Count
measures.description: Total number of tickets (rows) in the table

measures.name: Open Tickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that have not been completed (CompletedOn is NULL)

measures.name: Completed Tickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not NULL)

measures.name: Percent Completed
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1)=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1),0) END
measures.description: Share of tickets that have been completed (CompletedTickets / TicketCount)

measures.name: Average Completion Days
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time in days between ticket creation and completion (excludes tickets with no CompletedOn)

measures.name: Average Time to Receive (Days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ReceivedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, ReceivedOn) END)
measures.description: Average number of days between CreatedOn and ReceivedOn (null ReceivedOn excluded)

measures.name: Tickets Needing Evaluation
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets flagged as needing evaluation

measures.name: Tickets Needing Supervisor
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedSupervisor = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets flagged as needing supervisor attention

measures.name: Sum Credit Amount
measures.description: Total credit amount associated with tickets (Currency inferred as USD from column metadata). Nulls ignored by SUM.

measures.name: Sum Cancel Amount
measures.description: Total cancel amount associated with tickets (Currency inferred as USD from column metadata). Nulls ignored by SUM.

measures.name: Tickets Flagged for Contract Cancellation Evaluation
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedCancelContractEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets where NeedCancelContractEval is true

measures.name: Tickets Marked IsEditContractType
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsEditContractType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets where the contract type edit flag is set

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Total number of history records (rows) in the table.

measures.name: Distinct Tickets
measures.description: Number of unique tickets referenced by these history records.

measures.name: Distinct Advertisements
measures.description: Number of unique advertisements referenced by these history records.

measures.name: Distinct Tasks
measures.description: Number of unique tasks referenced by these history records.

measures.name: Work Done In Production (Count)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsWorkDoneInProduction = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of history records where work was done in production.

measures.name: Work Done In Production (Pct)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsWorkDoneInProduction = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of history records where work was done in production (percentage of rows with IsWorkDoneInProduction = true).

measures.name: Average Tasks per Ticket
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT TicketID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(TaskID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT TicketID) END
measures.description: Average number of task references per ticket within the history rows.

measures.name: Communication Count
measures.description: Total number of communication records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: Distinct Communication Texts
measures.description: Number of distinct communication messages (unique CommunicationText values). Useful to detect duplicates or templated messages.

measures.name: Unique Tickets
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets that have at least one communication recorded.

measures.name: Average Communications per Ticket
measures.description: Average number of communications associated with a ticket (total communications divided by distinct tickets).

measures.name: Average Communication Length (chars)
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the CommunicationText field. Helps measure verbosity of messages.

measures.name: Median Communication Length (chars)
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY LEN(CommunicationText)) OVER ()
measures.description: Median length (in characters) of communications. More robust than the average for skewed length distributions. Note: requires analytic/OLAP support in the query engine.

measures.name: Max Communication Length (chars)
measures.description: Maximum length (in characters) observed in CommunicationText.

measures.name: Min Communication Length (chars)
measures.description: Minimum length (in characters) observed in CommunicationText.

measures.name: Percent Non-empty Communications
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(CommunicationText, ''))) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of communications where CommunicationText is not empty (non-null, non-whitespace).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of TicketResult rows (actions) in the aggregation.

measures.name: CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions/results marked as completed (Result = 1).

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0) END
measures.description: Proportion of actions that are completed (CompletedCount / RowCount).

measures.name: PendingReviewCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingReview = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions currently flagged as pending review.

measures.name: CommunicationRecordedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultComm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions that recorded a communication (ResultComm = true).

measures.name: CustomerAcknowledgedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions that were acknowledged/confirmed by the customer (ResultCustomer = true).

measures.name: DistinctTicketCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets represented in the aggregation.

measures.name: ActionsPerTicket_Average
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT TicketID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT TicketID),0) END
measures.description: Average number of actions (rows) per ticket in the aggregation.

measures.name: FirstPerformedOn
measures.description: Earliest PerformedOn date/time for the aggregation.

measures.name: LastPerformedOn
measures.description: Latest PerformedOn date/time for the aggregation.

default_filters.description: By default exclude records with no performed date to focus on completed actions with timestamps.
Exclude records with undefined result to focus on explicit outcomes.

measures.name: ArchiveEventCount
measures.description: Number of archive events (rows) in the result set

measures.name: ArchivedRecords
measures.description: Sum of Recs for archive events; represents the total number of records processed/archived as reported by each archive event

measures.name: AverageRecordsPerEvent
measures.description: Average number of records processed per archive event

measures.name: DistinctEventGroups
measures.description: Number of unique EventGroup identifiers present

measures.name: TotalRowIdRangeCovered
measures.description: Sum of the inclusive ranges between StartID and EndID across events; represents number of row ids covered if StartID/EndID are contiguous

measures.name: AverageRowIdRangePerEvent
measures.description: Average inclusive row-id range per archive event (EndID - StartID + 1)

measures.name: FirstEventDate
measures.description: Earliest EventDate in the current aggregation

measures.name: LastEventDate
measures.description: Latest EventDate in the current aggregation

measures.name: EventSpanSeconds
measures.description: Difference in seconds between the earliest and latest EventDate in the current aggregation (zero for single-row groups)

measures.name: AttributeCount
measures.description: Total number of attribute definitions (row count).

measures.name: RequiredAttributeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequired = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attributes marked as required.

measures.name: PercentRequired
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequired = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of attributes that are required (RequiredAttributeCount / AttributeCount).

measures.name: ReadonlyAttributeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReadonly = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attributes marked read-only.

measures.name: HasDefaultValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DefaultValue IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(DefaultValue)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attributes that have a non-empty default value defined.

measures.name: DefaultValueRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DefaultValue IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(DefaultValue)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of attributes with a non-empty default value.

measures.name: AvgFillOrder
measures.description: Average FillOrder value (useful to understand typical ordering of attributes).

measures.name: DistinctPartsUsingAttributes
measures.description: Number of distinct UDAC part definitions that reference these attribute definitions.

measures.name: DistinctVisibilityMaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct visibility mask patterns observed across attributes.

measures.name: LookupDefinedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LookupTableName IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(LookupTableName)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attributes that reference a lookup table (LookupTableName defined).

measures.name: ValidationEnabledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EnableValidationRules = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attributes with validation rules enabled.

measures.name: MaxMaxLength
