measures.description: Maximum MaxLength value observed (useful to find attributes allowing the largest text).

foreign_keys.description: Links attribute definitions to the UDAC part definition they belong to.

default_filters.description: By default show editable attributes; remove filter to include read-only attributes.

default_sort.description: Order attributes by FillOrder by default to reflect configured display order.

measures.name: TotalRows
measures.description: Total number of UdacKit membership rows (one row per KitMember association).

measures.name: DistinctKits
measures.description: Number of distinct Kits present in the dataset.

measures.name: DistinctMembers
measures.description: Number of distinct Members referenced by Kits.

measures.name: MandatoryCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of KitMember rows where the member is marked as mandatory.

measures.name: OptionalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of KitMember rows where the member is not mandatory (optional).

measures.name: MandatoryRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of rows that are mandatory (MandatoryCount / TotalRows).

measures.name: AverageRowsPerKit
measures.description: Average number of member rows per Kit (rows / distinct kits). Useful as proxy for average members per kit.

measures.name: AssignedVersionSectionRate
measures.description: Proportion of rows that are associated with a VersionSection (non-null VersionSectionID).

measures.name: TotalParts
measures.description: Total number of UdacPart rows (by ID)

measures.name: TotalAddons
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsAddon = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of parts that are marked as addons

measures.name: AddonRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsAddon = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of parts that are addons (TotalAddons / TotalParts)

measures.name: AvgMinOccurence
measures.description: Average of the MinOccurence value (nulls ignored)

measures.name: AvgMaxOccurence
measures.description: Average of the MaxOccurence value (nulls ignored)

measures.name: MinOfMinOccurence
measures.description: Minimum observed MinOccurence

measures.name: MaxOfMaxOccurence
measures.description: Maximum observed MaxOccurence

measures.name: DistinctUdacCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Udac entities referenced by parts

measures.name: DistinctPartDefinitionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct UdacPartDefinition values referenced by parts

measures.name: PriceModeKnownCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceMode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where PriceMode is populated

measures.name: PriceModeKnownRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceMode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of rows with a non-null PriceMode

measures.name: FillOrderAvg
measures.description: Average FillOrder value

measures.name: FillOrderMin
measures.description: Minimum FillOrder value

measures.name: FillOrderMax
measures.description: Maximum FillOrder value

measures.name: RelationshipCount
measures.description: Total number of relationship records (rows) in the set

measures.name: DistinctSourceUdacCount
measures.description: Number of unique source UDACs appearing as the origin of relationships

measures.name: DistinctTargetUdacCount
measures.description: Number of unique target UDACs appearing as the destination of relationships

measures.name: ActiveRelationshipCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 OR IsActive = 'True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships currently flagged as active

measures.name: ActiveRelationshipPercent
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 OR IsActive = 'True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percentage of relationships that are active (ActiveRelationshipCount / RelationshipCount * 100)

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days between insertion and deactivation. For currently active relationships the duration is measured up to today.

measures.name: MinDurationDays
measures.description: Minimum duration in days for relationships (insertion to deactivation or to today for active records)

measures.name: MaxDurationDays
measures.description: Maximum duration in days for relationships (insertion to deactivation or to today for active records)

measures.name: AverageAgeDaysForActive
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 OR IsActive = 'True' THEN DATEDIFF(day, InsertionDate, GETDATE()) END)
measures.description: Average number of days since insertion for relationships that are currently active

display.notes: RelationshipType currently contains a single value in the sample set; verify business domain values and map to friendly labels if available.

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of VersionGroupItem rows (row count)

measures.name: ActiveItemCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items marked as active

measures.name: InactiveItemCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items marked as inactive

measures.name: RootItemCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ParentID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items that are root nodes (no ParentID)

measures.name: ChildItemCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ParentID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items that have a parent (child nodes)

measures.name: HasSourceHeadingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SourceHeadingID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that reference a SourceHeading

measures.name: HasSourceGeoCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SourceGeoID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that reference a SourceGeo (geo area)

measures.name: DistinctDMTableCount
measures.description: Number of distinct DMTable values present in the grain

measures.name: DistinctSourceHeadingCount
measures.description: How many distinct SourceHeadingIDs are referenced

measures.name: DistinctDMKeyCount
measures.description: Number of distinct DMKey values (mapped dimension keys)

measures.name: AvgDescriptionLength
measures.description: Average length (characters) of the Description column

measures.name: Activity Count
measures.description: Number of activity rows (count of ActivityID). Use for overall row counts and basic aggregations.

measures.name: Distinct Activity Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct activity codes in the current filter/context. Useful when ActivityCode may be non-unique across other dimensions or joins.

measures.name: Distinct Sector1s
measures.description: Count of distinct first-level sectors represented in the filtered set.

measures.name: Distinct Sector2s
measures.description: Count of distinct second-level sectors represented in the filtered set.

measures.name: Distinct Headings
measures.description: Count of distinct heading codes (classification headings) in the current filter/context.

measures.name: Advertisement Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: Distinct Advertisements
measures.description: Count of distinct advertisements (Adv_ID). Useful when the view is later joined/aggregated and duplicates may appear.

measures.name: Total Advertisement Price
measures.description: Sum of the advertised price (Adv_Price) across the grain.

measures.name: Total Advertisement Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied to advertisements (Adv_Discount).

measures.name: Total Advertisement Rules Discount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied to advertisements (Adv_RulesDiscount).

measures.name: Net Advertisement Revenue
measures.description: Net revenue for advertisements after subtracting both normal and rules discounts. Calculated as SUM(Adv_Price) - SUM(Adv_Discount) - SUM(Adv_RulesDiscount).

measures.name: Total Contract Product Price
measures.description: Sum of contract-product prices (CP_Price). Useful to compare contract pricing vs advertisement pricing.

measures.name: Total Contract Product Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts at the contract-product level (CP_Discount).

measures.name: Net Contract Product Revenue
measures.description: Net revenue for contract products after discounts.

measures.name: Average Advertisement Duration (days)
measures.description: Average duration in days between Adv_BeginDate and Adv_EndDate. If Adv_EndDate is NULL the calculation uses the current date (GETDATE())  interpret open-ended advertisements accordingly.

measures.name: Percent Subscription-Based Advertisements
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Adv_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of advertisements that are subscription-based. Calculated as the average of a 0/1 indicator.

measures.name: Percent QA Approved
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Adv_QA = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of advertisements that passed QA (Adv_QA = true).

measures.name: Average Price per Product (advertised)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT Adv_ProductID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(Adv_Price) / COUNT(DISTINCT Adv_ProductID) END
measures.description: Average advertised price aggregated per distinct advertised product (Adv_ProductID).

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of actions/rows in the result set

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented

measures.name: DistinctEntityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct entities (e.g., customers/contracts) touched by these actions

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced

measures.name: InvalidActionsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid IS NOT NULL AND IsInvalid <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions marked as invalid (IsInvalid not zero)

measures.name: InvalidActionsRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid IS NOT NULL AND IsInvalid <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(1) END
measures.description: Share of actions that are invalid (InvalidActionsCount / ActionCount)

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypeCount
measures.description: Number of different error types observed in the actions

measures.name: CompositeAdvertCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Adv_ProductIsComposite = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions where the advertisement product is marked as composite

measures.name: ActiveA_BPCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN A_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions where A_BPIsActive = 1 (A-side business process active)

measures.name: ActiveC_BPCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions where C_BPIsActive = 1 (C-side business process active)

measures.name: MissingTargetContractProductCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Target_CP_ProductID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions with no target contract product specified

measures.name: Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions flagged with Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID = 1

measures.name: QA_NotPassedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_NotPassedQA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions that did not pass QA (Invalid_NotPassedQA = 1)

measures.name: DistinctCPProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contract/product IDs referenced (CP_ProductID)

measures.name: LatestAssignmentDate
measures.description: The most recent sales assignment start date for the business point. At the BusinessPointID grain this equals the StartDate value in the view.

measures.name: DaysSinceLastAssignment
measures.description: Number of days elapsed since the latest sales assignment start date. Null-safe when no StartDate exists (will return NULL).

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Count of StartDate records for the business point in this view (typically 1 for a last-assignment view).

measures.name: IsAssigned
measures.expression: CASE WHEN MAX(StartDate) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
measures.description: Indicator whether the business point has at least one sales assignment start date.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of rows / target-group items in the campaign bucket view

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the selected rows

measures.name: Total Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of TotalAmount across rows (includes all medium components)

measures.name: XO.gr Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of XOGRAmount (XO.gr) across rows

measures.name: Website Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of WebSiteAmount across rows

measures.name: PPC Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of PPCAmount across rows (pay-per-click investments)

measures.name: Print Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of PrintAmount across rows (print investments)

measures.name: Targeting Amount Calculated (sum)
measures.description: Sum of system-calculated targeting amount

measures.name: Targeting Amount By User (sum)
measures.description: Sum of targeting amounts manually set by users (may be mostly null)

measures.name: Average Targeting Amount per Row
measures.description: Average of TargetingAmountCalculated per row (ignores nulls)

measures.name: Targeting Penetration
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(TotalAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(TargetingAmountCalculated,0)) / SUM(COALESCE(TotalAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Share of targeting-calculated investments relative to total amount (percentage)

measures.name: Average Score Total
measures.description: Average of ScoreTotal across rows (campaign scoring)

measures.name: Max Score Total
measures.description: Maximum ScoreTotal observed in the selected rows

measures.name: Average Score Difference to Avg
measures.description: Average difference of each row's score to the campaign average

measures.name: Average Score - Main Activity
measures.description: Average of the 'ScoreMainActivity' component

measures.name: Average Score - Seniority
measures.description: Average of the 'ScoreSeniority' component

measures.name: Average Score - Customer Behavior
measures.description: Average of the 'ScoreCustomerBehavior' component

measures.name: Count of Active Targeting (by user)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TargetingAmountByUser IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where a user-specified targeting amount exists

measures.name: Contracts
measures.description: Total number of contract rows (one row per contract ID in the view).

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts. Useful when the underlying view may contain duplicates.

measures.name: ActiveContracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_State = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts currently marked as active (C_State = 1).

measures.name: SignedContracts
measures.description: Number of contracts that have a sign date (non-null C_Signdate).

measures.name: PercentSigned
measures.description: Share of contracts that are signed (signed contracts divided by total contracts).

measures.name: AverageDaysToSign
measures.description: Average elapsed days between contract creation and sign date. Nulls in C_Signdate are excluded by the DATEDIFF semantics.

measures.name: AverageAgeDays
measures.description: Average age in days of contracts since creation (relative to current system date).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPartners
measures.description: Number of distinct business partners referenced by contracts (C_BPID).

measures.name: MigratedContracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_MigratedCode IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(UPPER(C_MigratedCode))) <> 'NONE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts that carry a migrated code (excludes explicit 'None' text observed in the data).

default_filters.description: Show active contracts by default (C_State = 1).
Default focus on recent signed contracts (adjust per reporting needs).

measures.name: TotalPrice
measures.description: Sum of product list prices for contract products

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Sum of all discounts applied to contract products (manual + rules)

measures.name: TotalNetRevenue
measures.description: Net revenue after product discounts and rules discounts

measures.name: AverageUnitPrice
measures.description: Average list price per contract product

measures.name: AverageNetPrice
measures.description: Average net price (after discounts) per contract product

measures.name: ContractProductCount
measures.description: Number of contract-product rows (rows at the grain)

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented

measures.name: SubscriptionProductCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products that are subscription-based

measures.name: SubscriptionShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of contract products that are subscription-based

measures.name: RenewableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products flagged as renewable

measures.name: RenewedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products that have been renewed

measures.name: AverageDiscountRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CP_Price) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CP_Discount + CP_RulesDiscount) * 1.0 / SUM(CP_Price) END
measures.description: Aggregate discount as a share of list price (total discounts / total price)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (market item tasks) in the result set. Aggregates at the grain of TaskID.

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Count of distinct customers (by numeric customer code) represented in the slice.

measures.name: TotalOfferAmount
measures.description: Sum of OfferAmount values for the selected rows. NULL OfferAmount rows are ignored by the SUM.

measures.name: AverageOfferAmount
measures.description: Average of OfferAmount across rows with a non-null OfferAmount.

measures.name: OffersCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have an OfferAmount (i.e. where an offer exists).

measures.name: OffersMissingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows with no OfferAmount (useful for data quality and coverage checks).

measures.name: ReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks/market items marked as released.

measures.name: PercentReleased
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percent of rows that are released (ReleasedCount / RowCount).

measures.name: BPIdentityConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the business point identity was confirmed.

measures.name: CRMCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as part of CRM (CRM = true).

measures.name: AppointmentScheduledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have an appointment datetime scheduled.

measures.name: LossPrintedNewPositiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LossPrintedNew > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where LossPrintedNew is greater than zero (indicates printed-loss status).

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of rows / tasks in the view (row-level count)

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks

measures.name: OfferAmountSum
measures.description: Total offer amount (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls excluded.

measures.name: OfferAmountAvg
measures.description: Average offer amount for records with OfferAmount

measures.name: OfferAmountCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have a non-null OfferAmount

measures.name: LossPrintedNewSum
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew flag/score across rows (interpreted as numeric indicator)

measures.name: AppointmentScheduledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where an appointment date/time is scheduled

measures.name: BPIdentityConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where identity was confirmed

measures.name: IsReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as released

measures.name: CRMCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that are marked as CRM

measures.name: RedFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRed <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where IsRed indicates the record is marked red (non-zero)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the fact at the selected aggregation level

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Count of distinct tasks represented

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (locations) in the current context

measures.name: SumOfferAmount
measures.description: Total offered amount across records. Null values are ignored.

measures.name: AvgOfferAmount
measures.description: Average offered amount (ignores null OfferAmount values)

measures.name: MinOfferAmount
measures.description: Minimum offered amount

measures.name: MaxOfferAmount
measures.description: Maximum offered amount

measures.name: OfferAmountNullCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records with no OfferAmount

measures.name: BPIdentityConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where the business point identity was confirmed

measures.name: BPIdentityConfirmedPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of records with confirmed business point identity (0-1)

measures.name: IsReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where the market item is released

measures.name: IsReleasedPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of records that are released

measures.name: CRMCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records marked as managed in CRM

measures.name: AppointmentsScheduledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records with a scheduled appointment

measures.name: AppointmentsScheduledPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of records that have an appointment scheduled

measures.name: SumLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values (numeric indicator aggregated)

measures.name: EarliestTaskCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest task created timestamp in the aggregation window

measures.name: LatestTaskCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest task created timestamp in the aggregation window

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of production tasks (one row per TaskID). Use this as the primary activity/count measure. TaskID is non-null and ~994 distinct values in the sample.

measures.name: Distinct Master Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct master cases associated with tasks. MasterCaseID shows no nulls in profiling and ~217 distinct values.

measures.name: Tasks With Contract Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that are associated with a Contract (ContractID is not null). Note: ContractID has a high null rate (~89.8%), so this count is typically much lower than total tasks.

measures.name: Percent With Contract
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of tasks that have an associated contract. Uses Task Count as the denominator. Null-safe (NULLIF to avoid division by zero).

measures.name: Contract Final Price (Sum)
measures.description: Total of ContractFinalPrice for tasks. ContractFinalPrice is sparsely populated in the profiling; treat this measure as frequently NULL/empty unless source fills it.

measures.name: Contract Final Price (Average)
measures.description: Average ContractFinalPrice across tasks where a value exists. Because of high null rate for ContractFinalPrice, this average only considers non-null values.

measures.name: Contract Final Price (Max)
measures.description: Maximum observed ContractFinalPrice. Useful for outlier detection and top-value reporting. Sparse values expected.

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salespeople (by full name) associated with tasks. SalesManFullName has many nulls (~89.2% null rate)  distinct counts reflect populated rows only.

foreign_keys.comment: Inferred relationship  verify against the MasterCase dimension/source
Inferred relationship  ContractID is often null; verify existence of Contract dimension/key
Inferred relationship  TicketID is present but sparsely populated; verify if tickets are modelled in a Ticket dimension

default_filters.description: Exclude malformed rows with missing TaskID (TaskID is primary grain, should be present).

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of production tasks (row count).

measures.name: Distinct Master Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct master cases referenced by tasks.

measures.name: Tasks with Contract
measures.description: Count of tasks that reference a non-null contract.

measures.name: Percent Tasks with Contract
measures.description: Share of tasks that are associated with a contract.

measures.name: Sum Contract Final Price
measures.description: Total of ContractFinalPrice across tasks. Currency assumed from source metadata as USD.

measures.name: Average Contract Final Price
measures.description: Average ContractFinalPrice for tasks with a non-null ContractFinalPrice.

measures.name: Maximum Contract Final Price
measures.description: Maximum reported ContractFinalPrice for any task.

measures.name: Tasks with Ticket
measures.description: Count of tasks that are linked to a ticket (non-null TicketID).

measures.name: Tasks Missing Ticket
measures.description: Count of tasks that do not have an associated ticket.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of task records (count of TaskID) in the aggregation

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by the tasks (distinct TaskCaseID)

measures.name: DistinctSenders
measures.description: Number of distinct senders who created tasks (excludes NULL senders)

measures.name: DistinctActualOwners
measures.description: Number of distinct actual owners assigned to tasks

measures.name: OpenStatusTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where TaskStatus = 0. (Interpretation of status codes is system-specific; sample data contains only 0.)

measures.name: EarliestCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest TaskCreatedOn timestamp in the aggregated set

measures.name: LatestCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest TaskCreatedOn timestamp in the aggregated set

measures.name: AverageTaskAgeDays
measures.description: Average age in days of tasks measured from TaskCreatedOn to current UTC time

display.notes: TaskStatus codes are system-defined; sample indicates only value 0. TaskSenderID and TaskActualOwnerID are nullable  consider filtering NULLs when slicing by people.

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.description: Number of failure rows (rows in this view).

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that experienced at least one renewal failure.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypeCount
measures.description: Number of different error types observed.

measures.name: IsInvalidCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as invalid (IsInvalid = 1).

measures.name: InvalidRate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of rows flagged invalid as a percentage of all rows.

measures.name: MissingTargetCPCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Target_CP_ProductID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures where the target CP product is missing (Target_CP_ProductID is NULL).

measures.name: MissingTargetADVCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Target_ADV_ProductID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures where the target advertisement product is missing (Target_ADV_ProductID is NULL).

measures.name: Invalid_Target_CP_VSID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_CP_VSID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged with Invalid_Target_CP_VSID.

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged with Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID.

measures.name: Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the view.

measures.name: Rows
measures.description: Number of rows returned (may be > campaigns when the view contains multiple rows per campaign).

measures.name: ReleasedCampaigns
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of campaigns flagged as released (IsReleased = true).

measures.name: ReleaseRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) END
measures.description: Share of campaigns that are released (ReleasedCampaigns / Campaigns).

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days computed as difference between CampaignStartedOn and CampaignClosedOn.

measures.name: MinDurationDays
measures.description: Shortest campaign duration in days.

measures.name: MaxDurationDays
measures.description: Longest campaign duration in days.

measures.name: DistinctSupervisors
measures.description: Number of distinct supervisors associated with campaigns (nulls ignored).

measures.name: DistinctTaskTypes
measures.description: Number of different task types present across the campaigns in the view.

measures.name: LatestVersion
measures.description: Highest Version value present for the campaigns (useful to detect schema/versioning differences).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of completed market analysis records (rows)

measures.name: TotalTargetValue
measures.description: Total target value across all records (sum of TargetValue). Assumed currency; verify if another currency applies.

measures.name: AverageTargetValue
measures.description: Average target value per record

measures.name: MinTargetValue
measures.description: Minimum TargetValue observed

measures.name: MaxTargetValue
measures.description: Maximum TargetValue observed

measures.name: TotalTargetCount
measures.description: Sum of TargetCount across records (number of targets)

measures.name: TargetValuePerTargetCount
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TargetCount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TargetValue) / SUM(TargetCount) END
measures.description: Average target value normalized by target count (TotalTargetValue / TotalTargetCount). NULL when TotalTargetCount = 0.

measures.name: AverageCustomerRating
measures.description: Average customer rating (scale and interpretation depends on source system)

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartDate and EndDate for each record

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the filtered set

measures.name: TargetAmount (Total)
measures.description: Total target monetary amount across rows. Assumes values are stored in the organization's reporting currency (USD).

measures.name: TargetCount (Total)
measures.description: Total target count (sum of TargetCount) for the grain or aggregation level.

measures.name: Average TargetAmount per Row
measures.description: Average target monetary amount per row (simple mean of TargetValue).

measures.name: Average TargetAmount per Target
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TargetCount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TargetValue) / SUM(TargetCount) END
measures.description: Weighted average target amount per target unit: total TargetValue divided by total TargetCount. Returns NULL when total target count is zero.

measures.name: Rows
measures.description: Row count of the view for the applied filter/aggregation  useful as a reliability/coverage measure.

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns present in the current filter/aggregation context.

measures.name: TargetAmount Standard Deviation
measures.description: Sample standard deviation of TargetValue  measures dispersion of target amounts across the selected set.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of tasks (rows) in the market item view. Grain is TaskID so this is equivalent to row count.

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (locations/customers) represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: Total Offer Amount
measures.description: Sum of OfferAmount for tasks where an offer value exists. OfferAmount is stored in USD (per column hint). Nulls are ignored by the SUM aggregation.

measures.name: Average Offer Amount
measures.description: Average of OfferAmount across tasks with non-null OfferAmount.

measures.name: Minimum Offer Amount
measures.description: Minimum non-null OfferAmount observed.

measures.name: Maximum Offer Amount
measures.description: Maximum OfferAmount observed.

measures.name: Sum Loss Printed (New)
measures.description: Total of LossPrintedNew values. Use to measure total printed-loss occurrences aggregated across tasks.

measures.name: Released Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks marked as released (IsReleased = true).

measures.name: Tasks with Appointment
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have an appointment date/time scheduled.

measures.name: BP Identity Confirmed
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where the business point identity was confirmed.

measures.name: Reliability GREEN % (of Tasks)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'GREEN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of tasks labeled with a GREEN reliability status.

measures.name: Offer Amount Null Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks without an OfferAmount value.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of tasks (row count by TaskID). Use as the default activity volume measure.

measures.name: OfferAmountSum
measures.description: Total offered amount for tasks. Null values are ignored in the sum.

measures.name: OfferAmountAvg
measures.description: Average offered amount per task (ignores nulls).

measures.name: OfferAmountMin
measures.description: Minimum offered amount observed.

measures.name: OfferAmountMax
measures.description: Maximum offered amount observed.

measures.name: OfferCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks with an offer amount recorded (non-null).

measures.name: OfferNonZeroCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where OfferAmount is greater than zero.

measures.name: OfferHitRate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID),0))
measures.description: Percentage of tasks that resulted in a non-zero offer (OfferNonZeroCount / TaskCount).

measures.name: LossPrintedCount
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew flags (indicates number of tasks marked as loss printed).

measures.name: AppointmentsScheduled
measures.description: Number of tasks with an AppointmentDateTime (non-null).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (based on CustomerCode) represented in the selected grain.

measures.name: TaskCount

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints

measures.name: OfferAmountSum
measures.description: Total offered amount for the rows (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls are ignored.

measures.description: Count of tasks that have not been completed (CompletedOn is NULL).

display.notes: Breakdowns favor owner and task type; default filter limits to the last 12 months to keep analyses performant.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of tasks (rows) in the result set. Use this to measure total tasks during the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (locations/customers) represented by the tasks in the current filter context.

measures.name: TotalLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Aggregate of the LossPrintedNew flag/metric. Interpreted as the total count of the 'loss printed' indicator across tasks.

measures.name: AverageLossPrintedPerTask
measures.description: Average value of LossPrintedNew per task (total LossPrintedNew divided by number of tasks). Useful to see average occurrences per task.

measures.name: ContactableCount
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL OR ReliabilityStatus IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks where contact information or reliability status is present. Helps estimate how many tasks are potentially contactable.

measures.name: CampaignPlannedDurationDays
measures.description: Planned campaign duration in days (difference between campaign start and campaign close dates).

measures.name: CaptureCount
measures.description: Number of advertisement capture records (row count) in the selected context

measures.name: UniqueCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (CustomerCode) represented

measures.name: UniqueProfiles
measures.description: Number of distinct profile URLs / listings (FriendlyUrl)

measures.name: MaxVersion
measures.description: Highest Version observed for captures in the selected context

measures.name: LatestCaptureDate
measures.description: Most recent capture date/time in the selected context

measures.name: SnapshotExistsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SnapshotFile IS NOT NULL AND SnapshotFile <> '' AND SnapshotFile <> 'None' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of captures which have a non-empty snapshot file path

measures.name: SnapshotExistsPct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN SnapshotFile IS NOT NULL AND SnapshotFile <> '' AND SnapshotFile <> 'None' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(Id),0)
measures.description: Percentage of capture rows that include a snapshot file

measures.name: DetailsNonEmptyCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Details IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Details)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of captures with non-empty Details text

measures.name: DetailsNonEmptyPct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Details IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Details)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(Id),0)
measures.description: Share of captures that contain non-empty Details

measures.name: DistinctListingTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct ListingType values observed (e.g., 'free', ...)

measures.name: AverageVersion
measures.description: Average Version value across the selected rows (useful as an indicator of typical version)

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of records (rows) in the fact for the selected grain.

measures.name: SumOfferAmount
measures.description: Total offer amount across matching records.

measures.name: AvgOfferAmount
measures.description: Average offer amount across matching records.

measures.name: MinOfferAmount
measures.description: Minimum offer amount.

measures.name: MaxOfferAmount
measures.description: Maximum offer amount.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers in the result set.

measures.name: SignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that have a signing date (LastSignedDate).

measures.name: OpenContractsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EndDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts/tasks without an EndDate (considered open).

measures.name: AppointmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records that have an appointment date/time scheduled.

measures.name: LossPrintedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(LossPrintedNew, '')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where LossPrintedNew is populated (indicates a documented loss state).

measures.name: AvgDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartDate and EndDate. Null EndDate rows are excluded by DATEDIFF semantics.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of rows (listings/records) in the view.

measures.name: Distinct Entities
measures.description: Number of distinct business/customer codes ().

measures.name: Total Contract Value
measures.description: Sum of the contract signature values (.  ). Monetary values assumed in EUR.

measures.name: Average Contract Value
measures.description: Average contract signature value per record.

measures.name: Active Contracts (as of today)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [] IS NULL OR [] >= GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records whose end date () is in the future or not set, indicating currently active contracts/listings.

measures.name: Average Duration Days
measures.description: Average length in days between start () and end () dates. Null or negative intervals will be handled by the source SQL engine.

measures.name: Online Presence Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [  ( Online )] IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM([  ( Online )])) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records that have an online seller/online entry (non-empty   ( Online )).

measures.name: Percent With Online Presence
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN [  ( Online )] IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM([  ( Online )])) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of records that have an online seller/online listing.

measures.name: Contracts With Appointment
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [] IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that have a scheduled appointment ().

measures.name: Count With Contract Code

measures.description: Number of rows that include a contract code (. ).

foreign_keys.note: Business/customer code - suggested reference to customer dimension.
Contract code - suggested reference to contract dimension.
Category name - suggested lookup to category dimension.
Sub-channel () - suggested lookup to channel/subchannel dimension.
Postal code - suggested lookup to postal/geo dimension.

default_filters.note: Default to recent records starting from 2024-01-01; adjust as needed.
Filter to currently active contracts by default (end date in the future).

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Total number of rows / tasks in the view (row count). Use as the base count for rates and averages.

measures.name: OfferAmountTotal
measures.description: Sum of OfferAmount values for the selected grain/filters. Monetary amounts are assumed to be in EUR.

measures.name: OfferAmountAverage
measures.description: Average OfferAmount per row.

measures.name: OfferAmountMin
measures.description: Minimum OfferAmount observed.

measures.name: OfferAmountMax
measures.description: Maximum OfferAmount observed.

measures.name: SignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have a signing date (LastSignedDate is not null).

measures.name: SignedRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of rows that were signed (SignedCount / TaskCount). Expressed as a fraction (0-1) but formatted as a percentage.

measures.name: AppointmentsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have an appointment date/time.

measures.name: AppointmentRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of rows that have an appointment (AppointmentsCount / TaskCount).

measures.name: AvgDaysToSign
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL AND StartDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, LastSignedDate) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of days between StartDate and LastSignedDate for rows that have both dates.

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceStart
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN StartDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, GETDATE()) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of days since StartDate to today. Useful for ageing analysis.

measures.name: ExpiredInternetCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ExpirationDateInternet IS NOT NULL AND ExpirationDateInternet < GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the internet expiration date has passed (ExpirationDateInternet is before today).

measures.name: AvgDaysToExpiration
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ExpirationDateInternet IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, GETDATE(), ExpirationDateInternet) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average days from today until ExpirationDateInternet (negative values indicate already expired).

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of tasks (rows) in the view

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Count of distinct customer codes referenced by these tasks

measures.name: Offer Amount - Sum
measures.description: Total OfferAmount across tasks (USD). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Offer Amount - Average
measures.description: Average OfferAmount per task (USD) excluding nulls.

measures.name: Offer Amount - Min
measures.description: Minimum non-null OfferAmount (USD)

measures.name: Offer Amount - Max
measures.description: Maximum OfferAmount (USD)

measures.name: Offer Amount - Count (non-null)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a non-null OfferAmount

measures.name: Percent Released
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of tasks marked as released (IsReleased)

measures.name: Percent CRM Flag
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CRM = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of tasks where CRM flag is true

measures.name: Percent BP Identity Confirmed
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of tasks where business point identity was confirmed

measures.name: Percent With Contract
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of tasks that are associated with an existing ContractID

measures.name: Percent With Appointment Scheduled
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of tasks where an appointment DateTime is present

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view (events/records).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers present in the extract (distinct . ).

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of the numeric amount column ( ). Currency assumed EUR; adjust if different.

measures.name: AvgAmountPerCustomer
measures.description: Average of   per distinct customer (TotalAmount divided by distinct customers).

measures.name: ActiveSubscriptions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [  ] IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows with a non-null subscription signing date (  ).

measures.name: PrintSubscribers
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [   print] IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows with a non-null print subscription signing date (   print).

measures.name: DistinctPrintSalesReps
measures.description: Number of distinct print sales representative IDs ( - Y01 - Print).

measures.name: DistinctOnlineSalesReps
measures.description: Number of distinct online sales representative IDs (OnlineSalesRepID - Y01 - Online).

measures.name: PercentRowsWithAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [ ] IS NOT NULL AND [ ] <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of rows where   is present and non-zero.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of pre-printed assignment rows (one row per record in the view).

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customer codes present in the current filter context. Source column: [. ] (Customer Code).

measures.name: Distinct Inspectors
measures.description: Number of distinct inspector codes present in the current filter context. Source column: [. ] (Inspector Code).

measures.name: Distinct S.D. Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct S.D. (..) codes in the current filter context. Source column: [. ..].

measures.name: Average Assignments per Inspector
measures.description: Average number of assignment rows per inspector within the current filter context. Division by zero is guarded by NULLIF.

measures.name: Distinct Customer Names
measures.description: Number of distinct customer name values ( ) present in the current filter context.

foreign_keys.note: Suggested mapping to a customer dimension on customer code ( ).
Suggested mapping to an inspector dimension on inspector code ( ).
Suggested mapping to a dimension for .. (S.D.) codes if such a dimension exists.

display.notes: This view contains assignment-level rows (no monetary measures). Use counts and distinct counts for analysis. Consider joining to dimensional tables for richer breakdowns (customers, inspectors, S.D.).

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of tasks (rows) in the view. Grain is TaskID so this is the row count.

measures.name: Distinct Contracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts referenced by the tasks.

measures.name: Tasks With Contract Date
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a non-null ContractDate.

measures.name: Tasks Assigned (Has ActualOwner)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have an actual owner assigned.

measures.name: Tasks Unassigned (No ActualOwner)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActualOwnerID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that do not have an actual owner assigned.

measures.name: Assigned Percentage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of tasks that have an actual owner assigned (Assigned tasks / Total tasks).

measures.name: Average Days Between ContractDate and TaskCreatedOn
measures.description: Average elapsed days from ContractDate to TaskCreatedOn. Null ContractDate values are excluded from the DATEDIFF calculation.

measures.name: Average Tasks per BusinessPoint
measures.description: Average number of tasks per distinct BusinessPointCode in the current filter context.

measures.name: BannerCount
measures.description: Total number of banner records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: ActiveBannerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CT23_StartDate <= GETDATE() AND (CT05_ExpirationDate IS NULL OR CT05_ExpirationDate >= GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners considered active today (start date on-or-before today and expiration date null or on-or-after today).

measures.name: PercentActive
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(IL07_CT05_Id)=0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN CT23_StartDate <= GETDATE() AND (CT05_ExpirationDate IS NULL OR CT05_ExpirationDate >= GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(IL07_CT05_Id) END
measures.description: Share of banners that are active today (ActiveBannerCount / BannerCount).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Count of distinct campaign identifiers present in the result set.

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceStart
measures.description: Average number of days elapsed since each banner's start date (uses current date for ongoing calculation). Null start dates are excluded from the average.

measures.name: AvgPlannedDurationDays
measures.description: Average planned duration in days between start date and expiration date for banners that have both dates defined.

measures.name: AvgRemainingDaysToExpiration
measures.description: Average number of days from today until expiration for banners that have an expiration date (can be negative for already expired).

measures.name: ScriptPresenceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(oxScript,'')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners that include non-empty oxScript content.

measures.name: AvgScriptLengthChars
measures.description: Average length in characters of the oxScript content (nulls and zero-length treated as NULL for the average).

measures.name: AvgTextToPrintLengthChars
measures.description: Average character length of CT11_TextToPrint (nulls and zero-length treated as NULL for the average).

measures.name: HasPrependCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(oxPrepend,'')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners that include non-empty oxPrepend content.

measures.name: HasAppendCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(oxAppend,'')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners that include non-empty oxAppend content.

measures.name: DistinctBrandCount
measures.description: Number of distinct brand names represented by CM22_BrandName.

foreign_keys.description: Links the banner row to the Contract dimension (ContractCode).
Likely client/company identifier; maps to the Company dimension.
Possible distributor/location code; maps to a Distributor/Channel dimension.
Possible regional or sub-distributor code; map to Region dimension.
Possible user/division code; map to a Division or BusinessUnit dimension.
Contract type/code that categorizes the contract; map to ContractType dimension.
Potential general ledger identifier; map to GLAccount dimension if applicable.

default_filters.expression: CT23_StartDate <= GETDATE() AND (CT05_ExpirationDate IS NULL OR CT05_ExpirationDate >= GETDATE())
default_filters.description: Default to active banners as of today.
Exclude rows without a brand name by default.

measures.name: BannerCount
measures.description: Number of banner rows in the view.

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Count of distinct contracts represented in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctBrands
measures.description: Number of distinct brand names (CM22_BrandName).

measures.name: TotalActiveDays
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CT23_StartDate IS NOT NULL AND CT05_ExpirationDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CT23_StartDate, CT05_ExpirationDate) ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total number of days computed as the sum of (ExpirationDate - StartDate) for rows where both dates exist. Null date pairs are treated as 0 days.

measures.name: AverageActiveDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CT23_StartDate IS NOT NULL AND CT05_ExpirationDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CT23_StartDate, CT05_ExpirationDate) END)
measures.description: Average duration in days between CT23_StartDate and CT05_ExpirationDate for banners that have both dates defined.

measures.name: CurrentlyActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN GETUTCDATE() BETWEEN CT23_StartDate AND CT05_ExpirationDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners considered active at query time (GETUTCDATE() between start and expiration). Time-sensitive: value depends on query execution time.

measures.name: ExpiringSoonCount_30d
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CT05_ExpirationDate IS NOT NULL AND CT05_ExpirationDate BETWEEN GETUTCDATE() AND DATEADD(day, 30, GETUTCDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners with an expiration date within the next 30 days from the query execution time.

measures.name: HasScriptCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(oxScript, ''))) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of banners containing a non-empty oxScript value.

measures.name: HasServiceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(oxService, ''))) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of banners containing a non-empty oxService value.

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Count of distinct business points in the snapshot (deduplicated by BusinessPointCode) for the given ComparisonDate.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (useful for diagnostics and row-level completeness checks).

measures.name: MaxLastContractNumber
measures.description: Maximum value of the last contract number observed for the business points in the aggregation.

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceLastSignature
measures.description: Average number of days between the last signature date and the snapshot (ComparisonDate). Null signature dates are excluded from the average by the engine's DATEDIFF semantics.

measures.name: PctWithActiveDisplay
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [DisplaySuspensionDate] IS NULL AND ([LastDisplayEndDate] IS NULL OR [LastDisplayEndDate] >= [ComparisonDate]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT_BIG(DISTINCT [BusinessPointCode]), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points considered to have an active display at snapshot time (no suspension and end date absent or not yet reached).

measures.name: PctWithMobilePhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [MobilePhone] IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM([MobilePhone])) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT_BIG(DISTINCT [BusinessPointCode]), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points that have a non-empty mobile phone value.

measures.name: DistinctRegionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct regions () represented in the snapshot.

measures.name: LatestSnapshotDate
measures.description: The most recent ComparisonDate present in the data (useful to confirm freshness of the view).

measures.name: CampaignCount
measures.description: Total number of campaigns (row count)

measures.name: OpenCampaignCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns that are still open (no ClosedOn timestamp)

measures.name: ClosedCampaignCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns that have been closed (ClosedOn set)

measures.name: ClosureRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of campaigns that have been closed (closed / total)

measures.name: AverageTimeToCloseDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, StartedOn, ClosedOn) END)
measures.description: Average number of days between StartedOn and ClosedOn for closed campaigns

measures.name: MinTimeToCloseDays
measures.expression: MIN(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, StartedOn, ClosedOn) END)
measures.description: Minimum number of days to close a campaign (for closed campaigns)

measures.name: MaxTimeToCloseDays
measures.expression: MAX(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, StartedOn, ClosedOn) END)
measures.description: Maximum number of days to close a campaign (for closed campaigns)

measures.name: ComplaintRows
measures.description: Total rows in the view (one row per complaint or per comment record).

measures.name: UniqueComplaints
measures.description: Number of distinct complaint tickets.

measures.name: CommentsCount
measures.description: Number of comment entries associated with complaints (counts non-null CommentText values).

measures.name: ResolvedComplaints
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN Result = 'Resolved' THEN Ticket END)
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets marked as resolved based on Result = 'Resolved'. Update condition if your system uses other values to indicate resolution.

measures.name: UnresolvedComplaints
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN Result IS NULL OR Result <> 'Resolved' THEN Ticket END)
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets not marked as 'Resolved' (includes tickets with other Result values or null).

measures.name: ResolutionRate
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN Result = 'Resolved' THEN Ticket END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT Ticket), 0)
measures.description: Share of distinct tickets that are resolved. Denominator is distinct tickets; guarded against division by zero.

measures.name: AvgCommentsPerComplaint
measures.description: Average number of comments per complaint (counts non-null CommentText divided by distinct tickets).

measures.name: AvgCommentLatencyMinutes
measures.description: Average time in minutes between complaint creation and a comment. Null CommentCreatedOn rows are excluded. For a precise 'time to first comment' metric, compute first CommentCreatedOn per ticket before averaging.

measures.name: LatestCommentDate
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent comment present in the view.

measures.name: FileCount
measures.description: Total number of file reference rows in the view

measures.name: UniqueFileNames
measures.description: Number of distinct file names referenced

measures.name: DistinctPaths
measures.description: Number of distinct file system paths

measures.name: DistinctDpsCodes
measures.description: Number of distinct DpsCode values (nulls are excluded by COUNT(DISTINCT))

measures.name: AverageFilenameLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the filename values

measures.name: MaxFilenameLength
measures.description: Maximum length (in characters) of the filename values

measures.name: UniqueCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the view (excludes NULL CustomerCode).

measures.name: CustomersWithBillingEmail
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers that have a non-empty BillingEmail.

measures.name: CustomersWithBillingPhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers that have a non-empty BillingPhone.

measures.name: CustomersWithAnyEmail
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN (BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '') OR (Email2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Email2)) <> '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers that have at least one non-empty email address (billing or secondary).

measures.name: CustomersWithAnyPhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN (BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '') OR (Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '') OR (Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers that have at least one non-empty phone number (billing or secondary).

measures.name: EmailCoverage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN (BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '') OR (Email2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Email2)) <> '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) END
measures.description: Share of customers that have at least one email address. (CustomersWithAnyEmail / UniqueCustomerCount)

measures.name: PhoneCoverage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN (BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '') OR (Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '') OR (Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) END
measures.description: Share of customers that have at least one phone number. (CustomersWithAnyPhone / UniqueCustomerCount)

measures.name: AvgPhonesPerCustomer
measures.expression: AVG( (CASE WHEN BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) )
measures.description: Average number of non-empty phone numbers per customer (counts BillingPhone, Phone2, Phone3).

foreign_keys.description: Links contact rows to the customer dimension by CustomerCode.

default_filters.description: Exclude rows with no CustomerCode.

display.notes: Common analyses: coverage of email/phone by customer, counts of customers with billing vs secondary contacts. Consider joining DimCustomer for richer breakdowns (region, customer type).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the view (CustomerCode may be null).

measures.name: NumericScoreCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(score AS FLOAT) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the score can be interpreted as a numeric value.

measures.name: AverageScoreNumeric
measures.description: Average of scores interpreted as numeric values. Non-numeric score values are ignored.

measures.name: PercentCustomersWithNumericScore
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(score AS FLOAT) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode), 0)
measures.description: Share of distinct customers that have a numeric score value (NULL when there are no customers).

measures.name: MaxScoreText
measures.description: Lexicographically maximum score value (useful when scores are categorical).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows/records in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers as identified by CustomerCode.

measures.name: CustomersWithCategoryCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CustomerCategoryId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have a non-null CustomerCategoryId.

measures.name: DistinctCustomersWithCategoryCount
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN CustomerCategoryId IS NOT NULL THEN CustomerCode END)
measures.description: Number of distinct customers that have a non-null customer category.

measures.name: PercentRowsWithCategory
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CustomerCategoryId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows that include a customer category.

measures.name: PercentDistinctCustomersWithCategory
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN CustomerCategoryId IS NOT NULL THEN CustomerCode END) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) END
measures.description: Share of distinct customers that have a customer category.

measures.name: Document Rows
measures.description: Number of document rows in the view (one row per document mapping).

measures.name: Default Document Rows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDefault = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of document rows marked as default (IsDefault = 1).

measures.name: Default Document Share
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsDefault = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of rows that are marked as default out of total document rows.

measures.name: Distinct Contracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts present in the dataset.

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct MainCustomerCode values represented.

measures.name: Average OrderNum
measures.description: Average of OrderNum across rows (useful when OrderNum encodes ordering or priority). NULLs are excluded.

measures.name: Max OrderNum
measures.description: Maximum OrderNum value for the returned rows.

measures.name: Min OrderNum
measures.description: Minimum OrderNum value for the returned rows.

measures.name: Classification Count
measures.description: Total number of rows (classifications) in the view.

measures.name: Distinct Description Count
measures.description: Number of unique Description values.

measures.name: Average Description Length
measures.description: Average number of characters in the Description field.

measures.name: Populated Description Percentage
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Description IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Description)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Percent of rows that have a non-empty Description.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows returned by the view (should equal number of person records in the snapshot).

measures.name: DistinctPersonCount
measures.description: Number of distinct persons (based on Code).

measures.name: ActivePersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of persons marked as active.

measures.name: InactivePersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of persons marked as inactive.

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Code) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(Code) END
measures.description: Share of persons that are active (ActivePersonCount / DistinctPersonCount).

measures.name: LatestModifiedDate
measures.description: The most recent LastModifiedDate among all person records (snapshot recency).

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceModified
measures.description: Average number of days since each record was last modified (relative to current UTC date/time).

measures.name: MaxDaysSinceModified
measures.description: Maximum number of days since last modification for the oldest record in the snapshot (how stale the oldest record is).

measures.name: ContractLineCount
measures.description: Number of contract line rows (rows in this fact/view).

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented in the result set.

measures.name: Revenue
measures.description: Total net amount for contract lines. NetAmount is treated as the primary revenue/cost measure.

measures.name: TotalAdvancedPayments
measures.description: Total advanced (upfront) payments received for the contract lines.

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmounts
measures.description: Sum of recorded alterations/adjustments to amounts (may be null/rare).

measures.name: OutstandingAmount
measures.description: Net amount outstanding after subtracting advanced payments and recorded alterations.

measures.name: TotalInvoiceQuantity
measures.description: Total number of invoice items (sum of InvoiceQuantity) across contract lines.

measures.name: AverageInvoiceQuantity
measures.description: Average InvoiceQuantity per contract line.

measures.name: AverageInstallmentsPerInvoice
measures.description: Average number of installments configured per invoice for these contract lines.

measures.name: TotalActiveDays
measures.description: Cumulative length in days of the contract line periods (EndDate - StartDate). Rows with null dates may reduce accuracy.

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days for a contract line between StartDate and EndDate.

measures.name: RenewalRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of contract lines marked as renewable (IsRenewable).

measures.name: PrepaidRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(AdvancedPayment,0) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of contract lines with an advanced (pre-) payment greater than zero.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to a contract dimension (if available).
Reference to an advertisement dimension.
Reference to parent advertisement when present.
Reference to UDAC (geographic/organizational) dimension.
Reference to the medium/channel dimension.

measures.name: AddressCount
measures.description: Total number of address records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (MainCustomerCode) represented by addresses.

measures.name: DistinctContactCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contacts referenced by ContactCode.

measures.name: AddressesPerCustomerAvg
measures.description: Average number of addresses per customer.

measures.name: AddressesWithEmailCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Email IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of address records that have a non-null Email.

measures.name: EmailCompleteness
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Email IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(AddressID), 0)
measures.description: Share of address records that include an Email (completeness).

measures.name: AddressesWithInvoiceEmailCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN InvoiceEmail IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of address records that have a non-null InvoiceEmail.

measures.name: InvoiceEmailCompleteness
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN InvoiceEmail IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(AddressID), 0)
measures.description: Share of address records that include an InvoiceEmail.

measures.name: Phone1Completeness
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(AddressID), 0)
measures.description: Share of address records that include a primary phone number (Phone1).

measures.name: Phone2Completeness
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(AddressID), 0)
measures.description: Share of address records that include a secondary phone number (Phone2).

measures.name: FaxCompleteness
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Fax IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(AddressID), 0)
measures.description: Share of address records that include a fax number.

measures.name: CategoryAssignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CategoryId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of address records that have a CategoryId assigned.

measures.name: ScoreAssignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ScoreId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of address records that have a ScoreId assigned.

measures.name: LastModifiedDateMax
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate among the address records.

measures.name: LastModifiedDateMin
measures.description: Earliest LastModifiedDate among the address records.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows/records in the view (includes duplicates if any). Use UniqueCustomerCount to measure distinct customers.

measures.name: UniqueCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers as identified by Code.

measures.name: ActiveCustomerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of customers marked as active (IsActive = true).

measures.name: InactiveCustomerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of customers marked as inactive (IsActive = false).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of active customers out of total rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: NoTaxVatCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NoTaxVat = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of customers flagged as having no VAT (NoTaxVat = true).

measures.name: HasAlternativeCodeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AlternativeCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of customers that have a non-null AlternativeCode.

measures.name: DistinctTaxRegistrationCount
