measures.description: Number of distinct tax registration numbers present in the dataset.

measures.name: LastModifiedDate_Max
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate for rows in the current filter context.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the owning company. In sample data CompanyID = 1 for all rows.
Reference to the tax office / local tax authority code.
Reference to general ledger sequence code (mapping in GLSequence table).

default_filters.description: Most reports should be scoped to the default company (sample data uses CompanyID = 1).
Show active customers by default.

measures.name: CustomerCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (customers) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerIDCount
measures.description: Count of distinct customer IDs. Matches CustomerCount when ID is unique per row.

measures.name: NonNullNameCount
measures.description: Number of rows that have a non-null Name value.

measures.name: AverageScore
measures.description: Average of the numeric score parsed from the Name column. The expression extracts the substring after the last dash (' - ') and converts it to a float where possible. NULLs (unparsable values) are ignored.

measures.name: MinScore
measures.description: Minimum parsed numeric score from the Name column.

measures.name: MaxScore
measures.description: Maximum parsed numeric score from the Name column.

measures.name: ScoreStdDev
measures.description: Population standard deviation (sample-based STDEV) of parsed numeric scores. NULLs (unparsable values) are ignored.

display.notes: Default filter keeps rows where Name contains ' - ' to ensure a parsable trailing score. If the source format changes, the score extraction expressions should be reviewed.

measures.name: Error Count
measures.description: Total number of post-check log rows (errors) in the result set.

measures.name: Distinct Error Types
measures.description: Number of distinct error categories observed in the log.

measures.name: Distinct Customers Affected
measures.description: Number of unique customer codes referenced by errors (nulls excluded).

measures.name: Distinct Contracts Referenced
measures.description: Number of distinct contract IDs referenced in the log.

measures.name: Sum CL Net Amount
measures.description: Sum of CL_NetAmount for rows in the log. Many rows are null; this aggregates only available monetary values.

measures.name: Average CL Net Amount
measures.description: Average CL_NetAmount across rows where a net amount exists.

measures.name: Rows with Financial Data
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CL_NetAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that include CL_NetAmount (i.e., rows with financial values).

measures.name: Percent Missing Customer Code
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Cust_Code IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percent of rows that are missing a Cust_Code value.

measures.name: Most Recent Error Date
measures.description: Latest ErrorDate present in the filtered dataset.

measures.name: Earliest Error Date
measures.description: Earliest ErrorDate present in the filtered dataset.

display.notes: This view does not define a primary key in the source. The chosen grain (BatchID + ErrorType + ErrorDate + Cust_Code) is a best-effort composite key for reporting; it may not be strictly unique. Many columns are sparsely populated (high null rates)  use filters on CL_NetAmount, C_ContractID or Cust_Code to focus on rows with richer data.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of collected amounts on receipts (monetary).

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the collection.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerReceipt
measures.description: Average amount per receipt.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum single receipt amount.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum single receipt amount.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct main customers represented in the dataset.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(SystemReceiptID), 0)
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (PayoffCount / ReceiptCount).

measures.name: CompletedReceiptCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UPPER(Status) = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts whose status is COMPLETED.

measures.name: DistinctBlockCount
measures.description: Number of distinct receipt blocks (BlockSeries + BlockReceiptNumber).

measures.name: TotalSalesPeople
measures.description: Total number of salesperson records in the view (one row per Code).

measures.name: ActiveSalesPeople
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of salespeople currently marked as active (IsActive = True).

measures.name: InactiveSalesPeople
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of salespeople currently marked as inactive (IsActive = False).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(Code), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of salespeople that are active (ActiveSalesPeople / TotalSalesPeople).

measures.name: MostRecentModification
measures.description: The most recent LastModifiedDate across all salesperson records.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of service rows in the view (records).

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct service codes.

measures.name: DistinctNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct service names.

measures.name: ActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of services marked active (IsActive = 1).

measures.name: InactiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of services marked inactive (IsActive = 0).

measures.name: PercentActive
measures.description: Share of services that are active (0-1 average of IsActive).

measures.name: BundleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of services that are bundles (IsBundle = 1).

measures.name: PercentBundle
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of services that are bundles.

measures.name: ActiveBundleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 AND IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of services that are both active and bundles.

measures.name: LastModificationDateMax
measures.description: Most recent modification date across the service records.

measures.name: LastModificationDateMin
measures.description: Earliest modification date across the service records.

measures.name: DaysSinceLastModification
measures.description: Number of days since the most recent modification (relative to GETDATE()).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the VAT status mapping view.

measures.name: ActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of VAT status rows marked as active.

measures.name: ActivePercentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of VAT status rows that are active (ActiveCount / RecordCount).

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Code values represented in the view.

measures.name: MappingRows
measures.description: Number of mapping rows (occurrences) in the view. Use this to count raw mapping records.

measures.name: DistinctActivities
measures.description: Number of distinct activities represented in the current query context.

measures.name: DistinctHeadings
measures.description: Number of distinct headings represented in the current query context.

measures.name: DistinctThematicCategories
measures.description: Number of distinct thematic categories represented in the current query context.

measures.name: HeadingsPerActivity
measures.description: When grouped by ActivityID this returns how many distinct headings are associated with each activity.

measures.name: ActivitiesPerThematic
measures.description: When grouped by ThematicCategoryID this returns how many distinct activities are associated with each thematic category.

measures.name: PercentRowsWithThematic
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ThematicCategoryID IS NOT NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Percentage of mapping rows that have a non-null thematic category assigned. Useful as a data-completeness indicator.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view (useful for quick sanity checks).

measures.name: DistinctAttributeValues
measures.description: Number of distinct attribute values. This measure matches the expected unique key cardinality when AttributeValueID is used as the grain.

measures.name: DistinctAttributes
measures.description: Count of distinct attributes represented by the values in this view.

measures.name: DistinctValueCodes
measures.description: Number of distinct value codes. Useful to detect duplicate codes or code reuse across attribute values.

measures.name: AvgAttributeValueNameLength
measures.description: Average character length of AttributeValueName. Helpful for UI sizing and data quality checks.

measures.name: ValuesPerAttributeAvg
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT AttributeID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT AttributeID) END
measures.description: Average number of attribute value rows per attribute (rows divided by distinct attributes).

foreign_keys.description: Likely reference to the Attribute master/dimension table (inferred). Verify existence of dbo.Attribute.
Likely reference to a dedicated AttributeValue table if one exists. AttributeValueID appears to be the natural key for this view.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Number of rows / actions in the analysis (row-level count).

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the filtered set.

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced by the actions.

measures.name: InvalidCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid IS NOT NULL AND IsInvalid <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions marked as invalid. Treats any non-zero IsInvalid value as invalid.

measures.name: InvalidPercent
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid IS NOT NULL AND IsInvalid <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Percentage of actions that are invalid out of total actions.

measures.name: Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID IS NOT NULL AND Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions flagged for invalid target contract-product id.

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID IS NOT NULL AND Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions flagged for invalid target advertisement product id.

measures.name: Active_A_BP_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN A_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions where A (source) business process is active.

measures.name: Active_C_BP_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions where C (target) business process is active.

measures.name: CompositeProductCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Adv_ProductIsComposite = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisement products marked as composite.

measures.name: LastSalesAssignmentDate
measures.description: Most recent sales assignment start date recorded for the business point.

measures.name: DaysSinceLastSalesAssignment
measures.description: Number of days elapsed since the most recent sales assignment start date for the business point.

measures.name: AssignedInLast365Days
measures.expression: CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(day, MAX(StartDate), GETUTCDATE()) <= 365 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
measures.description: Flag indicating whether the business point had a sales assignment within the last 365 days.

measures.name: StartYear
measures.description: Year component of the most recent sales assignment start date for grouping and filtering.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Row count for the business point within this view (useful to validate one-row-per-business-point expectation).

measures.name: TotalPrice
measures.description: Sum of gross prices for contract products (before discounts and rules discounts).

measures.name: TotalRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by rules on contract products.

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Sum of manual or line-item discounts on contract products.

measures.name: TotalDiscountsCombined
measures.description: Combined sum of rule-based and line discounts applied to contract products.

measures.name: NetRevenue
measures.description: Net revenue from contract products after subtracting discounts and rule discounts.

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average gross price per contract product.

measures.name: ContractProductCount
measures.description: Number of contract product rows (at the grain of CP_ID).

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Count of distinct contracts represented in the result set.

measures.name: SubscriptionProductCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products flagged as subscription-based.

measures.name: RenewableProductCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products flagged as renewable.

measures.name: RenewedProductCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products that have been renewed.

measures.name: ExchangeSalesCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PM_IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products sold as exchange sales (payment method flagged).

measures.name: AttributeValueCount
measures.description: Total number of attribute value rows (records).

measures.name: DistinctAttributeValues
measures.description: Number of distinct Cav_Value values present in the dataset.

measures.name: DistinctAttributes
measures.description: Number of distinct attribute definitions (Cad_ID) referenced by the rows.

measures.name: AverageAttributeValueLength
measures.description: Average length in characters of Cav_Value (NULL values excluded by LEN).

measures.name: PercentMissingValues
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cav_Value IS NULL OR LEN(LTRIM(RTRIM(Cav_Value))) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of rows where Cav_Value is NULL or empty.

measures.name: Sum_CP_Price
measures.description: Sum of CP_Price across rows. CP_Price is a contract-product price repeated per attribute row; interpret accordingly when aggregating.

measures.name: Average_CP_Price
measures.description: Average CP_Price for rows in the current context.

measures.name: Sum_Adv_Price
measures.description: Sum of Adv_Price across rows. Adv_Price is an advertisement-level price repeated per attribute row; interpret accordingly.

measures.name: Average_Adv_Price
measures.description: Average Adv_Price for rows in the current context.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of market item rows (rows at the fact grain).

measures.name: DistinctTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in the aggregation.

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (by numeric customer code) in the aggregation.

measures.name: SumOfferAmount
measures.description: Total of recorded OfferAmount for rows where an offer was provided. Nulls are ignored by the SUM.

measures.name: AvgOfferAmount
measures.description: Average OfferAmount across rows with non-null OfferAmount.

measures.name: OfferAmountPresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have a non-null OfferAmount.

measures.name: OfferAmountFillRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows that include an OfferAmount (OfferAmount present / total rows).

measures.name: BPIdentityConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the business point identity was confirmed.

measures.name: ReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows marked as released.

measures.name: IsRedCount
measures.description: Sum of IsRed flags (counts rows flagged red). Assumes IsRed is 0/1.

measures.name: LossPrintedNewSum
measures.description: Aggregate of the LossPrintedNew indicator (captures the numeric/count status stored in this column).

measures.name: AppointmentScheduledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have an appointment scheduled (AppointmentDateTime populated).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (one row represents a single attribute label for a point).

measures.name: DistinctPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct points represented in the current aggregation scope.

measures.name: DistinctGroupCount
measures.description: Number of distinct attribute groups (GroupName) in the current aggregation scope.

measures.name: DistinctLabelCount
measures.description: Number of distinct attribute labels (LabelName) in the current aggregation scope.

measures.name: HasValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have a non-empty value string.

measures.name: ValueItemsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) = '' THEN 0 ELSE LEN(value) - LEN(REPLACE(value, ',', '')) + 1 END)
measures.description: Total number of items contained in the 'value' column across rows. 'value' appears to be a comma-separated list; this sums the number of list items.

measures.name: AvgValueItemsPerRow
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) = '' THEN 0 ELSE LEN(value) - LEN(REPLACE(value, ',', '')) + 1 END)
measures.description: Average number of comma-separated items in the 'value' column per row (treats empty string as 0).

measures.name: TotalAttributeRows
measures.description: Total number of attribute rows in the backup view.

measures.name: NonNullValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the attribute Value is not null.

measures.name: NullValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the attribute Value is null.

measures.name: NullValueRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT_BIG(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of attribute rows that have a null Value.

measures.name: DistinctValueCount
measures.description: Number of distinct stored attribute values (including blanks and NULL treated as distinct by the engine).

measures.name: DistinctLabelCount
measures.description: Number of distinct LabelName values present in the view.

measures.name: DistinctFieldCount
measures.description: Number of distinct FieldName values present in the view.

measures.name: AvgAttributesPerPoint
measures.description: Average number of attribute rows per PointID (total rows divided by distinct points).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view (records)

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Distinct number of business points represented

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPointCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points flagged as active

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPointRate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID),0))
measures.description: Share of distinct business points that are active

measures.name: POIBusinessPointCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPOI = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points marked as Point Of Interest (POI)

measures.name: POIBusinessPointRate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN IsPOI = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID),0))
measures.description: Share of distinct business points that are POIs

measures.name: CustomerSourceDistinctCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customer source identifiers represented

measures.name: BusinessPointNameCompletenessRate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN BusinessPointName IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BusinessPointName)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID),0))
measures.description: Share of business points that have a non-empty BusinessPointName

measures.name: BPCount
measures.description: Total number of business points for the given area and ActiveFlag

measures.name: ActiveBPCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 1 THEN BPcount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points that are marked active (ActiveFlag = true) for the area

measures.name: InactiveBPCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 0 THEN BPcount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points that are marked inactive (ActiveFlag = false) for the area

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(BPcount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 1 THEN BPcount ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / SUM(BPcount) END
measures.description: Share of business points that are active in the area (ActiveBPCount / BPCount)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view that contribute to the aggregation (useful for validation)

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of production tasks (row count).

measures.name: Distinct Master Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct MasterCase records associated with the tasks.

measures.name: Contracts Assigned Count
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a non-null ContractID (tasks with an assigned contract).

measures.name: Tasks Missing Contract
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks without an associated contract.

measures.name: Percent With Contract
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(TaskID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 100.0 * COUNT(ContractID) / COUNT(TaskID) END
measures.description: Percentage of tasks that have an associated contract (0-100%).

measures.name: Total Contract Final Price
measures.description: Sum of ContractFinalPrice across tasks. Many rows are null in the view; filter to non-null rows for meaningful totals.

measures.name: Average Contract Final Price
measures.description: Average ContractFinalPrice for tasks with a non-null ContractFinalPrice.

measures.name: Distinct Sales People
measures.description: Number of distinct sales people referenced on tasks (SalesManFullName). High null rate; interpret with caution.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of tasks (one row per TaskID).

measures.name: Distinct Master Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct MasterCaseIDs referenced by the tasks. Note: MasterCaseID has low null rate in the sample.

measures.name: Contracted Task Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that reference a contract (ContractID is not null). Many rows show null ContractID in the sample, so expect this to be small.

measures.name: Contracted Revenue (sum)
measures.description: Sum of ContractFinalPrice for tasks that have a contract price. ContractFinalPrice is stored as DECIMAL(18,3); many values are null in the sample.

measures.name: Average Contract Final Price
measures.description: Average ContractFinalPrice across tasks with a non-null ContractFinalPrice.

foreign_keys.notes: Suggested reference based on column name; verify physical FK in source system.
Suggested reference for contract lookup; many ContractID values are null in the sample.
Suggested reference if a Ticket dimension/table exists.
Suggested reference; column is fully null in sample.
Suggested reference for ticket priority values (low cardinality).
Suggested reference; column is fully null in sample and should be validated.

default_filters.notes: Common filter to focus on tasks with contract revenue; adjust or remove depending on analysis needs.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of tasks (row count at TaskID grain)

measures.name: Distinct Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by the tasks (distinct TaskCaseID)

measures.name: Distinct Senders
measures.description: Number of distinct senders who created tasks (excludes NULL senders)

measures.name: Distinct Actual Owners
measures.description: Number of distinct users currently listed as the actual owner of tasks

measures.name: Average Tasks per Case
measures.description: Average number of tasks associated with each case in the current aggregation context (NULL safe)

measures.name: Average Age (days)
measures.description: Average age of tasks in days measured from TaskCreatedOn to now (NULL TaskCreatedOn rows are excluded)

measures.name: Tasks Last 30 Days
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskCreatedOn >= DATEADD(day, -30, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks created in the last 30 days

measures.name: Percent With Sender
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskSenderID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks that have a non-null TaskSenderID

measures.name: Active Task Count (status = 0)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where TaskStatus = 0 (status code for active/open tasks in this dataset)

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.description: Number of failure rows. At the default grain this counts failure records (one row = one reported failure instance).

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that experienced at least one renewal failure in the current aggregation scope.

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypes
measures.description: Count of distinct error types present in the aggregation scope.

measures.name: IsInvalidCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows flagged as invalid (IsInvalid = 1). Useful to measure how many failures were considered invalid.

measures.name: TotalInvalidFlags
measures.expression: SUM( COALESCE(Invalid_Target_CP_VSID,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_Adv_EndDate,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_Bundle_Heading,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_Target_Prid,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_BPIsActive,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_HeadingIDIsActive,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_NotPassedQA,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_MixedPm,0) + COALESCE(Invalid_CP_State,0) )
measures.description: Sum of all individual invalid-flag columns for the aggregation scope. Each invalid_* column is treated as 0/1 and aggregated to indicate total invalid indicators raised.

measures.name: AffectedBusinessPartners
measures.description: Number of distinct business partners (ActualBpOwnerCode) impacted by failures within the aggregation scope.

measures.name: AdvertisementFailures
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AdvertisementID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of failure rows that are associated with an advertisement (AdvertisementID not null).

foreign_keys.note: Suggested reference to the ETL/ingestion batch table

default_filters.note: Limit to recent batches by default; replace placeholder with the latest batch id(s) in the UI.
Default to showing invalid failures; remove or change if you want all failures.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the selected slice

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented

measures.name: DistinctUnitCount
measures.description: Number of distinct units involved in the campaigns

measures.name: AverageCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration of a campaign (in days) computed as average of DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, EndDate)

measures.name: MinStartDate
measures.description: Earliest campaign start date in the current filter/context

measures.name: MaxEndDate
measures.description: Latest campaign end date in the current filter/context

measures.name: PercentCurrentlyActive
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EndDate >= GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of records whose EndDate is today or in the future (approx. currently active campaigns)

measures.name: Campaigns
measures.description: Count of distinct campaigns represented in the view (de-duplicated by CampaignID).

measures.name: Rows
measures.description: Number of rows returned from the source view (useful to detect duplicates or reporting granularity).

measures.name: UnitsCovered
measures.description: Number of distinct units (UnitID) associated with the campaigns in the result set.

measures.name: CampaignsWithOwner
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns that have an assigned ActualOwnerID.

measures.name: TotalDurationDays
measures.description: Sum of campaign durations in days across the aggregated set. Rows with NULL start or end reduce contribution (NULLs are ignored by DATEDIFF).

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days (average of DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, EndDate) per row/campaign).

measures.name: CurrentlyActiveCampaigns
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN (EndDate IS NULL OR EndDate >= CAST(GETUTCDATE() AS DATE)) AND (StartDate IS NULL OR StartDate <= CAST(GETUTCDATE() AS DATE)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns considered active as of today (StartDate <= today and (EndDate >= today or EndDate is NULL)).

measures.name: LosingEvents
measures.description: Row count of losing events represented in the view (each record is one losing instance for a campaign/owner/unit/time window).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns present in the result set.

measures.name: TotalLosingDays
measures.description: Total number of days summed across all losing periods (sum of EndDate - StartDate in days). Null or negative durations are omitted depending on source implementation.

measures.name: AverageLosingDurationDays
measures.description: Average length in days of a losing period (average of EndDate - StartDate).

measures.name: AverageLosingEventsPerCampaign
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) END
measures.description: Average number of losing event records per distinct campaign.

measures.name: Pending Record Count
measures.description: Total number of pending market analysis records (row count)

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the pending set

measures.name: Average Duration (days)
measures.description: Average length of the pending period in days (EndDate - StartDate)

measures.name: Median Duration (days) - approximate
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, EndDate))
measures.description: Approximate median length of the pending period in days. (Uses percentile aggregate; availability depends on SQL engine)

measures.name: Maximum Duration (days)
measures.description: Maximum observed pending duration in days

measures.name: Minimum Duration (days)
measures.description: Minimum observed pending duration in days

measures.name: Share > 180 Days
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, EndDate) > 180 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1),0)
measures.description: Proportion of pending records where duration exceeds 180 days

measures.name: Records Starting This Month
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DATEPART(year, StartDate) = DATEPART(year, GETDATE()) AND DATEPART(month, StartDate) = DATEPART(month, GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of pending records whose StartDate falls in the current month

default_filters.description: Show pending analyses that have not ended as of today

measures.name: Target Value (sum)
measures.description: Sum of target monetary values for the campaign/owner/unit over the specified date range. Source column: TargetValue.

measures.name: Target Count (sum)
measures.description: Sum of target item counts (or target occurrences) for the campaign/owner/unit over the specified date range. Source column: TargetCount.

measures.name: Average Target Value (row-level)
measures.description: Average of TargetValue across rows in the aggregation window. Useful to understand typical target size.

measures.name: Target Value per Target (ratio)
measures.description: Average monetary value per target (total target value divided by total target count). Returns null when TargetCount sums to zero.

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the aggregation scope.

measures.name: AssignmentRows
measures.description: Total number of assignment rows (one row per TaskID / StakeHolderUserID combination). Useful as a general row-count metric when aggregating.

measures.name: ActiveAssignmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StakeHolderUserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments that have a non-null stakeholder user. Mirrors AssignmentRows for this view (StakeHolderUserID appears non-null) and is useful when downstream filters may introduce nulls.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented by the current aggregation. When grouping by stakeholder this gives how many tasks each stakeholder is assigned to.

measures.name: DistinctStakeholderCount
measures.description: Number of unique stakeholders in the current aggregation scope.

measures.name: StakeholderPresencePct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN StakeHolderUserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Percentage of rows in the aggregation that have a stakeholder assigned. For this view it is expected to be 100%, but the metric is useful after joins/filters.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks (de-duplicated by TaskID)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (may equal TaskCount if one row per task)

measures.name: OpenTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks with status = 0 (interpreted as 'open' based on sample values)

measures.name: DistinctSenders
measures.description: Number of distinct senders that created tasks (nulls are ignored)

measures.name: DistinctCases
measures.description: Number of distinct case records referenced by tasks

measures.name: PercentWithPotentialUser
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN PotentialUserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of tasks that have a PotentialUser assigned

measures.name: AverageAgeHours
measures.description: Average age of tasks in hours calculated from TaskCreatedOn to current UTC time

measures.name: EarliestCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest TaskCreatedOn timestamp in the set

measures.name: LatestCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest TaskCreatedOn timestamp in the set

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Total number of task records (one row per TaskID).

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cases represented by tasks in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctSenders
measures.description: Count of distinct senders who initiated tasks.

measures.name: TasksWithContractSalesman
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractSalesman IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have an associated ContractSalesman value.

measures.name: PercentWithContractSalesman
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractSalesman IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks that include a ContractSalesman (TasksWithContractSalesman / TaskCount).

measures.name: AvgTasksPerCase
measures.description: Average number of tasks per distinct case in the filtered set.

measures.name: AvgAgeDays
measures.description: Average age in days of tasks computed from TaskCreatedOn to the current date.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of tasks (rows) in the current query/grouping.

measures.name: Distinct Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct cases associated with the tasks in the current query/grouping.

measures.name: Distinct Dynamic Code Count
measures.description: Number of distinct TaskDynamicCode values present in the current query/grouping.

measures.name: Average Tasks Per Case
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT TaskCaseID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(TaskID)*1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT TaskCaseID) END
measures.description: Average number of tasks per case for the current query/grouping. NULL when there are no cases.

measures.name: Percent Open Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskCaseState = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks in open state (interprets TaskCaseState = 0 as 'open'). Verify TaskCaseState coding before relying on this metric.

measures.name: First Task Created On
measures.description: Earliest task creation timestamp within the current grouping.

measures.name: Last Task Created On
measures.description: Latest task creation timestamp within the current grouping.

default_filters.description: Default filter kept to the active/expected TaskStatus value seen in the view (source contains only 0).

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of task rows (one row per task / role-assignment).

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by the tasks.

measures.name: DistinctSenders
measures.description: Number of distinct senders (TaskSenderID) seen in the result set. nulls excluded from the distinct count.

measures.name: DistinctOwners
measures.description: Number of distinct actual owners assigned to tasks.

measures.name: DistinctTaskTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct task types present in the view.

measures.name: AverageTaskAgeDays
measures.description: Average age of tasks in days, computed from TaskCreatedOn to current UTC date/time.

measures.name: PercentWithSender
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN TaskSenderID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of tasks that have a non-null sender (TaskSenderID).

measures.name: TasksCreatedThisMonth
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskCreatedOn >= DATEADD(month, DATEDIFF(month,0,GETUTCDATE()), 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks created in the current UTC month.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of task rows (one row per TaskID).

measures.name: Unique Business Points
measures.description: Count of distinct business points (customers) represented in the selection.

measures.name: Total Loss Printed (New)
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew across tasks  indicates total 'loss printed' occurrences captured by the view.

measures.name: Average Loss Printed per Task
measures.description: Average LossPrintedNew value per task.

measures.name: Average Campaign Duration (days)
measures.description: Average duration in days between campaign start and campaign close (CampStartedOn -> CampClosedOn).

measures.name: Average Days Since Task Created
measures.description: Average age of tasks measured in days from TaskCreatedOn to now (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP). This is a dynamic, time-dependent metric.

measures.name: Tasks Missing Phone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks for which no phone number is available (Phone is NULL).

measures.name: CaptureCount
measures.description: Total number of advertisement capture records (rows) in the dataset.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (CustomerCode) represented in the capture records.

measures.name: DistinctFriendlyUrlCount
measures.description: Number of distinct FriendlyUrl values (unique listing pages) captured.

measures.name: CapturesWithSnapshotCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SnapshotFile IS NOT NULL AND SnapshotFile <> '' AND SnapshotFile <> 'None' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of capture records that include a non-empty snapshot file reference.

measures.name: PercentWithSnapshot
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN SnapshotFile IS NOT NULL AND SnapshotFile <> '' AND SnapshotFile <> 'None' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of capture records that include a non-empty snapshot file (captures with an associated image/document).

measures.name: InitiationCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 'initiation' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of captures whose Type denotes an initiation event.

measures.name: ChangeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 'change' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of captures whose Type denotes a change/update event.

measures.name: MaxVersion
measures.description: Maximum Version value observed in the current grouping (useful to find latest version).

measures.name: AvgVersionValue
measures.description: Average numeric value of the Version field across the selected rows (interprets Version as numeric).

measures.name: AvgDetailsLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Details text; helps quantify how verbose captures are.

measures.name: FriendlyUrlPresenceRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN FriendlyUrl IS NOT NULL AND FriendlyUrl <> '' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Percentage of capture records that include a FriendlyUrl value.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of replacement mappings (rows) in the table.

measures.name: UniqueKeywordsReplaced
measures.description: Number of distinct source keywords that have at least one replacement mapping.

measures.name: UniqueReplacementTargets
measures.description: Number of distinct keywords that are used as replacement targets.

measures.name: AverageTargetsPerKeyword
measures.description: Average number of replacement target entries per source keyword (rows divided by distinct source keywords).

measures.name: SelfReplacementsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KeywordID = ReplaceWithKeywordID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings where a keyword maps to itself (KeywordID = ReplaceWithKeywordID).

foreign_keys.description: Inferred reference to the Keyword dimension for the source keyword. Validate target table/schema if different.
Inferred reference to the Keyword dimension for the replacement (target) keyword. Validate target table/schema if different.

measures.name: Mappings
measures.description: Total number of replacement mapping rows. Each row represents a mapping from an original (old) attribute value to a replacement attribute value.

measures.name: DistinctOriginalAttributeValues
measures.description: Number of distinct original (old) attribute values that appear in the mapping table.

measures.name: DistinctReplacementAttributeValues
measures.description: Number of distinct replacement attribute values referenced by the mapping table.

measures.name: ReplacementSpreadRatio
measures.description: Ratio of unique replacement values to unique original values. Values > 1 indicate more unique replacements than originals (many-to-many or one-to-many scenarios); values < 1 indicate consolidation.

measures.name: IdentityMappings
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Initial_OldAttributeValueId = ReplaceWithAttributeValueId THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings where the original attribute value equals the replacement value (no change).

measures.name: MappingCount
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows (each SourceID->TargetID pair instance).

measures.name: DistinctSourceCount
measures.description: Number of distinct source identifiers present in the mapping table.

measures.name: DistinctTargetCount
measures.description: Number of distinct target identifiers present in the mapping table.

measures.name: AverageTargetsPerSource
measures.description: Average number of mapping rows (targets) per distinct source. Higher than 1 indicates a source maps to multiple targets on average.

measures.name: AverageSourcesPerTarget
measures.description: Average number of mapping rows (sources) per distinct target. Higher than 1 indicates multiple sources mapping to the same target on average.

measures.name: MappingCount
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows (each row represents a mapping of an old attribute to a new attribute for an activity).

measures.name: DistinctActivities
measures.description: Number of distinct activities that have at least one attribute mapping.

measures.name: DistinctOldAttributes
measures.description: Number of distinct source (old) attributes observed in mappings.

measures.name: DistinctNewAttributes
measures.description: Number of distinct target (new) attributes observed in mappings.

measures.name: AvgMappingsPerActivity
measures.description: Average number of attribute mappings per activity (total mappings divided by distinct activities). NULL when there are no activities.

display.description: Mapping of legacy (old) attribute identifiers to new attribute identifiers per activity. Use OldAttributeID or NewAttributeID to group mappings; use ActivityID to inspect mappings within a specific migration activity.

measures.name: MappingCount
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows (each row represents one mapping from an old attribute value to a new attribute value, optionally scoped to an activity).

measures.name: MappingsWithActivity
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActivityID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of mapping rows that are associated with a specific Activity (excludes rows where ActivityID is NULL).

measures.name: DistinctOldAttributeValues
measures.description: Number of distinct old attribute values present in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctNewAttributeValues
measures.description: Number of distinct new attribute values present in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctActivities
measures.description: Number of distinct activities referenced by the mapping rows (NULL ActivityID values are ignored).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows (occurrences) in the selected context.

measures.name: DistinctAttributeValueCount
measures.description: Number of distinct attribute values represented in the selected context.

measures.name: DistinctActivityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct activities represented in the selected context.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the table (useful for sanity checks and quick aggregations).

measures.name: DistinctActivityCount
measures.description: Count of distinct Activity_ID values  represents the number of unique activities.

measures.name: DistinctEnglishNameCount
measures.description: Count of distinct English activity names (NameEn). Helps detect name duplicates or many-to-one mappings.

measures.name: AvgEnglishNameLength
measures.description: Average character length of the English activity name (NameEn). Useful for UI sizing and quality checks.
